tika-s0305t:6_0: 1-2. Pubbaṅgamāti pubbecarā. Avijjā hi aññāṇalakkhaṇā sammuyhanākārena ārammaṇe pavattatīti
tika-s0305t:6_1: sampayuttadhammānampi tadākārānuvidhānatāya paccayo hoti. Tathā hi te aniccāsubhadukkhānattasabhāvepi
tika-s0305t:6_2: dhamme niccādito gaṇhanti, ayamassā tesaṃ sahajātavasena pubbaṅgamatā. Yaṃ pana mohena
tika-s0305t:6_3: abhibhūto pāpakiriyāya ādīnavaṃ apassanto pāṇaṃ hanati, adinnaṃ ādiyati, kāmesu micchā
tika-s0305t:6_4: carati, musā bhaṇati, aññampi vividhaṃ dussīlyaṃ ācarati, ayamassa sahajātavasena
tika-s0305t:6_5: ca upanissayavasena ca pubbaṅgamatā. Samāpajjanāyāti tabbhāvāpajjanāya akusalappattiyā.
tika-s0305t:6_6: Sabhāvapaṭilābhāyāti attalābhāya. Tenāha “uppattiyā”ti. Sā panesā vuttākārena akusalānaṃ
tika-s0305t:6_7: pubbaṅgamabhūtā avijjā uppajjatīti sambandho. Yadetanti yaṃ etaṃ pāpājigucchanatāya
tika-s0305t:6_8: pāpato alajjanākārasaṇṭhitaṃ ahirikaṃ, pāpānutrāsatāya pāpato abhāyanākārasaṇṭhitañca
tika-s0305t:6_9: anottappaṃ, etaṃ dvayaṃ anudeva anvāgatameva. Anu-saddena cettha etanti upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:6_10: Anudevāti etassa attho saheva ekatoti. Ettha avijjāya vuttanayānusārena tappaṭipakkhato
tika-s0305t:6_11: ca attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – tattha yathā akusalakammapathavasena pavattiyaṃ
tika-s0305t:6_12: pubbaṅgamatā avijjāya, evaṃ kusalakammapathavasena puññakiriyavatthuvasena ca pavattiyaṃ
tika-s0305t:6_13: vijjāya pubbaṅgamatā vattabbā. Vīmaṃsādhipativasena pavattiyaṃ ādhipaccākāravasena
tika-s0305t:6_14: ca pubbaṅgamatā veditabbā. Dvīhevāti ca avadhāraṇaṃ ādhipaccākārassa sahajāteneva saṅgahetabbato.
tika-s0305t:7_1: Etthāti hiriottappe. Vidati, vindatīti vā vijjā. Viddasūti ca sappaññapariyāyoti
tika-s0305t:7_2: āha “viddasunoti viduno”ti. Yāthāvadiṭṭhīti aviparītā diṭṭhi, saṃkilesato niyyānikadiṭṭhi.
tika-s0305t:7_3: Sammādiṭṭhi pahotīti ettha sā vijjā sammādiṭṭhi veditabbā. Na ekato sabbāni labbhanti
tika-s0305t:7_5: labbhanti kiccato bhinnānampi tāsaṃ tattha sarūpato abhinnattā. Ekā eva hi virati
tika-s0305t:7_6: maggakkhaṇe tissannampi viratīnaṃ kiccaṃ sādhentī pavattati, yathā ekā eva sammādiṭṭhi
tika-s0305t:7_7: parijānanādivasena catubbidhakiccaṃ sādhentī pavattati. Tāni ca kho sabbāni aṭṭhapi
tika-s0305t:7_8: paṭhamajjhānike magge labbhantīti yojanā. Paṭhamajjhāniketi paṭhamajhānavante.
tika-s0305t:8_1: pañcannaṃ eva aṅgānaṃ vasenā”ti, tasmā pañcaṅgiko lokuttaramaggo hoti. “Pubbeva kho
tika-s0305t:8_2: panā”ti hi vacanaṃ tadā maggakkhaṇe viratīnaṃ abhāvaṃ ñāpeti, tasmā kāmāvacaracittesu
tika-s0305t:8_3: viya lokuttaracittesu virati aniyatāti adhippāyo. Parisuddhabhāvadassananti parisuddhasīlabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0305t:8_4: Ayamattho dīpito, na ariyamagge viratīnaṃ abhāvo.
tika-s0305t:9_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā abhidhamme maggavibhaṅge pañcaṅgikavāro āgatoti āha “yampi abhidhamme”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:9_1: Tanti “pañcaṅgiko maggo hotī”ti vacanaṃ. “Ekaṃ kiccantaraṃ dassetuṃ vutta”nti vatvā
tika-s0305t:9_2: taṃ dassetuṃ “yasmiñhi kāle”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yasmiñhi kāleti lokiyakāle. Tena “ekaṃ
tika-s0305t:9_3: kiccantara”nti vuttaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikakiccaṃ dasseti. Viratiuppādanena micchāvācādīni puggalena
tika-s0305t:9_4: maggasamaye pajahāpentīti sammādiṭṭhiādīni “pañca kārakaṅgānī”ti vuttāni. Sammāvācādikiriyā
tika-s0305t:9_5: hi virati, tañca etāni kārāpentīti. Virativasenāti viramaṇakiriyāvasena kārāpakabhāvena,
tika-s0305t:10_0: Sammākammanto pūratīti imehi sammādiṭṭhiādīhi sammākammantakiccaṃ pūrati nāma tehi
tika-s0305t:10_1: vīriyādikehi tadatthasiddhito. Tampi sandhāya “ekaṃ kiccantaraṃ dassetu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:10_2: Imaṃ kiccantaraṃ dassetunti lokuttaramaggakkhaṇepi imāneva pañca sammāvācādiviratittayassa
tika-s0305t:10_3: ekakkhaṇe kārāpakaṅgānīti dassetuṃ. Evaṃ vuttanti “tasmiṃ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo
tika-s0305t:10_4: hotī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Lokiyamaggakkhaṇe pañceva honti, virati pana aniyatā, tasmā
tika-s0305t:10_6: kāraṇakittanamaggo, ariyamaggo pana aṭṭhaṅgikovāti dassetuṃ, “yā ca, bhikkhave”tiādimāha,
tika-s0305t:10_7: taṃ suviññeyyameva. Micchādiṭṭhiādikā dasa, tappaccayā akusalā ca dasāti vīsati akusalapakkhiyā,
tika-s0305t:10_8: sammādiṭṭhiādikā dasa, tappaccayā kusalā ca dasāti vīsati kusalapakkhiyā mahācattārīsakasutte
tika-s0305t:10_9: vuttā. Mahācattārīsakanti tassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Missakova kathito lokuttarassapi idha labbhamānattā.
tika-s0305t:11_0: Yasmā kosalasaṃyuttepi idha ca therena “upaḍḍhamidaṃ, bhante, brahmacariyassā”tiādinā
tika-s0305t:11_1: vuttaṃ “mā hevaṃ ānandā”tiādinā paṭikkhipitvā “sakalamevidaṃ ānandā”tiādinā bhagavatā
tika-s0305t:11_2: desitaṃ suttaṃ āgataṃ. Tassattho kosalasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto, tasmā vuttaṃ “kosalasaṃyutte vuttatthamevā”ti.
tika-s0305t:14_0: 3. Sāvakabodhi sāvakapāramiyo, tappariyāpannaṃ ñāṇaṃ sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ, taṃ pana
tika-s0305t:14_1: dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ tatthapi dhammasenāpatino eva savisesaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ, na
tika-s0305t:14_2: itaresanti āha – “sāvaka…pe… appattatāyā”ti. Tasmā tassa matthakappattiyā maggabrahmacariye
tika-s0305t:14_3: ijjhante tassa ekadeso idha ijjhati, na sakalanti. Na hi addhabrahmacariyaṃ nāma
tika-s0305t:14_4: atthi, tasmā vuttaṃ, “sakalampi …pe… labbhatī”ti, taṃ pana bhaṇḍāgāriko nāññāsi ñāṇassa
tika-s0305t:14_5: sāvakavisayepi sappadesikattā, dhammasenāpati pana ñāṇassa tattha nippadesikattā
tika-s0305t:14_6: aññāsīti. Tenāha – “ānandatthero…pe… aññāsī”ti. Evamāhāti “sakalamidaṃ, bhante”ti evaṃ avoca.
tika-s0305t:17_0: 4. Vaḷavābhi-saddo vaḷavāpariyāyoti āha “catūhi vaḷavāhi yuttarathenā”ti. Yodharathoti
tika-s0305t:17_1: yodhehi yujjhanatthaṃ ārohitabbaratho. Alaṅkāraratho maṅgaladivasesu alaṅkatapaṭiyattehi
tika-s0305t:17_2: ārohitabbaratho. Ghanadukulena parivāritoti rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇena setadukulena paṭicchādito.
tika-s0305t:17_3: Paṭicchādanattho hi idha parivārasaddo. Rajatapanāḷisuparikkhittā setabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ.
tika-s0305t:18_0: Channaṃ channaṃ māsānanti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. Ekavāraṃ nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karotīti
tika-s0305t:18_1: idaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhānantare ṭhitena kātabbaṃ cārittaṃ. Nagarato na pakkantāti nagarato
tika-s0305t:18_2: bahi na gatā. Maṅgalavacane niyuttā maṅgalikā, suvatthivacane niyuttā sovatthikā.
tika-s0305t:19_0: Vaṇṇagītanti thutigītaṃ. Brahmabhūtaṃ seṭṭhabhūtaṃ yānaṃ, brahmabhūtānaṃ seṭṭhabhūtānaṃ
tika-s0305t:19_1: yānanti vā brahmayānaṃ. Vijitattā visesena jinanato. Rāgaṃ vinayamānā pariyosāpetīti
tika-s0305t:19_2: sabbampi rāgaṃ samucchedavinayavasena vineti, attano kiccaṃ pariyosāpeti. Kiccapariyosāpaneneva
tika-s0305t:19_3: hi sayampi pariyosānaṃ nipphattiṃ upagacchati. Tenāha “pariyosānaṃ gacchati nipphajjatī”ti.
tika-s0305t:20_0: Dhuranti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha “tatramajjhattatāyuge yuttā”ti. Īsāti yugasandhārikā
tika-s0305t:20_1: dāruyugaḷā. Yathā vā bāhiraṃ yugaṃ dhāreti, tassā ṭhitāya eva kiccasiddhi, evaṃ kiriyāvasena
tika-s0305t:20_2: laddhabalena tatramajjhattatāyuge thiraṃ dhāreti, teheva ariyamaggarathassa pavattanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:20_3: Hiriggahaṇena cettha taṃsahacaraṇato ottappampi gahitaṃyeva hoti. Tenāha “attanā
tika-s0305t:20_4: saddhi”ntiādi. Nāḷiyā minamāno puriso viya ārammaṇaṃ minātīti mano. Kataraṃ pana
tika-s0305t:20_5: taṃ mano, kathañcassa yottasadisatāti āha “vipassanācitta”ntiādi. Tena yottaṃ viyāti
tika-s0305t:20_6: yottanti dasseti. Lokiyavipassanācittaṃ atirekapaññāsa kusaladhamme ekābaddhe ekasaṅgahite
tika-s0305t:20_7: karotīti sambandho. Te pana “phasso hoti…pe… avikkhepo hotī”ti cittaṅgavasena dhammasaṅgahe
tika-s0305t:20_8: āgatanayeneva veditabbā. Lokuttaravipassanācittanti maggacittaṃ āha. Atirekasaṭṭhīti
tika-s0305t:20_9: te eva sammākammantājīvehi anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīhi ca saddhiṃ atirekasaṭṭhi
tika-s0305t:20_10: kusaladhamme. Ekābaddheti ekasmiṃ eva ārammaṇe ābaddhe. Ekasaṅgaheti tatheva vipassanākiccavasena
tika-s0305t:20_11: ekasaṅgahe karoti. Pubbaṅgamabhāvena ārakkhaṃ sāretīti ārakkhasārathī. “Yathā hi
tika-s0305t:20_12: rathassa…pe… sārathī”ti vatvā taṃ dassetuṃ “yoggiyo”ti vuttaṃ. Dhuraṃ vāheti yogge.
tika-s0305t:20_13: Yojeti yogge samagatiyañca. Akkhaṃ abbhañjati sukhappavattanatthaṃ. Rathaṃ peseti
tika-s0305t:20_14: yoggacodanena. Nibbisevane karoti gamanavīthiyaṃ paṭipādanena sanniyojeti. Ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānāti
tika-s0305t:20_15: ārakkhaṃ paccupaṭṭhapeti asammosasabhāvattā. Gatiyoti pavattiyo, nipphattiyo vā.
tika-s0305t:21_0: Ariyapuggalassa nibbānaṃ paṭimukhaṃ sampāpane ratho viyāti ratho. Parikaroti vibhūsayatīti
tika-s0305t:21_1: parikkhāro, vibhūsanaṃ, sīlañca ariyamaggassa vibhūsanaṭṭhāniyaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “catupārisuddhisīlālaṅkāro”ti,
tika-s0305t:21_2: sīlabhūsanoti attho. Vipassanāsampayuttānanti lokiyāya lokuttarāya ca vipassanāya
tika-s0305t:21_3: sampayuttānaṃ. Vidhinā īretabbato pavattetabbato vīriyaṃ, sammāvāyāmo. Samaṃ sammā
tika-s0305t:21_4: ca dhiyatīti samādhi, dhurañca taṃ samādhi cāti dhurasamādhi, upekkhā dhurasamādhi
tika-s0305t:21_5: etassāti upekkhādhurasamādhi, ariyamaggo upekkhāsaṅkhātadhurasamādhīti attho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0305t:21_6: pana byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā dhurasamādhisaddānaṃ bhinnādhikaraṇatā vuttā. Payogamajjhatteti
tika-s0305t:22_0: Mettāti mettācetovimutti. Tathā karuṇā. Pubbabhāgoti ubhinnampi upacāro. Dvepi kāyacittavivekā
tika-s0305t:22_1: viya pubbabhāgadhammavasena vuttā. Ariyamaggaratheti parisuddhamaggasaṅkhāte rathe.
tika-s0305t:22_2: Ariyamaggaratho ca maggaratho cāti ariyamaggaratho, evaṃ ekasesanayena vā attho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:22_4: paṭimukkacammaṃ. Na naṃ te vijjhantīti vacanapathā na naṃ vijjhanti. Dhammabhedanavasena
tika-s0305t:22_5: na bhañjati, tassa ariyamaggassa rathassa sammā yojitassa antarā bhaṅgo natthīti attho.
tika-s0305t:23_0: Attano purisakāraṃ nissāya laddhattā attano santāneti adhippāyo. Anuttaranti uttararahitaṃ.
tika-s0305t:23_1: Tato eva seṭṭhayānaṃ, nassa kenaci sadisanti asadisaṃ. Dhitisampannatāya dhīrā paṇḍitapurisā
tika-s0305t:23_2: lokamhā niyyanti gacchanti. “Jayaṃ jaya”nti gāthāyaṃ vacanavipallāsena vuttanti āha
tika-s0305t:26_0: 5-6. Niyamatthoti avadhāraṇattho. Tena niyamena avadhāraṇena – aññaṃ maggaṃ paṭikkhipati
tika-s0305t:26_1: ito aññassa niyyānikamaggassa abhāvato. “Dukkhassa pariññattha”nti vuttattā vaṭṭadukkhaṃ
tika-s0305t:26_2: kathitaṃ. Ariyamagge gahite tassa pubbabhāgamaggo vipassanāya gahito evāti “missakamaggo
tika-s0305t:26_3: kathito”ti vuttaṃ. Uttānameva apubbassa abhāvā. Ayaṃ pana viseso “rāgakkhayo”tiādīhi
tika-s0305t:26_4: yadipi nibbānaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathāpi arahattaṃ viya brahmacariyampi. Tena nibbānaṃ eva
tika-s0305t:29_0: 7. Rāgavinayādipadehi nibbānaṃ vāpi vucceyya arahattaṃ vāpi. Yasmā so bhikkhu ubhayatthapi
tika-s0305t:29_1: niviṭṭhabuddhi, tasmā bhagavā tassa ajjhāsayavasena “nibbānadhātuyā kho eta”ntiādinā
tika-s0305t:29_2: nibbānadhātuṃ vissajjetvā puna “āsavānaṃ khayo tena vuccatī”ti āha. Yasmā ariyamaggo
tika-s0305t:29_3: rāgādike samucchedavasena vineti, āsavañca sabbaso khepeti, tena ca vuttaṃ nibbānaṃ
tika-s0305t:29_4: arahattañca, tasmā tadubhayaṃ “rāgavinayotiādi nāmamevā”ti vuttaṃ. Anusandhikusalatāya
tika-s0305t:29_5: pucchanto etaṃ avocāti iminā “pucchānusandhi idha labbhatī”ti dīpitaṃ, ajjhāsayānusandhipi
tika-s0305t:32_0: 8. Ekena pariyāyena aṭṭhaṅgikamaggaṃ vibhajitvāti “sammādiṭṭhī”tiādinā ekena pariyāyena
tika-s0305t:32_1: ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ vibhāgena dassetvā “katamā ca, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhī”tiādinā
tika-s0305t:32_2: puna aparena pariyāyena vibhajitukāmo. Uggahadhāraṇaparicayañāṇānipi savanañāṇe eva
tika-s0305t:33_0: Kammaṭṭhānābhinivesoti kammaṭṭhānapaṭipatti. Purimāni dve saccāni uggaṇhitvāti sambandho.
tika-s0305t:33_1: Iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpanti nirodhamaggesu ninnabhāvaṃ dasseti, na abhinandanaṃ, tanninnabhāvo
tika-s0305t:33_2: eva ca tattha kammakaraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekenevākārena saccānaṃ paṭivedhanimittatā,
tika-s0305t:33_3: so eva abhimukhabhāvo tesaṃ samāgamoti ekābhisamayo.
tika-s0305t:34_0: Assāti ñāṇassa, yogino vā. Ettha ca keci “lokiyañāṇampi paṭivedho sabbassa yāthāvabodhabhāvato”ti
tika-s0305t:34_1: vadanti. Nanu uggahādipaṭivedho ca paṭivedhova, na ca so lokuttaroti? Taṃ na, kevalena
tika-s0305t:34_2: paṭivedha-saddena uggahādipaṭivedhānaṃ avacanīyattā, paṭivedhanimittattā vā uggahādivasena
tika-s0305t:34_3: pavattaṃ dukkhādīsu pubbabhāge ñāṇaṃ “paṭivedho”ti vuccati, na paṭivedhattā, paṭivedhabhūtameva
tika-s0305t:34_4: pana ñāṇaṃ ujukaṃ paṭivedhoti vattabbataṃ arahati. Kiccatoti pariññādikiccato. Ārammaṇapaṭivedhoti
tika-s0305t:34_5: sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhamāha. Kiccatoti asammohapaṭivedhaṃ. Uggahādīhi saccassa pariggaṇhanaṃ pariggaho.
tika-s0305t:35_0: Duddasattāti anadhigatañāṇena yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato daṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā uppattito
tika-s0305t:35_1: pākaṭānipi. Tenāha “dukkhasaccaṃ hī”tiādi. Ubhayanti purimaṃ saccadvayaṃ. Payogoti
tika-s0305t:35_2: kiriyā, vāyāmo vā. Tassa mahantatarassa icchitabbataṃ dukkarataratañca upamāhi dasseti
tika-s0305t:35_3: “bhavaggaggahaṇattha”ntiādinā. Yathā purimaṃ saccadvayaṃ viya kenaci pariyāyena apākaṭatāya
tika-s0305t:35_4: paramagambhīrattā uggahādivasena pubbabhāge pavattibhedaṃ gahetvā “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādinā
tika-s0305t:35_5: catubbidhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Ekameva taṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti ekābhisamayavaseneva pavattanato.
tika-s0305t:36_0: Kāmapaccanīkaṭṭhenāti kāmānaṃ ujupaccanīkabhāvena. Kāmato nissaṭabhāvenāti kāmehi
tika-s0305t:36_1: visaṃyuttabhāvena. Kāmaṃ sammasantassāti duvidhampi kāmaṃ aniccādito sammasantassa.
tika-s0305t:36_2: Pajjati pavattati etenāti padaṃ, kāmassa padanti kāmapadaṃ, kāmassa uppattikāraṇassa
tika-s0305t:36_3: ghāto samugghāto, taṃ kāmapadaghātaṃ. Tenāha “kāmavūpasama”nti. Kāmehi vivittaṃ kāmavivittaṃ.
tika-s0305t:36_4: So eva ca nesaṃ anto samucchedaviveketi katvā tasmiṃ sādhetabbe uppannoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0305t:36_5: “kāmavivittante uppanno”ti. Kāmato nikkhamatīti nikkhamo, so eva nekkhammasaṅkappo.
tika-s0305t:37_0: Eseva nayoti iminā byāpādapaccanīkaṭṭhena vihiṃsāya paccanīkaṭṭhenātiādikaṃ abyāpādāvihiṃsāsaṅkappānaṃ
tika-s0305t:37_2: eva saṅgaṇhāti. Kāma…pe… saññānanti kāmavitakkādiviratisampayuttānaṃ nekkhammādisaññānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:37_3: Nānattāti nānākhaṇikattā. Tīsu ṭhānesūti tippakāresu kāraṇesu. Uppannassāti uppajjanārahassa.
tika-s0305t:37_4: Bhūmiladdhauppannaṃ idhādhippetaṃ. Esa nayo ito paresupi. Padacchedatoti kāraṇupacchedato.
tika-s0305t:37_5: Padanti hi uppattikāraṇanti vuttovāyamattho. Anuppattisādhanavasenāti yathā saṅkappo
tika-s0305t:37_6: āyatiṃ nuppajjati, evaṃ anuppattisādhanavasena. Sammādiṭṭhi viya ekova kusalasaṅkappo uppajjati.
tika-s0305t:38_0: Catūsu ṭhānesūti visaṃvādanādīsu catūsu vītikkamaṭṭhānesu. Pabbajitānaṃ micchājīvo
tika-s0305t:38_1: nāma āhāranimittakoti āha “khādanīyabhojanīyādīnaṃ atthāyā”ti. Sabbaso anesanāya
tika-s0305t:38_2: pahānaṃ sammāājīvoti āha “buddhappasatthena ājīvenā”ti. Kammapathapattānaṃ vasena
tika-s0305t:38_3: “sattasu ṭhānesū”ti vuttaṃ. Akammapathapattāya hi anesanāya so padaghātaṃ karotiyeva.
tika-s0305t:39_0: Tathārūpe vā ārammaṇeti yasmiṃ ārammaṇe imassa pubbe kilesā na uppannā, tasmiṃ eva.
tika-s0305t:39_1: Anuppannānanti anuppādassapi patthanāvasena anuppannānaṃ. Vīriyacchandanti vīriyassa
tika-s0305t:39_3: labbhamānachandatāya dhurasampaggahatāya chandapariyāyena vuttaṃ. Tathā hi vīriyaṃ
tika-s0305t:40_1: yathāvuttesu catūsu ṭhānesu padhānakiccassa nipphādanavasena anuppādanādivasena.
tika-s0305t:41_0: Ayanti yathāvutto sadisāsadisatāviseso. Assāti maggassa. Ettha kathanti yadi rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānato
tika-s0305t:41_1: paṭṭhāya yāva sabbabhavaggā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgabojjhaṅgānaṃ sadisatā, evaṃ sante “āruppe
tika-s0305t:41_2: catukkapañcakajjhānaṃ uppajjati, tañca lokuttara”nti ettha kathaṃ attho gahetabboti
tika-s0305t:41_3: āha “etthāpī”tiādi. Taṃjhānikāvāti paṭhamajjhānādīsu yaṃ jhānaṃ maggapaṭilābhassa
tika-s0305t:41_4: pādakabhūtaṃ, taṃjhānikāva assa ariyassa uparipi tayo maggā. Evanti vuttākārena.
tika-s0305t:41_5: Pādakajjhānameva niyameti āruppe catukkapañcakajjhānuppattiyaṃ. Vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā
tika-s0305t:41_6: khandhāti sammasitakhandhe vadanti. Puggalajjhāsayo niyameti pādakasammasitajjhānānaṃ
tika-s0305t:41_7: bhede. Yasmā saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇameva ariyamaggassa bojjhaṅgādivisesaṃ niyameti, tato
tika-s0305t:41_9: asamāpajjitukāmatāvirāgabhāvato itarassa ca atabbhāvato tīsupi vādesu vipassanāva
tika-s0305t:41_10: niyametīti veditabbo, tasmā vipassanāniyameneva hi paṭhamavādepi apādakajjhānādipādakāpi
tika-s0305t:41_11: maggā paṭhamajjhānikā honti. Itarehi ca pādakajjhānehi vipassanāniyamehi taṃtaṃjhānikāva.
tika-s0305t:41_12: Evaṃ sesavādesu vipassanāniyamo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo. Dutiyavāde taṃtaṃjhānikatā
tika-s0305t:41_13: sammasitasaṅkhāravipassanāniyamehi hoti. Tatra hi vipassanā taṃtaṃvirāgabhāvanā bhāvetabbā,
tika-s0305t:41_14: na somanassasahagatā upekkhāsahagatā hutvā jhānaṅgādiniyamaṃ maggassa karotīti evaṃ
tika-s0305t:41_15: vipassanāniyamo vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imasmiñca vāde pādakasammasitajjhānupanissayasabbhāve
tika-s0305t:41_16: ajjhāsayo ekantena hotīti “puggalajjhāsayo niyametīti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0305t:41_17: pana visuddhimaggassa etissā aṭṭhakathāya ekasaṅgahitattā “tesaṃ vādavinicchayo…pe…
tika-s0305t:44_0: 9. Sūkanti sāliyavādīnaṃ vālamāha. So hi nikantakasadiso paṭimukhagataṃ hatthaṃ vā
tika-s0305t:44_1: pādaṃ vā bhindati, tasmā bhedaṃ icchantena uddhaggaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ sammāpaṇihitaṃ
tika-s0305t:44_2: nāma, tathā aṭṭhapitaṃ micchāpaṇihitaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ. Micchāpaṇihitāyāti kammassakatapaññāya
tika-s0305t:44_3: micchāṭhapanaṃ nāma – “ime sattā kammavasena sukhadukkhaṃ paccanubhavanti, taṃ pana
tika-s0305t:44_4: kammaṃ issarassa icchāvasena brahmā nimminātī”tiādinā micchāpakappanaṃ. Keci pana
tika-s0305t:44_5: “natthi dinnantiādinā nayena pavatti, tassa vā ñāṇassa appavattī”ti vadanti. Maggabhāvanāyāti
tika-s0305t:44_6: etthāpi micchāmaggassa pavattanaṃ, ariyamaggassa vā appavattanaṃ micchāṭhapanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:44_7: Tenāha “appavattitattā”ti. Avijjaṃ bhindissatīti avijjaṃ samucchindissati. Magganissitaṃ
tika-s0305t:44_8: katvā magge eva pakkhipitvā. Tañhi ñāṇaṃ maggassa mūlakāraṇaṃ magge siddhe tassa
tika-s0305t:44_10: vuttattā missakamaggo kathito. Chavibhedasadiso cettha avijjābhedo, lohituppādasadiso
tika-s0305t:51_0: 11. Aḍḍhamāsanti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Paṭisallīyitunti yathāvuttaṃ kālaṃ
tika-s0305t:51_1: paṭi divase divase samāpattiyaṃ dhammacintāyaṃ cittaṃ nilīyituṃ. Vinetabboti samucchedavinayena
tika-s0305t:51_2: vinetabbo ariyamaggādhigantabbo. Tanti diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanaṃ. Assāti janatāya. Apagacchatīti
tika-s0305t:52_0: Padesenāti ekadesena. Saha padesenāti sapadeso. Svāyaṃ sapadeso yasmā vedanāvaseneva
tika-s0305t:52_1: pāḷiyaṃ āgato, tasmā paramatthadhammakoṭṭhāse vedanā anavasesato labbhati, te gaṇhanto
tika-s0305t:52_3: padassa atthadassanavasena “paccavekkhanto”ti āha. Paccavekkhaṇā idha sammasanaṃ
tika-s0305t:52_4: nāma, na vipassanā. Vipassanāsammasanaṃ pana bhagavato visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ eva nipphannaṃ,
tika-s0305t:52_5: tasmā bhagavato aññabhūmikāpi vedanā aññabhūmikānaṃ sattānaṃ viruddhā uppajjatevāti
tika-s0305t:52_6: vuttaṃ “yāva bhavaggā pavattā sukhā vedanā”ti. Sabbākārenāti sarūpato samudayato
tika-s0305t:53_0: Nippadesāneva anavasesāneva. Indriyasatipaṭṭhānapadeso suviññeyyoti anuddhato. Assāti
tika-s0305t:53_1: bhagavato. Ṭhāneti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ paccavekkhitabbasaṅkhāte okāse. Sā sā ca vihārasamāpattīti
tika-s0305t:53_2: khandhavasena āyatanādivasena ca pavattitvā tesaṃ ekadesabhūtaṃ vedanaṃyeva pariggahetvā
tika-s0305t:53_3: taṃ sammasitvā anukkamena samāpannā jhānasamāpatti phalasamāpatti ca. Phalasamāpatti
tika-s0305t:53_4: hi tathā sammasitvā punappunaṃ samāpajjanavasena atthato abhinnāpi adhiṭṭhānabhūtadhammabhedena
tika-s0305t:53_5: bhinnā viya vuccati, yato catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassabhedā devasikaṃ vaḷañjanasamāpattiyo
tika-s0305t:53_6: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttā. Kāmaṃ aññadhammavasenapi jātā eva, vedanāvasena panettha abhiniveso
tika-s0305t:53_7: kato vedanānubhāvena jātā. Kasmā evaṃ jātāti? Buddhānaṃ ñāṇapadassa antaravibhāgattā.
tika-s0305t:53_8: Tathā hi bhagavā sakalampi aḍḍhamāsaṃ vedanāvaseneva sammasanaṃ pavatteti, tadanusārena
tika-s0305t:53_9: ca tā vihārasamāpattiyo samāpajji. Tayidaṃ acchariyaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ bhikkhū pavedento
tika-s0305t:54_1: taṃtaṃmicchādassanavasena ca akusalā vedanā eva hoti. Brahmalokādīsu uppajjitvā tattha
tika-s0305t:54_2: niccā dhuvā bhavissāmāti evaṃ diṭṭhiṃ upanissāyāti yojetabbaṃ. Devakulādīsu devapūjatthaṃ,
tika-s0305t:54_3: sabbajanaparibhogatthaṃ vā mālāvacchaṃ ropenti. Vadhabandhanādīnīti ādi-saddena adinnādāna-micchācāra-musāvāda-pisuṇavācā-samphappalāpādīnaṃ
tika-s0305t:54_4: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Diṭṭhadhammavipākassa apacurattā apākaṭattā ca “bhavantaragatāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:55_0: Iti nesanti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā. Tena yathā pharusavācāvasena,
tika-s0305t:55_1: evaṃ tadaññesampi akusalakammānaṃ vasena sammādiṭṭhipaccayā akusalavedanāppavatti
tika-s0305t:55_2: yathārahaṃ nīharitvā vattabbā. Eseva nayoti iminā yathā micchādiṭṭhipaccayā sammādiṭṭhipaccayā
tika-s0305t:55_3: ca kusalākusalavipākavedanā sahajātakoṭiyā upanissayakoṭiyā ca vasena yathārahaṃ
tika-s0305t:55_4: yojetvā dassitā, evaṃ micchāsaṅkappapaccayādīsupi yathārahaṃ yojetvā dassetabbāti
tika-s0305t:55_5: imamatthaṃ atidisati. Chandapaccayāti ettha taṇhāchandasahito kattukāmatāchando adhippetoti
tika-s0305t:55_7: veditabbā”ti. Vitakkapaccayāti ettha appanāppattova vitakko adhippetoti vuttaṃ “vitakkapaccayā
tika-s0305t:55_9: paṭhamajjhāna”nti. Upari tisso rūpāvacarā, heṭṭhā tisso arūpāvacarā evaṃ sesā cha
tika-s0305t:56_0: Tiṇṇanti chandavitakkasaññānaṃ. Avūpasameti paṭipakkhena avūpasamite. Tiṇṇañhi tesaṃ
tika-s0305t:56_1: sahabhāvena paccayatā aṭṭhalobhasahagatacittesu eva. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ vuttameva.
tika-s0305t:56_2: Chandamattassāti tesu tīsu chandamattassa. Vūpasame paṭhamajjhānavedanāva appanāppattassa
tika-s0305t:56_3: adhippetattā. Chandavitakkānaṃ vūpasame dutiyajjhānādivedanā adhippetā saññāya avūpasantattā.
tika-s0305t:56_4: Dutiyajjhānādivedanāgahaṇena hi sabbā saññāsamāpattiyo ca gahitāva honti. Tiṇṇampi
tika-s0305t:56_8: gahitāva hotīti āha – “appattassa pattiyāti arahattaphalassa pattatthāyā”ti. Atha
tika-s0305t:56_9: vā heṭṭhimamaggādhigamena vinā aggamaggo natthīti heṭṭhimamaggādhigamaṃ atthāpannaṃ
tika-s0305t:56_10: katvā “arahattaphalassa pattatthāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Āyameti phalena missito hoti etenāti
tika-s0305t:56_11: āyāmo, sammāvāyāmoti āha “atthi āyāmanti atthi vīriya”nti. Tassa vīriyārambhassāti
tika-s0305t:56_12: aññādhigamakāraṇassa sammāvāyāmassa vasena. Pāḷiyaṃ ṭhāna-saddo kāraṇapariyāyoti
tika-s0305t:56_13: āha – “arahattaphalassa kāraṇe”ti. Tappaccayāti ettha taṃ-saddena “ṭhāne”ti vuttakāraṇameva
tika-s0305t:56_15: pattatthāyā”ti ettha heṭṭhimamaggānaṃ atthāpattivasena gahitabhāvameva joteti. Keci
tika-s0305t:56_17: Nibbattitalokuttaravedanāti paṭhamaṃ apekkhitabbaṃ, pacchā catumaggasahajātā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0305t:59_0: 12. Micchādiṭṭhi vūpasamati sabbaso pahīyati etenāti micchādiṭṭhivūpasamo. “Micchādiṭṭhivūpasamo
tika-s0305t:59_1: nāma sammādiṭṭhi. Bhavantare uppajjanto atidūreti maññamāno vipākavedanaṃ na gaṇhātī”ti
tika-s0305t:59_2: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Iminā nayenā”ti atidisitvāpi tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “yassa
tika-s0305t:59_3: yassā”tiādiṃ vatvā eva sāmaññavasena vuttamatthaṃ pacchimesu tīsu padesu sarūpatova
tika-s0305t:62_0: 13-17. Tissannampi sikkhānaṃ sikkhanaṃ sīlaṃ etassāti sikkhanasīlo. Sikkhatītipi
tika-s0305t:62_1: vā sekkho. Vuttañhetaṃ “sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā sekkhoti vuccati. Kiñca
tika-s0305t:62_2: sikkhati? Adhisīlampi sikkhatī”tiādi. Tīhi phalehi heṭṭhā. Sāpi catutthamaggena saddhiṃ
tika-s0305t:62_3: uppannasikkhāpi. Maggakkhaṇe hi sikkhākiccaṃ na niṭṭhitaṃ vippakatabhāvato, phalakkhaṇe
tika-s0305t:62_4: pana niṭṭhitaṃ nāma. Uttānatthāneva heṭṭhā vuttanayattā.
tika-s0305t:66_1: niyyānikasabhāvaṃ. Micchāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetūti ettha adhi-saddo anatthakoti āha
tika-s0305t:66_3: So eva taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ vaṭṭadukkhapātato dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhammoti āha – “ñāyaṃ dhammanti
tika-s0305t:66_4: ariyamaggadhamma”nti. Ñāṇassa micchāsabhāvo nāma natthīti viññāṇamevettha paccavekkhaṇavasena
tika-s0305t:66_5: pavattaṃ ñāṇa-saddena vuccatīti āha “micchāviññāṇo”ti. Micchāpaccavekkhaṇoti kiñci
tika-s0305t:66_6: pāpaṃ katvā “aho mayā kataṃ sukata”nti evaṃ pavatto micchāpaccavekkhaṇo. Gosīlagovatādipūraṇaṃ
tika-s0305t:66_7: muttīti evaṃ gaṇhato micchāvimutti nāma. Micchāpaṭipadādīhi vivaṭṭanti evaṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ
tika-s0305t:66_8: kathitaṃ. Puggalo pucchitoti nigamito ca “ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asappuriso”tiādinā.
tika-s0305t:66_9: Kiñcāpi “micchādiṭṭhiko hotī”tiādinā puggalova niddiṭṭho, tathāpi puggalasīsenāyaṃ
tika-s0305t:66_10: dhammadesanāti āha “dhammo vibhatto”ti. Tenevāha “dhammena puggalo dassito”ti. Dhammenāti
tika-s0305t:66_11: micchādiṭṭhiādikena dhammena. Kalyāṇaputhujjanato paṭṭhāya sabbaso sappurisā nāma,
tika-s0305t:66_12: khīṇāsavo sappurisataro. Suppavattaniyoti sukhena pavattetuṃ sakkuṇeyyo. Dhāvatīti
tika-s0305t:66_13: gacchati. Paccayuppannena upecca nissitabbato upanisā, paccayo, ekassa sa-kārassa
tika-s0305t:66_14: lopaṃ katvā vāti āha – “saupanisaṃ sapaccaya”nti. Parikaraṇato parikkhāro, parivāroti
tika-s0305t:66_15: āha – “saparikkhāraṃ saparivāra”nti. Sahajātavasena upanissayavasena ca sapaccayatā
tika-s0305t:66_16: kiccasādhane nipphādane sahāyabhāvūpagamane ca saparivāratā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0305t:69_0: 31-40. Ayāthāvapaṭipatti, na yathāpaṭipatti, hetumhipi phalepi ayāthāvavatthusādhanato.
tika-s0305t:69_1: Ekaṃ suttaṃ dhammavasena kathitaṃ paṭipattivasena. Ekaṃ suttaṃ puggalavasena kathitaṃ
tika-s0305t:69_2: paṭipannakavasena. Saṃsāramahoghassa paratīrabhāvato yo naṃ adhigacchati, taṃ pāreti
tika-s0305t:69_3: gametīti pāraṃ, nibbānaṃ, tabbidhuratāya natthi ettha pāranti apāraṃ, saṃsāroti vuttaṃ
tika-s0305t:69_4: – “apārāpāranti vaṭṭato nibbāna”nti. Pāraṅgatāti asekkhe sandhāya. Yepi gacchantīti
tika-s0305t:69_5: sekkhe. Yepi gamissantīti kalyāṇaputhujjane. Pāragāminoti ettha kita-saddo tikālavācīti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:70_0: Tīranti orimatīramāha. Tena vuttaṃ “vaṭṭameva anudhāvatī”ti. Ekantakāḷakattā cittassa
tika-s0305t:70_2: Vodānabhāvato cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇato sukkābhijātihetuto ca vuttaṃ – “sukkanti
tika-s0305t:70_4: vuccati vaṭṭaṃ, tabbidhuratāya anokanti nibbānanti āha – “okā anokanti vaṭṭato nibbāna”nti.
tika-s0305t:71_0: Paramatthato samaṇā vuccanti ariyā, samaṇānaṃ bhāvo sāmaññaṃ, ariyamaggo, tena araṇīyato
tika-s0305t:71_1: upagantabbato sāmaññattho nibbānanti āha – “sāmaññatthanti nibbānaṃ, taṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:71_2: Brahmaññatthanti etthāpi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Brahmaññena ariyamaggena.
tika-s0305t:71_3: Rāgakkhayoti ettha iti-saddo ādisaddattho. Tena “dosakkhayo mohakkhayo”ti padadvayaṃ
tika-s0305t:71_4: saṅgaṇhāti. Vaṭṭatiyevāti vadanti “rāgakkhayo”ti. Pariyāyena hi arahattassa vattabbattāti.
tika-s0305t:74_1: pattabbattā vuttaṃ – “nibbānaṃ patvā pariññātaṃ nāma hotī”ti. Nibbānaṃ patvāti nibbānappattihetu.
tika-s0305t:74_2: Hetuattho hi ayaṃ tvā-saddo yathā – “ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ hoti, sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ
tika-s0305t:74_3: hotī”ti. Tasmāti yasmā apariññeyyaparijānanakiccena nibbānassa pattiyā addhānapariññāsiddhi
tika-s0305t:74_4: ñāyati, tasmā upacāravasena nibbānaṃ “addhānapariññā”ti vuccati yathā “himasanti
tika-s0305t:74_5: sūriyaṃ uggametī”ti. Vijjāvimuttiphalasacchikiriyatthanti ettha vijjāti aggamaggavijjā.
tika-s0305t:74_6: Vimuttīti aggamaggasamādhi adhippeto. Tesaṃ phalaṃ aññāti āha – “vijjāvimuttiphalena
tika-s0305t:74_7: arahattaṃ kathita”nti. Yāthāvato jānanato paccakkhato dassanato ca ñāṇadassananti
tika-s0305t:74_8: idha phalanibbānapaccavekkhaṇā adhippetāti āha – “ñāṇadassanena paccavekkhaṇā kathitā”ti.
tika-s0305t:77_0: 49-62. Yathā aruṇuggaṃ sūriyuggamanassa ekantikaṃ pubbanimittaṃ, evaṃ kalyāṇamittatā
tika-s0305t:77_1: ariyamaggapātubhāvassāti sadisūpamā aruṇuggaṃ kalyāṇamittatāya. Kalyāṇamittoti cettha
tika-s0305t:77_2: ariyo, ariyamaggo vā daṭṭhabbo sūriyapātubhāvo viya tena vidhūpanīyandhakāravidhamanato.
tika-s0305t:77_4: saccapaṭivedhassa kārāpakassa. Evaṃ sabbattheva sampadāsaddā visesādhigamahetutāya
tika-s0305t:80: 63-138. Tathā tathā vutte bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena kathito, tasmā “vutto eva attho, kasmā puna vutto”ti na codetabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:84_0: 139. Kārāpakaappamādo nāma “ime akusalā dhammā pahātabbā, ime kusalā dhammā uppādetabbā”ti
tika-s0305t:84_2: Lokiyova. Na lokuttaro. Ayanti esāti ca appamādameva vadati. Tesanti catubhūmakadhammānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:87_0: 140. Jaṅgalānanti jaṅgalavāsīnaṃ. Jaṅgala-saddo cettha thaddhabhāvasāmaññena pathavīpariyāyo,
tika-s0305t:90_0: 141-148. Vassikāya pupphaṃ vassikaṃ yathā “āmalakiyā phalaṃ āmalaka”nti. Mahātalasminti
tika-s0305t:90_1: uparipāsāde. “Yāni kānicī”ti padehi itarāni samānādhikaraṇāni bhavituṃ yuttānīti
tika-s0305t:90_2: “paccatte sāmivacana”nti vatvā tathā vibhattivipariṇāmo kato. “Tantāvutāna”nti padaṃ
tika-s0305t:90_3: niddhāraṇe sāmivacananti tattha “vatthānī”ti vacanasesena atthaṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:95: 149. Kammāniyeva kammantā yathā suttantā. Ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ magganti ettha nānantariyakatāya vipassanāpi gahitā eva hotīti vuttaṃ “sahavipassana”nti.
tika-s0305t:97: 150. Pañcavidhampi samūhaṭṭhena bījagāmo nāma. Tadevāti mūlabījādi eva. Sampannanti sahajātamūlavantaṃ. Nīlabhāvato paṭṭhāyāti nīlabhāvāpattito paṭṭhāya.
tika-s0305t:99_0: 151. Balaṃ gāhentīti attano sarīrabalaṃ gāhenti. Taṃ pana nāgānaṃ balappatti evāti
tika-s0305t:99_2: mukhadvāraṃ. Nāgā kāyaṃ vaḍḍhentītiādi yasmā ca bhagavatā upamāvasena ābhataṃ, tasmā
tika-s0305t:99_3: evameva khoti etthātiādinā upamaṃ saṃsandati. Āgatesūtiādīsu tīsu padesu bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe.
tika-s0305t:101: 153. Na patiāvamatīti ca nikujjitabhāvena udakavamano ghaṭo, na taṃ puna mukhena gaṇhāti. Tenāha “na anto pavesetī”ti.
tika-s0305t:103: 155. Tenetaṃ vuttanti tena ariyamaggassa ijjhanena etesaṃ sabbesaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ ijjhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:107_0: 159-160. Sahavipassanassa ariyamaggassa bhāvanāya ijjhanena etaṃ abhiññāpariññeyyādidhammānaṃ
tika-s0305t:107_1: abhiññāparijānanādīnaṃ ijjhanaṃ vuttaṃ khattiyādīnaṃ visayaādikaṃ karontassa kathāya sajjitattā.
tika-s0305t:111_0: 161. Kāmānanti vatthukāmakilesakāmānaṃ. Kilesakāmopi hi kāmitanti parikappitena vidhinā
tika-s0305t:111_1: ca adhikarāgehi esanīyo. Bhavānanti tiṇṇaṃ gatīnaṃ. Diṭṭhigatikaparikappitassa brahmacariyassa
tika-s0305t:113: 162-171. Seyyohamasmītiādinā taṃtaṃvibhāgena dhīyanti vidhīyantīti vidhā, mānakoṭṭhāsā, mānaṭṭhapanā vā. Nīhanantīti vibādhenti.
tika-s0305t:117: 172-173. Vaṭṭe ohananti osīdāpentīti oghā. Rūpārūpabhaveti rūpabhave ca arūpabhave ca rūpārūpataṇhopanissayā rūpārūpāvacarakammanibbattā khandhā. Yojanaṭṭhena yogo.
tika-s0305t:119_1: vedanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ. Ghaṭanapabandhanakilesoti hetunā phalassa
tika-s0305t:119_2: kammavaṭṭassa vipākavaṭṭena dukkhappabandhasaññitassa ghaṭanassa sambajjhanassa nibbattakakileso.
tika-s0305t:122_1: aññehi asādhāraṇo kāmarāgādīnaṃyeva āveṇiko sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo. Kāmarāgovāti kāmarāgo
tika-s0305t:122_2: eva appahīno. So sati paccayalābhe uppajjanārahatāya santāne anusetīti anusayo. Sesesupīti
tika-s0305t:122_3: paṭighānusayādīsu. Orambhāgo vuccati kāmadhātu rūpārūpabhāvato heṭṭhābhūtattā. Tattha
tika-s0305t:122_4: pavattiyā paccayabhāvato orambhāgiyāni yathā “pacchiyo goduhako”ti. Saṃyojentīti
tika-s0305t:122_5: saṃyojanāni, heṭṭhā viya attho vattabbo. Uddhambhāgo mahaggatabhāgo, tassa hitānīti
tika-s0305t:122_6: sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā na vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t:129_0: 182. Bujjhati catusaccaṃ ariyasāvako etāyāti bodhaṃ, dhammasāmaggī, ariyasāvako pana
tika-s0305t:129_1: catusaccaṃ bujjhatīti bodhi. Aṅgāti kāraṇā. Yāya dhammasāmaggiyāti sambandho. Taṇhāvasena
tika-s0305t:129_2: patiṭṭhānaṃ, diṭṭhivasena āyūhanā. Sassatadiṭṭhiyā patiṭṭhānaṃ, ucchedadiṭṭhiyā āyūhanā.
tika-s0305t:129_3: Līnavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, uddhaccavasena āyūhanā. Kāmasukhānuyogavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0305t:130_1: avasesakilesābhisaṅkhārehi āyūhanā, sabbākusalābhisaṅkhāravasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, sabbalokiyakusalābhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanā”ti –
tika-s0305t:131_0: Vuttesu pakāresu idha avuttānaṃ vasena veditabbo. Kilesasantānaniddāya uṭṭhahatīti
tika-s0305t:131_1: etena sikhāpattavipassanāsahagatānampi satiādīnaṃ bojjhaṅgabhāvaṃ dasseti. Cattārītiādinā
tika-s0305t:131_2: maggaphalena sahagatānaṃ. Sattahi bojjhaṅgehi bhāvitehi saccapaṭivedho hotīti kathamidaṃ
tika-s0305t:131_3: jānitabbanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yathāhā”tiādi. Jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viyāti etena
tika-s0305t:132_0: Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgāti vuttaṃ “kāraṇattho aṅgasaddo”ti. Bujjhatīti bodhi,
tika-s0305t:132_1: bodhiyā eva aṅgāti bojjhaṅgāti vuttaṃ “bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti. Vipassanādīnaṃ kāraṇānaṃ
tika-s0305t:132_2: bujjhitabbānaṃ saccānaṃ anurūpaṃ paccakkhabhāvena paṭimukhaṃ aviparītaṃ sammā bujjhantīti
tika-s0305t:132_3: evaṃ vatthuvisesadīpakehi uparimaggehi anubujjhantītiādinā vuttabodhisaddehi nippadesena
tika-s0305t:132_7: icchitabbā. Tathā hi sā sabbatthikā vuttā.
tika-s0305t:133_0: Saṃ-saddo pasaṃsāyaṃ. Punadeva sundaro ca atthopīti āha “pasattho sundaro ca bojjhaṅgo”ti.
tika-s0305t:133_1: Abhinibbattetīti abhivisiṭṭhabhāvena nibbatteti savisesabhāvaṃ vadati. “Eke vaṇṇayantī”ti
tika-s0305t:133_2: vatvā tattha yathāvuttavivekattayato aññaṃ vivekadvayaṃ uddharitvā dassetuṃ “te hī”tiādi
tika-s0305t:133_3: vuttaṃ. Tattha jhānakkhaṇe tāva kiccato vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṃ, vipassanākkhaṇe
tika-s0305t:133_5: upasampajja viharissāmī”ti. Tattha tattha nicchayatāya kasiṇajjhānaggahaṇena anuppādānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:136_0: 183. Tiṭṭhanti etenāti ṭhiti, kāraṇaṃ. Kammautucittāhārasaññito catubbidho paccayo
tika-s0305t:136_1: ṭhiti etassāti paccayaṭṭhitiko. Āhārapaccayasaddā hi ekatthā. Subhampīti kāmacchando
tika-s0305t:136_2: paccayo, asubhe subhākārena pavattanato subhanti vuccati. Tena kāraṇena pavattanakassa
tika-s0305t:136_3: aññassa kāmacchandassa nimittattā subhanimittanti. Subhassāti yathāvuttassa subhassa.
tika-s0305t:136_4: Ārammaṇampīti subhākārena, iṭṭhākārena vā gayhamānaṃ rūpādiārammaṇampi subhanimittaṃ
tika-s0305t:136_5: vuttākārena. Anupāyamanasikāroti ākaṅkhitassa hitasukhassa anupāyabhūto manasikāro,
tika-s0305t:136_6: tato eva uppathamanasikāroti ayonisomanasikāro. Tasminti yathāniddhārite kāmacchandabhūte
tika-s0305t:136_7: tadārammaṇabhūte ca duvidhepi subhanimitte. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “subhārammaṇe”icceva
tika-s0305t:136_8: vuttaṃ. Atthi, bhikkhave, subhanimittantiādīti ādi-saddena kāmacchandanīvaraṇassa
tika-s0305t:136_9: āhāradassanapāḷi uttānāti katvā vuttaṃ – “evaṃ sabbanīvaraṇesu yojanā veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0305t:137_0: Paṭighopi paṭighanimittaṃ purimuppannassa pacchā uppajjanakassa nimittabhāvato. Paṭighārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0305t:137_1: nāma ekūnavīsati āghātavatthubhūtā sattasaṅkhārā. Aratīti pantasenāsanādīsu aramaṇaṃ.
tika-s0305t:137_2: Ukkaṇṭhitāti ukkaṇṭhabhāvo. Pantesūti dūresu, vivittesu vā. Adhikusalesūti samathavipassanādhammesu.
tika-s0305t:137_3: Arati ratipaṭipakkho. Aratitāti aramaṇākāro. Anabhiratīti anabhiratabhāvo. Anabhiramaṇāti
tika-s0305t:137_4: anabhiramaṇākāro. Ukkaṇṭhitāti ukkaṇṭhanākāro. Paritassitāti ukkaṇṭhanavaseneva paritassanā.
tika-s0305t:138_0: Āgantukaṃ, na sabhāvasiddhaṃ. Kāyālasiyanti nāmakāye alasabhāvo. Sammohavinodaniyaṃ
tika-s0305t:138_1: pana “tandīti jātiālasiya”nti vuttaṃ. Vadatīti etena atisītādipaccayā saṅkocāpattiṃ
tika-s0305t:138_2: dasseti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ kilesavatthuvibhaṅge. Tandīti jātiālasiyaṃ. Tandiyanāti
tika-s0305t:138_3: tandiyanākāro. Tandimanakatāti tandiyā abhibhūtacittatā. Alasassa bhāvo ālasyaṃ.
tika-s0305t:138_4: Ālasyāyanākāro ālasyāyanā. Ālasyāyitassa bhāvo ālasyāyitattaṃ. Iti sabbehipi imehi
tika-s0305t:139_0: Kilesavasenāti sammohavasena. Kāyavinamanāti kāyassa virūpato namanā. Jambhanāti
tika-s0305t:139_1: phandanā. Punappunaṃ jambhanā vijambhanā. Ānamanāti purato namanā. Vinamanāti pacchato
tika-s0305t:139_2: namanā. Sannamanāti samantato namanā. Paṇamanāti yathā hi tantato uṭṭhitapesakāro
tika-s0305t:139_3: kiñcideva upariṭṭhitaṃ gahetvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ ussāpeti, evaṃ kāyassa uddhaṃ ṭhapanā.
tika-s0305t:139_4: Byādhiyakanti uppannabyādhitā. Iti sabbehipi imehi padehi kilesavasena kāyaphandanameva kathitaṃ.
tika-s0305t:140_0: Bhattapariḷāhoti bhattavasena pariḷāhuppatti. Bhuttāvissāti bhuttavato. Bhattamucchāti
tika-s0305t:140_1: bhattagelaññaṃ. Atibhuttapaccayā hi mucchāpatto viya hoti. Bhattakilamathoti bhuttapaccayā
tika-s0305t:140_2: kilantabhāvo. Bhattapariḷāhoti bhattadaratho. Kucchipūraṃ bhuttavato hi pariḷāhuppattiyā
tika-s0305t:140_3: upahatindriyo viya hoti, kāyo khijjati. Kāyaduṭṭhullanti bhuttabhattaṃ nissāya kāyassa akammaññatā.
tika-s0305t:141_0: Cittassa līyanākāroti ārammaṇe cittassa saṅkocappatti. Cittassa akalyatāti cittassa
tika-s0305t:141_1: gilānabhāvo. Gilānoti akallako vuccati. Tathā cāha “nāhaṃ, bhante, akallako”ti. Akammaññatāti
tika-s0305t:141_2: cittagelaññasaṅkhāto akammaññanākāro. Olīyanāti olīyanākāro. Iriyāpathikampi cittaṃ
tika-s0305t:141_3: yassa vasena iriyāpathaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto olīyati, tassa taṃ ākāraṃ sandhāya
tika-s0305t:141_4: vuttaṃ “olīyanā”ti. Dutiyapadaṃ upasaggena vaḍḍhitaṃ. Līnanti avipphārikatāya saṅkocappattaṃ.
tika-s0305t:141_5: Itare dve ākāraniddesā. Thinanti avipphārikatāya anussāhanā asaṅgahanasaṅgahanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:141_6: Thiyanākāro thiyanā. Thiyitattanti thiyitassa ākāro, avipphārikatāti attho.
tika-s0305t:142_0: Cetaso avūpasamoti cittassa avūpasantatā asannisinnabhāvo. Tenāha – “avūpasantākāro”ti.
tika-s0305t:142_1: Atthato panetanti svāyaṃ avūpasantākāro vikkhepasabhāvattā vikkhepahetutāya ca atthato
tika-s0305t:143_1: dhammā. Yasmā vicikicchā byāpādādayo viya anu anu uggahaṇapaccayā uppajjati, tasmā
tika-s0305t:143_2: kaṅkhāṭṭhānīyaṃ ārammaṇameva dassitaṃ “vicikicchāya ārammaṇadhammā”ti. Yasmā purimuppannā
tika-s0305t:143_3: vicikicchā pacchā vicikicchāya paccayo hoti, tasmā vicikicchāpi vicikicchāṭṭhānīyadhammā
tika-s0305t:143_4: veditabbā. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – tiṭṭhanti pavattanti etthāti ṭhānīyā, vicikicchā
tika-s0305t:143_5: eva ṭhānīyā vicikicchāṭṭhānīyā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ārammaṇassapi tattha visesapaccayataṃ
tika-s0305t:143_6: upādāya “kāmacchando vicikicchāti ime dve dhammā ārammaṇena kathitā”ti vuttaṃ. Subhanimittassa
tika-s0305t:143_7: hi paccayabhāvamattaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ, tathāpi yathā “paṭighampi paṭighanimitta”nti
tika-s0305t:143_8: katvā “byāpādo upanissayena kathito”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ subhampi subhanimittanti katvā
tika-s0305t:143_9: kāmacchando upanissayena kathitoti sakkā viññātuṃ. Sesā thinamiddhauddhaccakukkuccāni.
tika-s0305t:143_10: Tattha thinamiddhaṃ aññamaññaṃ sahajātādivasena paccayo, tathā uddhaccakukkuccanti.
tika-s0305t:143_11: Ubhayesampi upanissayakoṭiyā paccayabhāve vattabbameva natthīti āha “sahajātena ca upanissayena cā”ti.
tika-s0305t:144_0: Yasmā sati nāma “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anussaraṇavasena
tika-s0305t:144_1: vattati, tasmā te dhammā satisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā nāma. Lokuttaradhamme ca anussavādivasena
tika-s0305t:145_0: Kosallaṃ vuccati paññā, tato uppannā kosallasambhūtā. Anavajjasukhavipākāti anavajjā
tika-s0305t:145_1: hutvā sukhavipākā vipaccanakā. Padadvayena paccayato sabhāvato kiccato phalato kusaladhammaṃ
tika-s0305t:145_2: dasseti. Akusalaniddesepi eseva nayo. Sāvajjāti gārayhā. Anavajjāti agārayhā. Hīnā
tika-s0305t:145_3: lāmakā. Paṇītā seṭṭhā. Kaṇhā kāḷakā asuddhā. Sukkā odātā suddhā. Paṭibhāga-saddo
tika-s0305t:145_4: paṭhame vikappe sadisakoṭṭhāsattho, dutiye paṭipakkhakoṭṭhāsattho, tatiye niggahetabbapaṭipakkhakoṭṭhāsattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0305t:146_0: Kusalakiriyāya ādikammabhāvena pavattavīriyaṃ dhitisabhāvatāya dhātūti vuttanti āha
tika-s0305t:146_2: paṭipakkhaṃ vidhamatīti āha – “nikkamadhātūti kosajjato nikkhantattā tato balavatara”nti.
tika-s0305t:146_4: hotīti āha – “parakkamadhātūti paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanatāya tatopi balavatara”nti.
tika-s0305t:147_0: Tiṭṭhati pavattati etthāti ṭhānīyā. Ārammaṇadhammā, pītisambojjhaṅgassa ṭhānīyāti
tika-s0305t:147_2: pītipi tathā vattabbataṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ visuddhimagge “pītiyā eva taṃ nāma”nti.
tika-s0305t:147_3: Darathapassaddhīti daratho kilesapariḷāho, so passambhati etāyāti darathapassaddhi,
tika-s0305t:147_4: kāyapassaddhiyā vedanādikhandhattayassa viya rūpakāyassapi passambhanaṃ hoti, cittapassaddhiyā
tika-s0305t:147_5: cittasseva passambhanaṃ, tato evettha bhagavatā lahutādīnaṃ viya duvidhatā vuttā.
tika-s0305t:147_6: Tathā samāhitākāraṃ sallakkhetvā gayhamāno samathova samathanimittaṃ, tassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ
tika-s0305t:147_7: paṭibhāganimittampi. Vividhaṃ aggaṃ etassāti byaggo, vikkhepo. Tathā hi so anavaṭṭhānaraso
tika-s0305t:147_8: bhantatāpaccupaṭṭhāno vutto. Ekaggabhāvato byaggapaṭipakkhoti abyaggo, samādhi, so
tika-s0305t:147_9: eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ. Tenāha “tasseva vevacana”nti.
tika-s0305t:148_0: Yo ārammaṇe iṭṭhāniṭṭhākāraṃ anādiyitvā gahetabbo majjhattākāro, yo ca pubbe upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0305t:148_1: bhāvanāvasena uppanno majjhattākāro, duvidhopi so upekkhāya ārammaṇadhammoti adhippetoti
tika-s0305t:148_2: āha – “atthato pana majjhattākāro upekkhāṭṭhānīyā dhammāti veditabbo”ti. Ārammaṇena
tika-s0305t:148_3: kathitā ārammaṇasseva tesaṃ visesapaccayabhāvato. Sesāti vīriyādayo cattāro dhammā.
tika-s0305t:151_0: 184. Khīṇāsavassa lokuttaraṃ sīlaṃ nāma maggaphalapariyāpannā sammāvācākammantājīvā
tika-s0305t:151_1: sīlalakkhaṇappattā tadaññe cetanādayo. Lokiyaṃ pana kiriyābyākatacittapariyāpannaṃ
tika-s0305t:151_2: cārittasīlaṃ, vārittasīlassa pana sambhavo eva natthi viramaṇavasena pavattiyā abhāvato.
tika-s0305t:152_0: Cakkhudassananti cakkhūhi dassanaṃ. Lakkhaṇassa dassananti sabhāvadhammānaṃ saṅkhatānaṃ
tika-s0305t:152_2: Pajahantopi hi te pahātabbākārato passati nāma. Nibbānassa tathalakkhaṇaṃ maggaphalehi
tika-s0305t:152_3: dassanaṃ, taṃ pana paṭivijjhanaṃ. Jhānena pathavīkasiṇādīnaṃ, abhiññāhi rūpānaṃ dassanampi
tika-s0305t:152_4: ñāṇadassanameva. Cakkhudassanaṃ adhippetaṃ savanapayirupāsanānaṃ parato gahitattā.
tika-s0305t:153_0: Ariyānaṃ anussati nāma guṇavasena, tatthāpi laddhaovādāvajjanamukhena yathābhūtasīlādiguṇānussaraṇanti
tika-s0305t:153_1: dassetuṃ “jhānavipassanā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aññesaṃyeva santiketi ariyehi aññesaṃ sāsanikānaṃyeva
tika-s0305t:153_2: santike. Tenāha – “anupabbajjā nāmā”ti. Aññesūti sāsanikehi aññesu tāpasaparibbājakādīsu.
tika-s0305t:153_3: Tattha hi pabbajjā ariyānaṃ anupabbajjā nāma na hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:154_0: Satasahassamattā ahesuṃ samantapāsādikattā mahātherassa. Laṅkādīpeti nissayasīsena
tika-s0305t:154_1: nissitasallakkhaṇaṃ. Na hi pabbajjā dīpapaṭiladdhā, atha kho dīpanivāsiācariyapaṭiladdhā.
tika-s0305t:154_2: Mahinda…pe… pabbajanti nāma tassa parivāratāya pabbajjāyāti.
tika-s0305t:155_0: Saratīti taṃ ovādānusāsanidhammaṃ cinteti citte karoti. Vitakkāhataṃ karotīti punappunaṃ
tika-s0305t:155_1: parivitakkanena tadatthaṃ vitakkanipphāditaṃ karoti. Āraddho hotīti sampādito hoti.
tika-s0305t:155_2: Taṃ pana sampādanaṃ pāripūri evāti āha “paripuṇṇo hotī”ti. Tatthāti yathāvutte dhamme.
tika-s0305t:155_3: Ñāṇacāravasenāti ñāṇassa pavattanavasena. Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānanti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ovādadhamme
tika-s0305t:155_4: āgatānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ. Lakkhaṇanti visesalakkhaṇaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇañca. Pavicinatīti
tika-s0305t:155_5: “idaṃ rūpaṃ ettakaṃ rūpa”ntiādinā vicayaṃ āpajjati. Ñāṇañca ropetīti “aniccaṃ calaṃ
tika-s0305t:155_6: palokaṃ pabhaṅgū”tiādinā ñāṇaṃ pavatteti. Vīmaṃsanaṃ…pe… āpajjatīti rūpasattakārūpasattakakkamena
tika-s0305t:155_7: vipassanaṃ paccakkhato viya aniccatādīnaṃ dassanaṃ sammasanaṃ āpajjati.
tika-s0305t:156_0: Ubhayampetanti phalānisaṃsāti vuttadvayaṃ. Atthato ekaṃ pariyāyasaddattā. Paṭikaccāti
tika-s0305t:156_1: pageva. Maraṇakāleti maraṇakālasamīpe. Samīpatthe hi idaṃ bhummanti āha “maraṇassa āsannakāle”ti.
tika-s0305t:157_0: So tividho hoti ñāṇassa tikkhamajjhamudubhāvena. Tenāha “kappasahassāyukesū”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:157_1: Upahaccaparinibbāyī nāma āyuvemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā parinibbāyanato. Yattha katthacīti
tika-s0305t:157_2: avihādīsu yattha katthaci. Sappayogenāti vipassanāñāṇasaṅkhārasaṅkhātena payogena,
tika-s0305t:157_3: saha vipassanāpayogenāti attho. Suddhāvāsabhūmiyaṃ uddhaṃyeva maggasoto etassāti
tika-s0305t:158_0: Avihādīsu vattamānopi ekaṃsato uddhaṃgamanāraho puggalo akaniṭṭhagāmī eva nāmāti
tika-s0305t:158_1: vuttaṃ “eko uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañca hontī”ti. Tesanti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:158_2: Uddhaṃsotabhāvato yadipi heṭṭhimādīsupi ariyabhūmi nibbattateva, tathāpi tattha bhūmīsu
tika-s0305t:158_3: āyuṃ aggahetvā akaniṭṭhabhave āyuvaseneva soḷasakappasahassāyukatā daṭṭhabbā. “Satta
tika-s0305t:158_4: phalā sattānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā”ti vuttattā “arahattamaggassa pubbabhāgavipassanā bojjhaṅgā
tika-s0305t:158_5: kathitā”ti vuttaṃ. Sattannampi sahabhāvo labbhatīti “apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikā”ti
tika-s0305t:158_6: vuttaṃ. Tayidaṃ pāḷiyaṃ tattha tattha “tasmiṃ samaye”ti āgatavacanena viññāyati,
tika-s0305t:161_0: 185. “Satisambojjhaṅgo”ti evaṃ ce mayhaṃ hotīti satisambojjhaṅgo nāma seṭṭho uttamo
tika-s0305t:161_1: pavaro, tasmāhaṃ satisambojjhaṅgasīsena phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā viharissāmīti evaṃ
tika-s0305t:161_2: ce mayhaṃ pubbabhāge hotīti attho. “Appamāṇo”ti evaṃ mayhaṃ hotīti svāyaṃ satisambojjhaṅgo,
tika-s0305t:161_3: sabbaso pamāṇakarakilesābhāvato appamāṇadhammārammaṇato ca appamāṇoti evaṃ mayhaṃ
tika-s0305t:161_4: antosamāpattiyaṃ asammohavasena hoti. Suparipuṇṇoti bhāvanāpāripūriyā suṭṭhu paripuṇṇoti
tika-s0305t:161_5: evaṃ mayhaṃ antosamāpattiyaṃ asammohavasena hotīti. Tiṭṭhatīti yathākālaparicchedasamāpattiyā
tika-s0305t:161_6: avaṭṭhānena tappariyāpannatāya satisambojjhaṅgo tiṭṭhati paṭibandhavasena. Uppādaṃ
tika-s0305t:161_7: anāvajjitattāti uppādassa anāvajjanena asamannāhārena. Uppādasīsena cettha uppādavantova
tika-s0305t:161_8: saṅkhārā gahitā. Anuppādanti nibbānaṃ uppādābhāvato uppādavantehi ca vinissaṭattā.
tika-s0305t:161_9: Pavattanti vipākappavattaṃ. Appavattanti nibbānaṃ tappaṭikkhepato. Nimittanti sabbasaṅkhāranimittaṃ.
tika-s0305t:161_10: Animittanti nibbānaṃ. Saṅkhāreti uppādādianāmasanena kevalameva saṅkhāragahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0305t:161_11: Visaṅkhāranti nibbānaṃ. Āvajjitattā āvajjitakālato paṭṭhāya ārabbha pavattiyā satisambojjhaṅgo
tika-s0305t:161_12: tiṭṭhati. Aṭṭhahākārehīti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi. Jānātīti samāpattito vuṭṭhitakāle pajānāti.
tika-s0305t:161_13: Aṭṭhahākārehīti uppādāvajjanādīhi ceva anuppādāvajjanādīhi ca vuttākāraviparītehi
tika-s0305t:161_14: aṭṭhahi ākārehi cavantaṃ samāpattivasena anavaṭṭhānatopi gacchantaṃ cavatīti thero pajānātīti.
tika-s0305t:162_0: Phalabojjhaṅgāti phalasamāpattipariyāpannā bojjhaṅgā. Kiṃ pana te visuṃ visuṃ pavattantīti
tika-s0305t:162_1: āha “yadā hī”tiādi. Sīsaṃ katvāti padhānaṃ seṭṭhaṃ katvā. Tadanvayāti tadanugatā
tika-s0305t:162_2: satisambojjhaṅgaṃ anugacchanakā. Tañca kho tathā katvā dhammaṃ paccavekkhaṇavasena.
tika-s0305t:165_0: 186. Bodhāyāti ettha bodho nāma bujjhanaṃ, taṃ pana kissa kenāti pucchanto “kiṃ bujjhanatthāyā”ti
tika-s0305t:165_1: vatvā taṃ dassento “maggenā”tiādimāha. Maggena nibbānaṃ bujjhanatthāya saṃvattanti,
tika-s0305t:165_2: paccavekkhaṇāya katakiccataṃ bujjhanatthāya saṃvattanti, paṭhamavikappe sacchikiriyābhisamayo
tika-s0305t:165_3: eva dassitoti tena atuṭṭhe “maggena vā”ti dutiyavikappamāha. Vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitanti
tika-s0305t:165_4: padehi sabbaṃ maggakiccaṃ tassa phalañca dassitaṃ. Nirodhanissitanti iminā nibbānasacchikiriyā.
tika-s0305t:165_5: Kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccatītiādinā kilesappahānaṃ. Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ
tika-s0305t:168_0: 187-188. Nibaddhavāsavasena ārāme nisīdanasīloti ārāmanisādī. Parisaṃ ogāḷho hutvā
tika-s0305t:168_1: caratīti parisāvacaroti āha – “yo panā”tiādi. Evanti iminākārena. Gahaṇanti niggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0305t:168_2: Tena pucchāpadassa atthaṃ vivarati. Nibbeṭhananti niggahanibbeṭhanaṃ. Tena vissajjanapadassa
tika-s0305t:168_3: atthaṃ vivarati. Iminā nayenāti etena “itivādo”ti ettha iti-saddassa atthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0305t:168_4: Upārambhādhippāyo vadati etenāti vādo, doso. Itivādo hotīti evaṃ imassa upari vādāropanaṃ
tika-s0305t:168_5: hoti. Itivādappamokkhoti evaṃ tato pamokkho hoti. Evaṃ vādappamokkhānisaṃsaṃ parehi
tika-s0305t:168_6: āropitadosassa nibbeṭhanavasena dassetvā idāni dosapavedanavasena dassetuṃ “ayaṃ
tika-s0305t:169_0: Ettakaṃ ṭhānantiādito paṭṭhāya yāva “tīṇi sucaritānī”ti ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ. Imaṃ desananti
tika-s0305t:169_1: “indriyasaṃvaro kho”tiādinayappavattaṃ imaṃ desanaṃ. Nābhijjhāyatīti na abhijjhāyati.
tika-s0305t:169_2: Nābhihaṃsatīti na abhitussati. Gocarajjhatte ṭhitaṃ hotīti kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe samādhānavasena
tika-s0305t:169_3: ṭhitaṃ hoti avaṭṭhitaṃ. Tenāha “susaṇṭhita”nti. Susaṇṭhitanti sammā avikkhepavasena
tika-s0305t:169_5: vimuttiyā. Suṭṭhu vimuttanti suvimuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ amanāparūpadassane na maṅku vilakkho
tika-s0305t:169_6: na hoti. Kilesavasena dosavasena. Aṭṭhitacitto athaddhacitto. Kovesena hi cittaṃ
tika-s0305t:169_7: thaddhaṃ hoti, na mudukaṃ. Adīnamānasoti domanassavasena yo dīnabhāvo, tadabhāvena
tika-s0305t:170_0: Imesu chasu dvāresu aṭṭhārasa duccaritāni honti paccekaṃ kāyavacīmanoduccaritabhedena.
tika-s0305t:170_1: Tāni vibhāgena dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagateti nayadānamattametaṃ.
tika-s0305t:170_2: Tena “aniṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate dosaṃ uppādentassā”tiādinā tividhaduccaritaṃ nīharitvā
tika-s0305t:170_3: vattabbaṃ, tathā “majjhattārammaṇe mohaṃ uppādentassā”tiādinā ca. Manoduccaritādisāmaññena
tika-s0305t:171_0: Paññattivasenāti vatthuṃ anāmasitvā piṇḍagahaṇamukhena kevalaṃ paññattivaseneva.
tika-s0305t:171_1: Bhāvanāpaṭisaṅkhāneti bhāvanāsiddhe paṭisaṅkhāne, bhāvanāya paṭisaṅkhāne vāti attho.
tika-s0305t:171_2: Imānīti yathāvuttāni chadvārārammaṇāni. Duccaritānīti duccaritakāraṇāni. Appaṭisaṅkhāne
tika-s0305t:171_3: ṭhitassa duccaritāni sucaritāni katvā. Pariṇāmetīti parivatteti duccaritāni tattha
tika-s0305t:171_4: anuppādetvā sucaritāni uppādento. Evanti vuttappakārena. Indriyasaṃvaro…pe… veditabbo
tika-s0305t:171_6: Ettāvatāti ādito paṭṭhāya yāva “tīṇi sucaritāni paripūrentī”ti padaṃ, ettāvatā. Sīlānurakkhakaṃ
tika-s0305t:171_8: Kathaṃ pana tadeva tassa anurakkhakaṃ hotīti? Aparāparuppattiyā upanissayabhāvato.
tika-s0305t:172_1: lokiyāpi lokuttarāpi hontīti attho. Sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānanti lokuttarānaṃ sattannaṃ
tika-s0305t:172_2: bojjhaṅgānaṃ. Mūlabhūtā satipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāgā, te sandhāya vuttaṃ “cattāro kho,
tika-s0305t:172_3: kuṇḍaliya, satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī”ti. Tepīti
tika-s0305t:172_5: Pubbabhāgāvāti ettha keci “pubbabhāgā cā”ti pāṭhaṃ katvā “pubbeva lokuttarā pubbabhāgā
tika-s0305t:172_6: cā”ti atthaṃ vadanti. Vijjāvimuttimūlakāti “satta kho, kuṇḍaliya, bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā
tika-s0305t:172_7: bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṃ paripūrentī”ti evaṃ vuttā bojjhaṅgā lokuttarāva vijjāvimuttisahagatabhāvato.
tika-s0305t:175_0: 189. Paccattanti karaṇaniddeso ayanti āha – “attanāvā”ti. Kurumānoyevāti uppādento
tika-s0305t:175_1: eva. Kammaṭṭhānavimuttiyā suṭṭhu vimuttanti kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvato
tika-s0305t:175_2: tehi suṭṭhu vimuttaṃ. Atthaṃ karitvāti bhāvanāmanasikāraṃ uttamaṃ katvā. “Mahā vata
tika-s0305t:175_3: me ayaṃ attho uppanno”ti atthiko hutvā.
tika-s0305t:177: 190. Tathāgatassa pātubhāvātiādinā buddhuppādakāle eva bojjhaṅgaratanapaṭilābhoti dasseti.
tika-s0305t:181_0: 192-194. Yesanti yesaṃ sattānaṃ. Cattāro iriyāpathā atthi labbhanti tadupagasarīrāvayavalābhena.
tika-s0305t:181_2: “sahavipassanake maggabojjhaṅge”icceva vuttaṃ. Dutiyatatiyāni uttānatthāneva heṭṭhā vuttanayattā.
tika-s0305t:183_1: …pe… vinivattitvā gato”ti. Eseva nayo pāḷito atthato ca catutthena pañcamachaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0305t:183_3: muduko sītajaro. Sesanti vuttāvasesaṃ. Sabbatthāti sattamādīsu catūsu.
tika-s0305t:187_0: 202-203. Kittakena nu kho kāraṇena bujjhanakaaṅgā nāma vuccanti bujjhanakassa puggalassa
tika-s0305t:187_1: aṅgāti vattabbataṃ labhanti. Missakabojjhaṅgā kathitā sahavipassanā maggabojjhaṅgā
tika-s0305t:187_2: kathitāti katvā. Dhammaparicchedo kathito gaṇanāmattena paricchinditvā vuttattā na
tika-s0305t:189_2: etena na kevalaṃ ārammaṇavaseneva, atha kho upanissayavasenapettha attho labbhatīti
tika-s0305t:189_3: dasseti. Paṭhamavaggassa hi dutiye sutte upanissayavaseneva attho dassito. Missakabojjhaṅgā
tika-s0305t:189_4: kathitā avibhāgeneva kathitattā. Aparihāniyeti tīhi sikkhāhi aparihānāvahe.
tika-s0305t:191_0: 207-208. “So maṃ pucchissatī”ti adhippāyena bhagavatā osāpitadesanaṃ. Patthaṭattā
tika-s0305t:191_1: bhāvanāpāripūriyā vitthāritaṃ gatattā. Mahantabhāvanti bhāvanāvaseneva mahattaṃ gatattā.
tika-s0305t:191_2: Tato eva vaḍḍhippamāṇā. Nīvaraṇavigame sambhavato paccayato byāpādo vigato hotīti
tika-s0305t:191_4: Yañhi taṇhāsahagataṃ asahagatampi taṇhaṃ upanissāya nipphannaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ taṇhāmūlakaṃ.
tika-s0305t:191_5: Pahīyati anuppādappahānena. Taṇhādīnaṃyeva khayā, na tesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khayā. Etehi
tika-s0305t:193_1: nibbedhabhāge gato nibbedhabhāgiyo, taṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ. Tenāha “nibbijjhanakoṭṭhāsiya”nti.
tika-s0305t:193_2: Bhāvetvā ṭhitena cittena. Vipassanāmaggampi gahetvā “maggabojjhaṅgā missakā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0305t:193_3: Tehīti bojjhaṅgehi bhāvitaṃ cittaṃ. Te vā bojjhaṅge bhāvetvā ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ nāma phalacittaṃ,
tika-s0305t:193_4: tasmā nibbattitalokuttarameva. Tampīti phalacittampi maggānantaratāya magganissitaṃ
tika-s0305t:193_5: katvā missakameva kathetuṃ vaṭṭati “bodhāya saṃvattantī”ti vuttattā.
tika-s0305t:195: 210. Saṃyojanasaṅkhātā vinibandhāti kāmarāgādisaṃyojanasaññitā bandhanā. Pariniṭṭhapetvā gahaṇāti gilitvā viya pariniṭṭhapetvā gahaṇākārā.
tika-s0305t:197_0: 211. Bahukataṃ vuccati bahukāro bahumāno, natthi etassa bahukatanti abahukato, akatabahumāno.
tika-s0305t:197_1: Dhammo uppajjamāno ukkujjanto viya nirujjhamāno avakujjanto viya hotīti vuttaṃ “ukkujjaṃ
tika-s0305t:197_2: vuccati udayo, avakujjaṃ vayo”ti. Parivattentoti aniccātipi dukkhātipi anattātipi.
tika-s0305t:197_3: “Eso hi te udāyi maggo paṭiladdho, yo te…pe… tathattāya upanessatī”ti pariyosāne
tika-s0305t:197_4: bhagavato vacanañcettha sādhakaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tena tenākārena viharantanti yena sammasanākārena
tika-s0305t:201_0: 214-215. Na ca pabhāvantanti na ca pabhāsampannaṃ. Pabhijjanasabhāvanti tāpetvā tālane
tika-s0305t:201_1: pabhaṅgutaṃ. Avasesaṃ lohanti vuttāvasesaṃ jātilohaṃ, vijātilohaṃ, kittimalohanti
tika-s0305t:201_2: pabhedaṃ sabbampi lohaṃ. Uppajjituṃ appadānenāti ettha nanu lokiyakusalacittassapi
tika-s0305t:201_3: suvisuddhassa uppajjituṃ appadānena upakkilesatāti? Saccametaṃ, yasmiṃ pana santāne
tika-s0305t:201_4: nīvaraṇāni laddhapatiṭṭhāni, tattha mahaggatakusalassapi asambhavo, pageva lokuttarakusalassa,
tika-s0305t:201_5: parittakusalaṃ pana yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjati. Nīvaraṇe hi vūpasante santāne uppattiyā
tika-s0305t:201_7: dīpo viya, apica nippariyāyato uppajjituṃ appadāneneva tesaṃ upakkilesatāti dassento
tika-s0305t:201_9: Na āvarantīti kusaladhamme uppajjituṃ appadānavasena na āvaranti, atha kho tesaṃ
tika-s0305t:201_10: uppattiyā honti. Na paṭicchādentīti na vinandhanti. Catubhūmakacittassāti catutthabhūmakakusalacittassa
tika-s0305t:203: 219. Paññā dubbalā hoti, na balavatī paṭipakkhena upakkiliṭṭhabhāvato. Tenāha “mandā avisadā”ti.
tika-s0305t:204_0: Pañca nīvaraṇā dūre honti āvaraṇābhāvato. Tameva pītinti sappāyadhammasavane uppannaṃ
tika-s0305t:204_1: pītiṃ. Tassā tadā uppannākārasallakkhaṇena avijahanto punappunaṃ tassā nibbattanena.
tika-s0305t:204_2: Tenāha “pañca nīvaraṇe vikkhambhetvā”ti. Idaṃ sandhāyāti ettake divasepi na vinassanti,
tika-s0305t:204_3: sā dhammapīti laddhapaccayā hutvā visesāvahāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya etaṃ “imassa pañca
tika-s0305t:204_4: nīvaraṇā tasmiṃ samaye na hontī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pītipāmojjapakkhiyāti pītipāmojjapaccayā.
tika-s0305t:204_5: Nassantīti nirodhapaccayavasena pavattanato nassanti. Sabhāgapaccayavasena puna uppajjantāpi…pe…
tika-s0305t:206: 220. Abhiruhanakāti samīparukkhe abhibhavitvā ruhanakā. Aṭṭhikacchakoti aṭṭhibahulakacchako. Kapithanasadisaphalattā kapitthanoti laddhanāmo.
tika-s0305t:208_0: 221. Andhabhāvakaraṇā paññācakkhussa vibandhanato. Tathā hi te “acakkhukaraṇā paññānirodhikā”ti
tika-s0305t:208_1: vuttā. Vihanati vibādhatīti vighāto, dukkhanti āha “vighātapakkhiyāti dukkhapakkhikā”ti.
tika-s0305t:208_2: Nibbānatthāya na saṃvattantīti anibbānasaṃvattanikā. Missakabojjhaṅgāva kathitā pubbabhāgikānaṃ kathitattā.
tika-s0305t:212: 222. Vidhīyantīti vidhā, mānādibhāgā koṭṭhāsāti āha “tayo mānakoṭṭhāsā”ti. Tathā tathā vidahanatoti “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā tena tenākārena vidahanato ṭhapanato, ṭhapetabbato vā.
tika-s0305t:214_1: catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi. Rañjetīti rameti. Abbhuggatāyāti udīritā nibbattito tattha
tika-s0305t:214_2: tattha gacchanato. Cakkaṃ vattetīti cakkaratanaṃ pavatteti. Devaṭṭhānanti pūjanīyadevaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:214_4: Aññehi cakkavattino pariggahabhūtaratanehi. Loketi manussaloke. Tena tadaññalokaṃ
tika-s0305t:214_5: nivatteti. Vijjamānaggahaṇena atītānāgataṃ nivatteti. Buddhā ca kadāci karahaci uppajjanti
tika-s0305t:214_6: cakkavattinopi yebhuyyena tasmiṃyeva uppajjanatoti adhippāyo. Anomassāti alāmakassa
tika-s0305t:215_0: Tatrāti vākyopaññāsane nipāto, tasmiṃ pātubhāvavacane. “Ayutta”nti vatvā tattha adhippāyaṃ
tika-s0305t:215_1: vivaranto “uppannaṃ hī”tiādimāha. Tehi ratanehi cakkavattananiyamāpekkhatāya cakkavattivacanassa.
tika-s0305t:215_2: Niyamenāti ekantena. Vattabbataṃ āpajjati bhāvini bhūte viya upacāroti yathā – “agamā
tika-s0305t:215_3: rājagahaṃ buddho”ti. Laddhanāmassāti cakkavattīti loke laddhasamaññassa patthanīyassa
tika-s0305t:215_5: vacanatopi. Idāni tamatthaṃ vivaranto “yo hī”tiādimāha. Yo hi cakkavattirājā, tassa
tika-s0305t:215_6: uppattiyā cakkaratanassa uppajjanato cakkavattīti evaṃ nāmaṃ uppajjati. “Cakkaṃ vattessatī”ti
tika-s0305t:215_7: idaṃ pana niyāmaṃ anapekkhitvā tassa uppajjatīti ratanānuppattiṃ gahetvā vuttanayato
tika-s0305t:215_8: saññā uppajjati “cakkavattī”ti. Ekamevāti cakkaratanameva paṭhamaṃ pātubhavati. Yasmiṃ
tika-s0305t:215_9: bhūte rañño cakkavattisamaññā, atha pacchā ratanāni pātubhavantīti bahūnaṃ pātubhāvaṃ
tika-s0305t:215_10: upādāya bahulavacanatopi etaṃ “cakkavattissa pātubhāvā ratanānaṃ pātubhāvo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:215_11: Ayaṃ hetukattusaññito atthabhedo. Pātubhāvāti pātubhāvato. Puññasambhāro bhinnasantānatāya
tika-s0305t:215_12: ratanānampi pariyāyena upanissayahetūti vuttaṃ. Yuttamevetaṃ yathāvuttayuttiyuttattā.
tika-s0305t:216_0: Vattabbabhūto adhippāyo etassa atthīti adhippāyo, atthaniddeso, saṅkhepato adhippāyo
tika-s0305t:216_2: vuttaṃ. Yojanappamāṇe padese pavattattā yojanappamāṇaṃ andhakāraṃ. Atidīghātirassatādiṃ
tika-s0305t:217_0: Sabbesaṃ catubhūmakadhammānaṃ purecaraṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesanavasena
tika-s0305t:217_1: pavattanato. Buddhādīhipi appahānīyatāya mahantadhammasabhāvattā dhammakāye ca jeṭṭhakaṭṭhena
tika-s0305t:217_2: dhammakāyūpapannaṃ. Paññāpāsādatāya cassa uparigataṭṭhena accuggataṃ. Vitthataṭṭhena
tika-s0305t:217_3: vipulaṃ. Mahantatāya mahantaṃ. Anādikālabhāvitassa kilesasantānassa khaṇeneva viddhaṃsanato
tika-s0305t:217_4: sīghaṃ lahu javanti pariyāyā. Bojjhaṅgadhammapariyāpannattā hi vuttaṃ “ekanta-kusalattā”ti.
tika-s0305t:219: 225-231. Eḷaṃ vuccati doso, eḷena mūgo viyāti eḷamūgoti imamatthaṃ dassento “mukhena vāca”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:223_1: idāni vuccamānākārena. Sati ca sampajaññañca satisampajaññaṃ. Satipadhānaṃ vā abhikkantādīsu
tika-s0305t:223_3: satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattati. Yathā ca paccanīkadhammappahānaṃ anurūpadhammadesanā
tika-s0305t:223_4: ca anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya hoti, evaṃ satirahitapuggalavajjanā
tika-s0305t:223_5: satokārīpuggalasevanā ca tattha ca yuttapayuttatā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti
tika-s0305t:224_0: Dhammānaṃ, dhammesu vā vicayo, so eva heṭṭhā vuttanayena sambojjhaṅgo, tassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa.
tika-s0305t:224_1: Paripucchakatāti ācariyaṃ payirupāsitvā pañcapi nikāye sahaṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā
tika-s0305t:224_2: yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, tassa tassa “idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ imassa ko attho”ti
tika-s0305t:225_1: ca cīvarādīni idha “vatthūnī”ti adhippetāni, tāni yathā cittassa sukhāvahāni honti,
tika-s0305t:225_2: tathā karaṇaṃ tesaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “ajjhattikabāhirāna”ntiādi. Ussannadosanti
tika-s0305t:225_3: vātādiussannadosaṃ. Sedamalamakkhitanti sedena ceva jallikāsaṅkhātena sarīramalena
tika-s0305t:225_4: ca makkhitaṃ. Ca-saddena aññampi sarīrassa ca cittassa ca pīḷāvahaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Senāsanaṃ
tika-s0305t:225_5: vāti vā-saddena pattādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Avisade sati, visayabhūte vā. Kathaṃ
tika-s0305t:225_6: bhāvanamanuyuttassa tāni visayoti? Antarantarā pavattanakacittuppādavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:225_7: Te hi cittuppādā cittekaggatāya ijjhantiyāpi aparisuddhabhāvāya saṃvattanti. Cittacetasikesu
tika-s0305t:225_8: nissayādipaccayabhūtesu. Ñāṇampīti pi-saddo sampiṇḍane. Tena na kevalaṃ taṃ vatthuyeva,
tika-s0305t:225_9: atha kho tasmiṃ aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hotīti nissayāparisuddhiyā nissitāparisuddhi
tika-s0305t:225_10: viya visayassa aparisuddhatāya visayīnaṃ aparisuddhiṃ dasseti anvayato byatirekato ca.
tika-s0305t:226_1: adhimokkhakiccassa paṭutarabhāvena paññāya avisadatāya vīriyādīnañca anubalappadānasithilatādinā
tika-s0305t:226_2: saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti. Tenāha “itarāni mandānī”ti. Tatoti tasmā saddhindriyassa
tika-s0305t:226_3: balavabhāvato itaresañca mandattā. Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0305t:226_4: paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho, paggahakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:226_5: Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, anissajjanaṃ vā upaṭṭhānaṃ, vikkhepapaṭipakkho. Yena
tika-s0305t:226_6: vā sampayuttā avikkhittā honti, so avikkhepo. Rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato
tika-s0305t:226_7: visayasabhāvaṃ passati, taṃ dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti balavatā saddhindriyena
tika-s0305t:226_8: abhibhūtattā. Sahajātadhammesu hi indaṭṭhaṃ karontānaṃ saha pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0305t:226_9: ekarasatāvaseneva atthasiddhi, na aññathā. Tasmāti vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati.
tika-s0305t:227_1: sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tassa paccayapaccayuppannatādivibhāgato
tika-s0305t:227_2: yāthāvato vīmaṃsanena. Evañhi evaṃdhammatānayena sabhāvasarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro
tika-s0305t:227_3: adhimokkho na hoti – “ayaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvo”ti paññābyāpārassa sātisayattā.
tika-s0305t:227_4: Dhuriyadhammesu hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti, evaṃ paññāya
tika-s0305t:227_5: balavabhāve saddhāya mandabhāvo hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena…pe…
tika-s0305t:227_6: hāpetabba”nti. Tathā amanasikaraṇenāti yenākārena bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ
tika-s0305t:227_7: balavaṃ jātaṃ, tenākārena bhāvanaṃ nānuyuñjanenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Idha duvidhena saddhindriyassa
tika-s0305t:227_8: balavabhāvo attano vā paccayavisesena kiccuttariyato vīriyādīnaṃ vā mandakiccatāya.
tika-s0305t:227_9: Tattha paṭhamavikappe hāpanavidhi dassito, dutiyavikappe pana yathā manasikaroto
tika-s0305t:227_10: vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tathā amanasikārena vīriyādīnaṃ
tika-s0305t:227_11: paṭutarabhāvāvahena manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi samataṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:228_0: Vakkalittheravatthūti so hi āyasmā saddhādhimutto tattha ca katādhikāro satthu rūpakāyadassane
tika-s0305t:228_1: pasuto eva hutvā viharanto satthārā – “kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena,
tika-s0305t:228_2: yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī”tiādinā ovadiyamāno kammaṭṭhāne
tika-s0305t:228_3: niyojitopi taṃ ananuyuñjanto paṇāmito attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi.
tika-s0305t:228_4: Atha naṃ satthā yathānisinnova obhāsavissajjanena attānaṃ dassetvā –
tika-s0305t:231_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā “ehi, vakkalī”ti āha. So tena vacanena amateneva abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho
tika-s0305t:231_1: hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, saddhāya bahulabhāvato vipassanāvīthiṃ nārohati. Taṃ
tika-s0305t:231_2: ñatvā bhagavā indriyasamattapaṭipādanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi. So satthārā
tika-s0305t:231_3: dinnanayena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0305t:232_1: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Hāpetabbanti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena
tika-s0305t:232_2: hāyati, evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā passaddhiyādibhāvanāya hāyati samādhipakkhikattā
tika-s0305t:232_3: tassā. Tathā hi samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā
tika-s0305t:232_4: viya vīriyindriyassa adhimattataṃ uddhaccapātato rakkhantī ekaṃsato hāpeti. Tena
tika-s0305t:232_6: vatthu. So hi āyasmāpi satthu santikā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto – “mama
tika-s0305t:232_7: sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ, na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ, kāyaṃ kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo
tika-s0305t:232_8: kātabbo”ti ṭhānacaṅkamanameva adhiṭṭhāya padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi
tika-s0305t:232_9: vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhavīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ pavattetuṃ
tika-s0305t:232_10: nāsakkhi. Satthā tattha gantvā vīṇopamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento
tika-s0305t:232_11: kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato. Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ
tika-s0305t:232_12: yājetvā bhāvento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatteva patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “soṇattherassa
tika-s0305t:233_0: Samatanti saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anūnādhikabhāvaṃ, tathā samādhivīriyānañca. Yathā
tika-s0305t:233_1: hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññanātivattanaṃ
tika-s0305t:233_2: visesato icchitabbaṃ. Yato tesaṃ samadhuratāya appanā sampajjati, evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ
tika-s0305t:233_4: antadvayapātābhāvena sammadeva appanā ijjhatīti. Balavasaddhotiādi vuttasseva atthassa
tika-s0305t:233_5: byatirekamukhena samatthanaṃ. Tassattho – yo balavatiyā saddhāya samannāgato avisadañāṇo,
tika-s0305t:233_6: so mudhappasanno hoti, na aveccappasanno. Tathā hi so avatthusmiṃ pasīdati, seyyathāpi
tika-s0305t:233_7: titthiyasāvakā. Kerāṭikapakkhanti sāṭheyyapakkhaṃ bhajati. Saddhāhīnāya paññāya atidhāvanto
tika-s0305t:233_8: “deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hotī”tiādīni parikappeti
tika-s0305t:233_9: hetupatirūpakehi vañcito, evaṃbhūto ca lūkhatakkaviluttacitto paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-s0305t:233_10: nādiyati, saññattiṃ na gacchati. Tenāha “bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya rogo atekiccho hotī”ti.
tika-s0305t:233_11: Yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ samabhāvo atthāvaho, visamabhāvo anatthāvaho,
tika-s0305t:233_12: evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ samabhāvo atthāvaho, itaro anatthāvaho, tathā samabhāvo
tika-s0305t:233_13: avikkhepāvaho, itaro vikkhepāvaho. Kosajjaṃ abhibhavati, tena appanaṃ na pāpuṇātīti
tika-s0305t:233_14: adhippāyo. Esa nayo uddhaccaṃ abhibhavatīti etthāpi. Tadubhayanti saddhāpaññādvayaṃ
tika-s0305t:234_0: Samādhikammikassāti samathakammaṭṭhānikassa. Evanti evaṃ sante, saddhāya thokaṃ balavabhāve
tika-s0305t:234_1: satīti attho. Saddahantoti “pathavī pathavīti manasikāramattena kathaṃ jhānuppattī”ti
tika-s0305t:234_2: acintetvā “addhā sambuddhena vuttavidhi ijjhatī”ti saddahanto saddhaṃ janento. Okappentoti
tika-s0305t:234_3: ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena avakappento pakkhandanto. Ekaggatā
tika-s0305t:234_4: balavatī vaṭṭati samādhipadhānattā jhānassa. Ubhinnanti samādhipaññānaṃ. Samādhikammikassa
tika-s0305t:234_5: samādhino adhimattatāya paññāya adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha “samatāyapī”ti, samabhāvenāpīti
tika-s0305t:234_6: attho. Appanāti lokiyaappanā. Tathā hi “hotiyevā”ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati, lokuttarappanā
tika-s0305t:234_7: pana tesaṃ samabhāveneva icchitā. Yathāha “samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī”ti.
tika-s0305t:234_8: Yadi visesato saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samānataṃ icchati, kathaṃ satīti
tika-s0305t:234_9: āha – “sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭatī”ti. Sabbatthāti līnuddhaccapakkhikesu
tika-s0305t:234_11: pīti ca gahetabbā siyā. Tathā hi “kosajjapakkhikena samādhinā”icceva vuttaṃ, na ca
tika-s0305t:234_12: “passaddhisamādhiupekkhāhī”ti. Sāti sati. Sabbesu rājakammesu niyuttoti sabbakammiko.
tika-s0305t:234_13: Tenāti yena kāraṇena sabbattha icchitabbā, tena āha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Sabbattha niyuttā
tika-s0305t:234_14: sabbatthikā, sabbena vā līnuddhaccapakkhikena bojjhaṅgena atthetabbā sabbatthiyā,
tika-s0305t:234_15: sabbatthiyāva sabbatthikā. Cittanti kusalacittaṃ. Tassa hi satipaṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ
tika-s0305t:235_1: Bahussutasevanā hi sutamayañāṇāvahā. Taruṇavipassanāsamaṅgīpi bhāvanāmayañāṇe ṭhitattā
tika-s0305t:235_2: ekaṃsato paññavā eva nāma hotīti āha – “samapaññāsa…pe… puggalasevanā”ti. Ñeyyadhammassa
tika-s0305t:235_4: khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāyā”ti. Tañhi ñeyyaṃ tādisāya paññāya caritabbato
tika-s0305t:235_5: gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ, tassā vā paññāya tattha pabhedato pavatti gambhīrañāṇacariyā,
tika-s0305t:235_6: tassā paccavekkhaṇāti āha “gambhīrapaññāya pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā”ti. Yathā sativepullappatto
tika-s0305t:235_7: nāma arahā eva, evaṃ so eva paññāvepullappattopīti āha “arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī
tika-s0305t:236_1: nibbattasattassa sabbapaṭhamaṃ karontīti devadūtasuttādīsu, tassā ādito vuttattā
tika-s0305t:236_3: tadaññamanussehi tiracchānehi ca vibādhanīyakālaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Ekaṃ buddhantaranti
tika-s0305t:236_4: idaṃ aparāparaṃ petesu eva uppajjanakasattavasena vuttaṃ, ekaccānaṃ vā petānaṃ, ekaccatiracchānānaṃ
tika-s0305t:236_5: viya tathā dīghāyukatāpi siyāti tathā vuttaṃ. Tathā hi kālo nāgarājā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ rūpadassāvī.
tika-s0305t:237_1: ānisaṃsadassanasīlassa. Gamanavīthinti sapubbabhāgaṃ nibbānagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ. Saha
tika-s0305t:237_2: vipassanāya ariyamaggapaṭipāṭi, sattavisuddhiparamparā vā. Sā hi vaṭṭato niyyānāya
tika-s0305t:238_0: Kāyadaḷhībahuloti kāyassa posanapasuto. Piṇḍanti raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ. Paccayadāyakānaṃ attani
tika-s0305t:238_1: kārassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalabhāvassa karaṇena piṇḍāya bhikkhāya paṭipūjanā
tika-s0305t:238_2: piṇḍāpacāyanā. Nīharantoti pattatthavikato nīharanto. Taṃ saddaṃ sutvāti taṃ upāsikāya
tika-s0305t:238_3: vacanaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre ṭhitova pañcābhiññatāya dibbasotena sutvāti vadanti. Manussasampatti,
tika-s0305t:238_4: dibbasampatti, ante nibbānasampattīti tisso sampattiyo. Sitaṃ karontovāti “akiccheneva
tika-s0305t:238_5: mayā vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkanta”nti paccavekkhaṇāvasāne sañjātapāmojjavasena sitaṃ karonto eva.
tika-s0305t:239_0: Alasānaṃ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ kāyassa posanabahulānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ paribhuñjitvā
tika-s0305t:239_1: seyyasukhādiṃ anuyuñjantānaṃ tiracchānakathikānaṃ dūratova vajjanaṃ kusītapuggalaparivajjanā.
tika-s0305t:240_1: idaṃ dvayaṃ na gahitaṃ, “thinamiddhavinodanatā, sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇā”ti idaṃ
tika-s0305t:240_2: dvayaṃ gahitaṃ. Tattha ānisaṃsadassāvitāya eva sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇā gahitā
tika-s0305t:240_4: tadadhimuttatāya gahitaṃ, vīriyuppādane yuttapayuttassa thinamiddhavinodanaṃ atthato
tika-s0305t:241_0: Buddhānussatiyā upacārasamādhiniṭṭhattā vuttaṃ “yāva upacārā”ti. Sakalasarīraṃ pharamānoti
tika-s0305t:241_1: pītisamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno. Dhammasaṅghaguṇe anussarantassapi
tika-s0305t:241_2: yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti yojanā. Evaṃ sesaanussatīsu
tika-s0305t:241_3: pasādanīyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇāya ca yojetabbaṃ tassāpi vimuttāyatanabhāvena taggatikattā.
tika-s0305t:241_4: Evarūpe kāleti dubbhikkhabhayādīsūti vuttakāle. Samāpattiyā…pe… na samudācarantīti
tika-s0305t:241_5: idaṃ upasamānussatiyā vasena vuttaṃ. Saṅkhārānañhi sappadesavūpasamepi nippadesavūpasame
tika-s0305t:241_6: viya tattha sapaññāya pavattanato bhāvanāmanasikāro kilesavikkhambhanasamattho hutvā
tika-s0305t:241_8: hotīti. Pasādanīyesu ṭhānesu pasādasinehābhāvena saṃsūcitahadayatā lūkhatā. Sā ca
tika-s0305t:242_2: Utuiriyāpathasukhaggahaṇehi sappāyautuiriyāpathaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tañhi tividhampi
tika-s0305t:242_3: sappāyaṃ seviyamānaṃ kāyassa kallatāpādanavasena cittassa kallataṃ āvahantaṃ duvidhāyapi
tika-s0305t:242_4: passaddhiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti. Sattesu labbhamānaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ ahetukanti ayameko anto,
tika-s0305t:242_5: issarādivisamahetukanti ayaṃ dutiyo, ete ubho ante anupagamma yathāsakaṃ kammunā
tika-s0305t:242_6: hotīti ayaṃ majjhimā paṭipatti. Majjhatto payogo yassa so majjhattapayogo, tassa
tika-s0305t:243: Vatthuvisadakiriyā indriyasamattapaṭipādanā ca “paññāvahā”ti vuttā. Samathāvahāpi tā honti samathāvahabhāveneva paññāvahattāti vuttaṃ “vatthuvisada…pe… veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0305t:244_2: ādi-saddena paññāpayogamandataṃ appamādavekallañca saṅgaṇhāti. Tassa paggaṇhananti
tika-s0305t:244_3: tassa līnassa cittassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena layāpattito samuṭṭhāpanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:245_0: “Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0305t:245_1: bhāvanāya, kālo vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya.
tika-s0305t:245_2: Taṃ kissa hetu? Līnaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi susamuṭṭhāpayaṃ hoti.
tika-s0305t:245_3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletukāmo assa, so tattha sukkhāni
tika-s0305t:245_4: ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni gomayāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni kaṭṭhāni pakkhipeyya,
tika-s0305t:245_5: mukhavātañca dadeyya, na ca paṃsukena okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṃ
tika-s0305t:246: Ettha ca yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā, sā anantaraṃ vibhāvitā eva.
tika-s0305t:247_1: Tassa niggaṇhananti tassa uddhatassa cittassa samādhisambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena
tika-s0305t:248_0: “Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0305t:248_1: bhāvanāya, kālo samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya.
tika-s0305t:248_2: Taṃ kissa hetu? Uddhataṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi suvūpasamayaṃ hoti.
tika-s0305t:248_3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetukāmo assa, so tattha
tika-s0305t:248_4: allāni ceva tiṇāni….pe… paṃsukena ca okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ
tika-s0305t:249_0: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti
tika-s0305t:249_1: veditabbā. Tattha passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanā vuttā eva, samādhisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0305t:249_2: vuccamānā, itarassa anantaraṃ vakkhati. Paññāpayogamandatāyāti paññābyāpārassa appabhāvena.
tika-s0305t:249_3: Yathā hi dānaṃ alobhappadhānaṃ, sīlaṃ adosappadhānaṃ, evaṃ bhāvanā amohappadhānā.
tika-s0305t:249_4: Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti, tadā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti,
tika-s0305t:249_5: anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa yogino cittassa abhiruciṃ na uppādeti, tena taṃ
tika-s0305t:249_6: nirassādaṃ hoti. Tathā bhāvanāya sammadeva vīthipaṭipattiyā abhāvena upasamasukhaṃ
tika-s0305t:249_7: na vindati, tenapi cittaṃ nirassādaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “paññāpayoga…pe… nirassādaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0305t:250_0: Tassa saṃveguppādanañca pasāduppādanañca tikicchananti taṃ dassento “aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūnī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:250_1: Tattha jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni yathārahaṃ sugatiyaṃ duggatiyañca hontīti tadaññameva
tika-s0305t:250_3: Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ gahitanti atīte anāgate
tika-s0305t:250_4: ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāniyeva. Ye pana sattā āhārūpajīvino tattha
tika-s0305t:250_5: ca uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino, tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ jīvikadukkhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu
tika-s0305t:250_6: gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati samaye sampahaṃsanāti ayaṃ sampahaṃsitabbasamaye
tika-s0305t:250_7: vuttanayena saṃvegajananavasena ceva pasāduppādanavasena ca sammadeva pahaṃsanā,
tika-s0305t:251: Sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgammāti līnuddhaccavirahena samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ca sammadeva bhāvanāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma.
tika-s0305t:252_0: Alīnantiādīsu kosajjapakkhikānaṃ dhammānaṃ anadhimattatāya alīnaṃ, uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ
tika-s0305t:252_1: anadhimattatāya anuddhataṃ, paññāpayogasampattiyā upasamasukhādhigamena ca anirassādaṃ,
tika-s0305t:252_2: tato eva ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannañca. Tattha alīnatāya paggahe,
tika-s0305t:252_3: anuddhatāya ca niggahe, anirassādatāya sampahaṃsane na byāpāraṃ āpajjati. Alīnānuddhaccatāhi
tika-s0305t:252_4: ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ, anirassādatāya samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ, samappavattiyā vā
tika-s0305t:252_5: alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ, samathavīthipaṭipattiyā anirassādanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati
tika-s0305t:252_6: samaye ajjhupekkhanatāti ayaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbasamaye cittassa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu
tika-s0305t:252_7: byāvaṭatāsaṅkhātaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ abhibhuyya upekkhanā vuccati. Esāti samādhibojjhaṅgo
tika-s0305t:252_8: anuppanno uppajjati. Arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotīti etena nippariyāyato samādhivepullappattopi
tika-s0305t:253_1: sati sijjhanato, asati ca asijjhanato, so ca majjhattabhāvo visayavasena duvidhoti
tika-s0305t:253_2: āha “sattamajjhattatā saṅkhāramajjhattatā”ti. Tadubhayavasena cassa virujjhanaṃ passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0305t:253_3: bhāvanāya eva dūrīkatanti anurujjhanasseva pahānavidhiṃ dassento “sattamajjhattatā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:253_5: Upekkhāya hi visesato rāgo paṭipakkho, tato rāgabahulassa puggalassa upekkhā “visuddhimaggo”ti
tika-s0305t:253_7: dvīhi kāraṇehi. Dvīhevāti avadhāraṇaṃ saṅkhārasahitāya saṅkhyāsamānatāya dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0305t:253_8: Saṅkhyā eva hettha samānaṃ, na saṅkhyeyyaṃ sabbathā samānanti. Assāmikabhāvo anattaniyatā.
tika-s0305t:253_9: Sati hi attani tassa kiñcanabhāvena cīvaraṃ aññaṃ vā kiñci attaniyaṃ nāma siyā, so
tika-s0305t:253_10: pana koci natthevāti adhippāyo. Anaddhaniyanti, na addhānakkhamaṃ, na ciraṭṭhāyi
tika-s0305t:253_11: ittaraṃ aniccanti attho. Tāvakālikanti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:254_0: Mamāyatīti mamattaṃ karoti. Mamāti taṇhāya pariggayha tiṭṭhati. Dhanāyantāti dhanaṃ
tika-s0305t:254_1: dabbaṃ karontā. Assāti upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
tika-s0305t:255_0: Asubhārammaṇā dhammāti asubhappakārā asubhajhānassa ārammaṇabhūtā dhammā. Kāmaṃ indriyabaddhāpi
tika-s0305t:255_1: kesādayo asubhappakārā eva, visesato pana jigucchitabbe jigucchāvahe gaṇhanto “dasā”ti
tika-s0305t:255_2: āha. Yathā manasikaroto sabhāvasarasato tattha asubhasaññā santiṭṭhati, tathā pavatto
tika-s0305t:255_3: manasikāro upāyamanasikāro. Asubhe asubhapaṭikkūlākārassa uggaṇhanaṃ, yathā vā tattha
tika-s0305t:255_4: uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati, tathā manasikāro asubhanimittassa uggaho. Upacārappanāvahāya
tika-s0305t:256_0: Manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ suṭṭhu susaṃvaraṇe sati avasaraṃ alabhanto kāmacchando
tika-s0305t:256_1: pahīyateva, tathā bhojane mattaññuno mitāhārassa thinamiddhābhibhavābhāvā otāraṃ
tika-s0305t:256_2: alabhamāno kāmacchando pahīyati. Yo pana āhāre paṭikkūlasaññaṃ tabbipariṇāmassa tadādhārassa
tika-s0305t:256_3: tassa ca udariyabhūtassa ativiya jegucchataṃ, kāyassa ca āhāratiṭṭhakataṃ sammadeva
tika-s0305t:256_4: jānāti, so sabbaso bhojane pamāṇassa jānanena visesato bhojane mattaññū nāma. Tassa
tika-s0305t:256_5: kāmacchando pahīyateva, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana appāhārataṃyeva dassetuṃ “catunna”ntiādi
tika-s0305t:257_0: Mejjati hitapharaṇavasena siniyhatīti mitto, hitesī puggalo, tasmiṃ mitte bhavā,
tika-s0305t:257_1: mittassa vā esāti mettā, hitesitā. Sā eva paṭipakkhato cetaso vimuttīti mettācetovimutti.
tika-s0305t:257_2: Tattha mettāyanassa sattesu hitapharaṇassa uppādanaṃ pavattanaṃ mettānimittassa uggaho.
tika-s0305t:258_0: Tattha attapiyasahāyamajjhattaverivasena odissakatā. Sīmāsambhede kate anodissakatā.
tika-s0305t:258_1: Ekādidisāpharaṇavasena disāpharaṇatā mettāya uggaṇhane veditabbā. Uggaho yāva upacārā
tika-s0305t:258_2: daṭṭhabbo. Uggahitāya āsevanā bhāvanā, sabbā itthiyo purisā ariyā anariyā devā manussā
tika-s0305t:258_3: vinipātikāti sattodhikaraṇavasena pavattā sattavidhā, aṭṭhavīsatividhā vā, dasahi
tika-s0305t:258_4: disāhi disodhikaraṇavasena pavattā dasavidhā, ekekāya disāya sattādiitthādiaverādibhedena
tika-s0305t:258_5: asītādhikacatusatappabhedā ca odhisopharaṇamettā. Sabbe sattā, pāṇā, bhūtā, puggalā,
tika-s0305t:258_6: attabhāvapariyāpannāti etesaṃ vasena pañcavidhā. Ekekasmiṃ averā hontu, abyāpajjā,
tika-s0305t:258_7: anīghā, sukhī attānaṃ pariharantūti catudhā pavattiyā vīsatividhā anodhisopharaṇamettā,
tika-s0305t:258_8: taṃ sandhāyāha – “odhiso…pe… bhāventassapī”ti. Tvaṃ etassātiādinā kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0305t:258_9: dasseti. Paṭisaṅkhāne ṭhitassāti kodhe yathāvuttassa ādīnavassa tappaṭipakkhato akodhe
