tika-s0305t:258_10: mettāya ānisaṃsassa ca paṭisaṅkhāne sammadeva jānane. Sevantassāti bhajantassa byāpādo pahīyati.
tika-s0305t:259_0: Atibhojane nimittaggāhoti āhārassa adhikabhojane thinamiddhassa nimittaggāho, “ettake
tika-s0305t:259_1: bhutte thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati, ettake no”ti thinamiddhassa kāraṇākāraṇaggāhoti attho.
tika-s0305t:259_2: Divā sūriyālokanti divā gahitanimittaṃ sūriyālokaṃ, rattiyaṃ manasikarontassapīti
tika-s0305t:259_3: evamettha attho veditabbo. Dhutaṅgānaṃ vīriyanissitattā vuttaṃ “dhutaṅganissitasappāyakathāyapī”ti.
tika-s0305t:260_0: Kukkuccampi katākatānusocanavasena pavattamānaṃ cetaso avūpasamāvahatāya uddhaccena
tika-s0305t:260_1: samānalakkhaṇamevāti tadubhayassa pahānakāraṇaṃ dassento bhagavā – “atthi, bhikkhave,
tika-s0305t:260_2: cetaso vūpasamo”tiādimāha. Tasmā bāhusaccādi tassa pahānakāraṇanti dassetuṃ “apica
tika-s0305t:260_3: cha dhammā”tiādimāha. Tattha bahussutassa ganthato, atthato dhammaṃ vicārentassa
tika-s0305t:260_4: attavedādipaṭilābhasambhavato vikkhepo na hoti. Yathāvihitapaṭipattiyā yathādhammapaṭikārappattiyā
tika-s0305t:260_5: ca vippaṭisāro anavasarovāti “bāhusaccenapi…pe… uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:260_6: Yadaggena bahussutassa paṭisaṅkhānavato uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati, tadaggena paripucchakatāvinayapakataññutāhipi
tika-s0305t:260_7: taṃ pahīyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vuddhasevitā ca vuddhasīlitaṃ āvahatīti cetaso vūpasamakarattā
tika-s0305t:260_8: uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānakārī vuttā, vuddhabhāvaṃ pana anapekkhitvā vinayadharā
tika-s0305t:260_9: kukkuccavinodakā kalyāṇamittāti daṭṭhabbā. Vikkhepo ca bhikkhūnaṃ yebhuyyena kukkuccahetuko
tika-s0305t:260_11: niddiṭṭhā. Pahīne uddhaccakukkucceti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Kukkuccassa domanassasahagatattā
tika-s0305t:261_0: Kusalākusalā dhammātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Kāmaṃ bāhusaccaparipucchakatāhi
tika-s0305t:261_1: aṭṭhavatthukāpi vicikicchā pahīyati, tathāpi ratanattayavicikicchāmūlikā sesavicikicchāti
tika-s0305t:261_2: katvā vuttaṃ “tīṇi ratanāni ārabbhā”tiādi. Vinaye pakataññutāya ca sati sikkhāya
tika-s0305t:261_3: kaṅkhāya asambhavo eva, tathā ratanattayaguṇāvabodhe sati pubbantādīsu saṃsayassāti
tika-s0305t:261_4: āha – “vinaye”tiādi. Okappanīyasaddhā saddheyyavatthuṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanaṃ,
tika-s0305t:261_5: tañca tathā adhimokkhuppādanameva. Saddhāya ninnapoṇapabbhāratā adhimutti. Arahattena
tika-s0305t:261_6: kūṭaṃ gaṇhi sattapi bojjhaṅge vitthāretvā desanāya osāpitattā.
tika-s0305t:264_0: 233. Sambahulāti vuccanti saṅghasamaññāya abhāvato. Tato paranti tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ upari
tika-s0305t:264_1: saṅgho catuvaggakaraṇīyādisaṅghakammavasena kammappattattā. Pavisiṃsūti bhāvini pavisane
tika-s0305t:264_2: bhūte viya katvā upacārena vuttanti āha – “paviṭṭhā”ti. Bhāvini hi bhūte viya upacāro.
tika-s0305t:264_3: Tenāha – “te panā”tiādi, te pana bhikkhūti attho. Puna te panāti titthiyā titthiyasāvakā ca.
tika-s0305t:265_0: Imasmiṃ paññāpaneti “pañca nīvaraṇe pahāyā”tiādinayappavatte imasmiṃ pakāre atthapaññāpane.
tika-s0305t:265_1: Visissati aññamaññato pabhijjatīti viseso, bhedo. Svāyaṃ idha antogadhādhikabhāvo
tika-s0305t:265_2: adhippetoti āha – “ko visesoti kiṃ adhika”nti. Adhikaṃ payasanaṃ payuñjananti adhippayāso,
tika-s0305t:265_3: adhikappayogo. Nānā karīyati etenāti nānākaraṇaṃ, bhedoti āha – “kiṃ nānatta”nti.
tika-s0305t:265_4: Dutiyapadeti “anusāsaniyā vā anusāsani”nti etasmiṃ pade. Eseva nayoti yathā paṭhamasmiṃ
tika-s0305t:266_0: Tīṇi ṭhānānīti devamārabrahmaṭṭhānāni tīṇi “sadevake loke”tiādinā loke pakkhipitvā.
tika-s0305t:266_1: “Sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāyā”ti dve ṭhānāni. “Pajāyā”ti ettha pakkhipitvā
tika-s0305t:266_2: iti pañcahi padehi. Uddesanti uddisitabbataṃ. Gaṇananti eko kāmacchandoti gahetabbataṃ
tika-s0305t:266_3: gacchati. Attano hatthapādādīsūti nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ samudāyaṃ ārabbha paṭighassa
tika-s0305t:266_4: uppajjanato. Attano khandhesu vimati “ahaṃ nu khosmī”tiādinā.
tika-s0305t:267_0: Kiñcāpi sabbaṃ vīriyaṃ cetasikameva, yaṃ pana kāyakammādhiṭṭhānādivasena manasi kāyikapayogasamuṭṭhāpanaṃ
tika-s0305t:267_1: vīriyaṃ kāyikanti laddhapariyāyanti tato visesetvā cetasikanti yathādhippetadutiyatādassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0305t:267_2: Yadipi yathākappitairiyāpathasandhāraṇavasena pavattamānaṃ vīriyaṃ kāyassa tathāpavattassa
tika-s0305t:267_3: paccayabhūtanti na sakkā vattuṃ, tathāpi na tādiso kāyapayogo, tadā pavatto natthīti
tika-s0305t:267_4: vuttaṃ “kāyapayogaṃ vinā uppannavīriya”nti. Satisambojjhaṅgasadiso vāti iminā ajjhattike
tika-s0305t:267_5: saṅkhāre ajjhupekkhanavasena pavattā ajjhattadhammesu upekkhātiādinayaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0305t:268_0: “Missakabojjhaṅgā kathitā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “etesū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Caṅkamantenapi
tika-s0305t:268_1: ariyamaggaṃ adhigantuṃ sakkāti katvā vuttaṃ “maggaṃ apattaṃ kāyikavīriya”nti. Bojjhaṅgā
tika-s0305t:268_2: na labbhantīti nippariyāyabojjhaṅgā na labbhantī. Bojjhaṅge uddharanti pariyāyatoti
tika-s0305t:268_4: dve passaddhiyo ca. Ayaṃ pana nayo pacurappavattivasena aṭṭhakathānayeneva vutto.
tika-s0305t:268_5: Theravādavasena pana avitakkaavicāramattā pītisamādhisambojjhaṅgā rūpāvacarāpi atthīti
tika-s0305t:268_6: tepi gahetvā dasa missakāva hontīti vattabbaṃ siyāti.
tika-s0305t:271_0: 234. Loṇadhūpananti loṇañca dhūpanañca loṇadhūpanaṃ. Yodhakammanti yodhapuggalena
tika-s0305t:271_1: kattabbaṃ kammaṃ. Mantakammanti rājakiccamantanaṃ. Paṭihārakammanti rañño santikaṃ
tika-s0305t:271_2: āgatānaṃ vacanaṃ rañño nivedetvā tato nesaṃ paṭiharaṇakammaṃ. Tasmāti sabbatthikattā
tika-s0305t:271_3: satiyā. Evaṃ “satiñca khvāha”ntiādikaṃ avoca. Pubbabhāgavipassanā bojjhaṅgāva kathitā
tika-s0305t:274_0: 235. Kīdisā gati nibbatti etissāti kiṃgatikā, kiṃniṭṭhāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kīdisī paramā
tika-s0305t:274_1: uttamā koṭi etissāti kiṃparamā. Kīdisaṃ phalaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ udayo etissāti kiṃphalā.
tika-s0305t:274_2: Saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttanti idaṃ sahagata-saddassa atthadassanamattaṃ, idha pana mettājhānaṃ
tika-s0305t:274_4: vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Sabbatthāti sabbesu bojjhaṅgesu sabbesu ca brahmavihāresu.
tika-s0305t:275_0: Paṭikūleti virajjatīti paṭikūlaṃ, aniṭṭhaṃ. Na paṭikūlaṃ appaṭikūlaṃ, iṭṭhaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0305t:275_1: “iṭṭhe vatthusmi”nti. Etthāti appaṭikūlavatthusmiṃ. Evanti paṭikūlasaññī. Satte appaṭikūle
tika-s0305t:275_2: asubhapharaṇaṃ, saṅkhāre appaṭikūle aniccanti manasikāraṃ karonto. Asubhāyāti asubhasaññāya.
tika-s0305t:275_3: Aniccato vā upasaṃharatīti aniccanti manasikāraṃ pavatteti. “Eseva nayo”ti saṅkhepato
tika-s0305t:276_0: Mettāyāti mettābhāvanāya. Paṭikūlādīsu vatthūsu icchitavihārena viharituṃ samatthatā
tika-s0305t:276_1: ariyānaṃ eva, tattha ca arahato eva ijjhanato ariyiddhi nāma. Tassā ariyiddhiyā ca
tika-s0305t:276_2: dassitattā desanā vinivaṭṭetabbā pariyosānetabbā siyā. Arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkoti
tika-s0305t:276_3: indriyānaṃ aparipakkattā nikantiyā ca duppariyādānato. Ayaṃ desanāti “mettāsahagataṃ
tika-s0305t:276_4: bojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetī”tiādinā ayaṃ desanā āraddhā. Yo hi mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā sammasanaṃ
tika-s0305t:276_5: ārabhitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ asakkonto parisuddhesu vaṇṇakasiṇesu vimokkhasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0305t:276_6: rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ nibbatteti, taṃ sandhāyāha bhagavā – “subhaṃ kho pana vimokkhaṃ
tika-s0305t:277_0: Subhaparamanti subhavimokkhaparamaṃ. Idha loke eva paññā assa. Tenāha “lokiyapaññassāti
tika-s0305t:277_1: attho”ti. Arahattaparamāva mettā arahattamaggassa pādakattā. Karuṇādīsupi eseva nayoti
tika-s0305t:277_2: karuṇādijhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ sakkoti, tassa
tika-s0305t:277_3: arahatthaparamā karuṇā hoti, evaṃ muditāupekkhāsupi vattabbanti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0305t:277_4: Puna desanārambhapayojanaṃ pana “iminā nayenā”ti heṭṭhā atidiṭṭhameva.
tika-s0305t:278_2: heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ arūpajjhānānañca yathākkamaṃ upanissayattā. Appaṭikūlaparicayāti iṭṭhārammaṇe
tika-s0305t:278_3: manasikārabahulīkārā. Appakasirenevāti sukheneva. Tatthāti visuddhatāya iṭṭhesu vaṇṇakasiṇesu.
tika-s0305t:278_4: Cittanti bhāvanāmayacittaṃ pakkhandati appanāvasena. Tato paranti tato subhavimokkhato
tika-s0305t:278_5: paraṃ vimokkhānaṃ upanissayo nāma na hoti, mettāsahagatabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0305t:279_0: Sattadukkhaṃ samanupassantassāti daṇḍena abhihaṭappattarūpahetuṃ sattesu uppajjanakadukkhaṃ
tika-s0305t:279_1: ñāṇena vīmaṃsantassa. Tayidaṃ rūpanimittakaṃ sattesu uppajjanakaṃ dukkhaṃ ñāṇena
tika-s0305t:279_2: karuṇāvihārissa visesato pakkhandatīti katvā vuttaṃ “appakasireneva tattha cittaṃ
tika-s0305t:279_3: pakkhandatī”ti, na pana sabbaso arūpe ānisaṃsadassanato.
tika-s0305t:280: Viññāṇaṃ samanupassantassāti idaṃ pāmojjagahaṇamukhena tannissayaviññāṇassa gahaṇaṃ sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ. Viññāṇaggahaṇaparicitanti vuttanayena viññāṇaggahaṇe paricitaṃ.
tika-s0305t:281_0: Upekkhāvihārissāti upekkhābrahmavihāraṃ viharato. Ābhogābhāvatoti sukhādivasena ābhujanābhāvato.
tika-s0305t:281_3: tassa abhāvamattakassa gahaṇampi dukkhaṃ kusalampi hoti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0305t:284_0: 236. Paṭhamaññevāti puretaraṃyeva. Asajjhāyakatānaṃ mantānaṃ appaṭibhānaṃ pageva
tika-s0305t:284_1: paṭhamaṃyeva siddhaṃ, tattha vattabbameva natthīti adhippāyo. Pariyuṭṭhānaṃ nāma
tika-s0305t:284_3: apanetīti vikkhambhanaṃ, paṭipakkhato nissarati etenāti nissaraṇaṃ, vikkhambhanañca
tika-s0305t:284_5: eseva nayo. Attanā araṇiyo pattabbo attattho, tathā parattho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:285_0: “Aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”tiādīsu byāpādādīnaṃ anāgatattā abyāpādavāre
tika-s0305t:285_1: tadaṅganissaraṇaṃ na gahitaṃ. Kiñcāpi na gahitaṃ, paṭisaṅkhānavasena pana tassa vinodetabbatāya
tika-s0305t:285_2: tadaṅganissaraṇampi labbhatevāti sakkā viññātuṃ. Ālokasaññā upacārappattā, appanāppattā
tika-s0305t:285_3: vā, yo koci kasiṇajjhānādibhedo samatho. Dhammavavatthānaṃ upacārappanāppattavasena gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:286_0: Kuthitoti tatto. Usmudakajātoti tasseva kuthitabhāvassa usmudakataṃ accuṇhataṃ patto.
tika-s0305t:286_2: paṇakenāti udakapicchilena. Appasanno ākulatāya. Asannisinno kalaluppattiyā. Anālokaṭṭhāneti ālokarahite ṭhāne.
tika-s0305t:289_0: 237. Ekaṃsena bhagavā nīvaraṇāti ekaṃsato eva bhagavā ete dhammā nīvaraṇā citte kusalappavattiyā
tika-s0305t:289_1: nīvaraṇato. Kāyakilamathoti kāyaparissamo, so pana aṭṭhuppattiyā paccayattā “daratho”ti
tika-s0305t:289_2: vutto. Cittakilamatho tappaccayajāto daṭṭhabbo. Tenāha – “tassa kirā”tiādi. Cittadarathopi
tika-s0305t:289_3: paṭippassambhīti ānetvā sambandho. Maggenevāti yathādhigatena ariyamaggeneva. Assāti
tika-s0305t:294_0: 238. Uppannasaññāti saññāsīsena upacārajjhānaṃ vadati. Tenāha “taṃ paneta”ntiādi.
tika-s0305t:294_1: Chavicammampi upaṭṭhātīti idaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ aviññāṇakampi kāyasāmaññato gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:294_2: Sati vā upādiseseti ettha upādiyati attano ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhātīti upādi, upādānaṃ, etassa
tika-s0305t:298_0: 248-257. Anabhiratinti anabhiramaṇaṃ anapekkhitaṃ. Accantanirodhabhūte nibbāne pavattasaññā
tika-s0305t:298_1: nirodhasaññā. Tattha sā maggasahagatā lokuttarā, yā pana nibbāne ninnabhāvena pavattā,
tika-s0305t:298_2: upasamānussatisahagatā ca, sā lokiyāti āha – “nirodhasaññā missakā”ti. “Tesaṃ navasū”tiādi
tika-s0305t:298_3: pamādapāṭho. “Ekādasasu appanā hoti, nava upacārajjhānikā”ti pāṭho gahetabbo. Vīsati
tika-s0305t:298_4: kammaṭṭhānānīti idampi idhāgatanayo, na visuddhimaggādīsu āgatanayo. Ettha ca ārammaṇādīsu
tika-s0305t:298_5: yathāyogaṃ appanaṃ upacāraṃ vā pāpuṇitvā arahattappattassa pubbabhāgabhūtā vipassanāmaggabojjhaṅgā kathitā.
tika-s0305t:304_0: 367. Ekāyanvāyanti sandhivasena vuttaṃ o-kārassa va-kāraṃ a-kārassa dīghaṃ katvā.
tika-s0305t:304_1: Ayaṃ kira saṃyuttābhilāpo, tattha ayana-saddo maggapariyāyo. Na kevalaṃ ayameva,
tika-s0305t:304_2: atha kho aññepi maggapariyāyāti paduddhāraṃ karonto “maggassa hī”tiādiṃ vatvā yadi
tika-s0305t:304_3: maggapariyāyo āyana-saddo, kasmā puna maggoti vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:304_4: Tattha ekamaggoti ekova maggo. Na hi nibbānagāmimaggo añño atthīti. Nanu satipaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0305t:304_5: idha maggoti adhippetaṃ, tadaññepi bahū maggadhammā atthīti? Saccaṃ atthi, te pana
tika-s0305t:304_6: satipaṭṭhānaggahaṇeneva gahitā tadavinābhāvato. Tathā hi ñāṇavīriyādayo niddese gahitā,
tika-s0305t:304_7: uddese satiyā eva gahaṇaṃ veneyyajjhāsayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, satiyā maggabhāvadassanatthañca.
tika-s0305t:304_8: Na dvedhāpathabhūtoti iminā imassa dvayabhāvābhāvaṃ viya anibbānagāmibhāvābhāvañca
tika-s0305t:304_9: dasseti. Nibbānagamanaṭṭhenāti nibbānaṃ gacchati etenāti nibbānagamanaṃ, so eva aviparītabhāvanāya
tika-s0305t:304_10: attho, tena nibbānagamanaṭṭhena, nibbānādhigamūpāyatāyāti attho. Magganīyaṭṭhenāti gavesitabbatāya.
tika-s0305t:305_0: Rāgādīhīti “rāgo malaṃ, doso malaṃ, moho mala”nti evaṃ vuttehi rāgādīhi malehi. Sā
tika-s0305t:305_1: panāyaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhacittānaṃ visuddhi sijjhamānā yasmā sokādīnaṃ anuppādāya saṃvattati,
tika-s0305t:305_2: tasmā vuttaṃ “sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā”tiādi. Tattha socanaṃ ñātibyasanādinimittaṃ
tika-s0305t:305_3: cetaso santāpo antonijjhānaṃ soko. Ñātibyasanādinimittameva sokādhikatājanito “kahaṃ
tika-s0305t:305_4: ekaputtakā”tiādinā paridevanavasena vācāvippalāpo paridevanaṃ paridevo. Tassa āyatiṃ
tika-s0305t:305_5: anuppajjanaṃ idha samatikkamoti āha “pahānāyā”ti. Dukkhadomanassānanti ettha cetasikadukkhatāya
tika-s0305t:305_6: domanassassapi dukkhasaddeneva gahaṇe siddhe saddena anivattanato sāmaññajotanāya
tika-s0305t:305_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ñāyati etena yāthāvato paṭivijjhīyati catusaccanti ñāyo vuccati ariyamaggo.
tika-s0305t:305_9: Nanu ayampi maggo, kiṃ maggo eva maggassa adhigamāya hotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha –
tika-s0305t:305_10: “ayaṃ hī”tiādi. Taṇhāva kammakilesavipākānaṃ vinanaṭṭhena saṃsibbanaṭṭhena vānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:305_11: Tena taṇhāvānena virahitattā tassa abhāvāti attho. Attapaccakkhāyāti attapaccakkhatthāya.
tika-s0305t:306_0: Vaṇṇabhāsananti pasaṃsāvacanaṃ. Visuddhinti visujjhanaṃ kilesappahānaṃ. Uggahetabbanti
tika-s0305t:306_1: ettha vācuggatakaraṇaṃ uggaho. Paricayakaraṇaṃ paripucchāmūlakattā taggahaṇeneva
tika-s0305t:307_0: Na tato heṭṭhāti idha adhippetakāyādīnaṃ vedanādisabhāvattābhāvā kāyavedanācittavimuttassa
tika-s0305t:307_1: tebhūmakadhammassa visuṃ vipallāsavatthantarabhāvena gahitattā ca heṭṭhā gahaṇesu
tika-s0305t:307_2: vipallāsavatthūnaṃ aniṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pañcamassa pana vipallāsavatthuno
tika-s0305t:307_3: abhāvena “na uddha”nti āha. Ārammaṇavibhāgena hettha satipaṭṭhānavibhāgoti. Tayo
tika-s0305t:307_4: satipaṭṭhānāti satipaṭṭhānasaddassa atthuddhāradassanaṃ, na idha pāḷiyaṃ vuttassa
tika-s0305t:307_5: satipaṭṭhānasaddassa atthadassanaṃ. Ādīsu hīti ettha ādi-saddena “phassasamudayā
tika-s0305t:307_6: vedanānaṃ samudayo, nāmarūpasamudayā cittassa samudayo, manasikārasamudayā dhammānaṃ
tika-s0305t:307_7: samudayo”ti satipaṭṭhānāti vuttānaṃ satigocarānaṃ pakāsake suttapadese saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0305t:308: Ariyoti ārakattādinā ariyaṃ sammāsambuddhamāha. Etthāti etasmiṃ saḷāyatanavibhaṅgasutte. Tattha hi –
tika-s0305t:309_0: “Tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo…pe… marahatīti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca
tika-s0305t:309_1: vuttaṃ. Idha, bhikkhave, satthā sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṃ
tika-s0305t:309_2: upādāya – ‘idaṃ vo hitāya idaṃ vo sukhāyā’ti. Tassa sāvakā na sussūsanti, na sotaṃ
tika-s0305t:309_3: odahanti, na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, vokkamma ca satthusāsanā vattanti. Tatra,
tika-s0305t:309_4: bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti,
tika-s0305t:309_5: anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Yadariyo
tika-s0305t:309_6: sevati…pe... marahati. Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, satthā …pe… idaṃ vo sukhāyāti. Tassa
tika-s0305t:309_7: ekacce sāvakā na sussūsanti…pe… ekacce sāvakā sussūsanti…pe… na ca vokkamma satthusāsanā
tika-s0305t:309_8: vattanti. Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanataṃ
tika-s0305t:309_9: paṭisaṃvedeti, na ceva attamano hoti, na ca attamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Anattamanatañca
tika-s0305t:309_10: attamanatañca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ,
tika-s0305t:309_11: bhikkhave, dutiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ…pe… marahati. Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave,…pe… sukhāyāti,
tika-s0305t:309_12: tassa sāvakā sussūsanti…pe… vattanti. Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato attamano ceva hoti,
tika-s0305t:309_13: attamanatañca paṭisaṃvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ, bhikkhave,
tika-s0305t:310_0: Evaṃ paṭighānunayehi anavassutatā niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitāya tadubhayavītivattatā
tika-s0305t:310_1: “satipaṭṭhāna”nti vuttā. Buddhānaṃyeva hi niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitā hoti āveṇikadhammabhāvato,
tika-s0305t:310_2: na paccekabuddhādīnaṃ. Pa-saddo ārambhaṃ joteti, ārambho ca pavattīti katvā āha “pavattayitabbatoti
tika-s0305t:310_3: attho”ti. Satiyā karaṇabhūtāya paṭṭhānaṃ paṭṭhapetabbaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Ana-saddo
tika-s0305t:311_0: Tathāssa kattuatthopi labbhatīti “patiṭṭhātīti paṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ. Upaṭṭhātīti ettha
tika-s0305t:311_1: upa-saddo bhusatthavisiṭṭhaṃ pakkhandanaṃ dīpetīti “okkanditvā pakkhanditvā pavattatīti
tika-s0305t:311_2: attho”ti vuttaṃ. Puna bhāvatthaṃ satisaddaṃ paṭṭhānasaddañca vaṇṇento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:311_3: Tena purimavikappe sati-saddo paṭṭhāna-saddo ca kattuatthoti viññāyati. Saraṇaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0305t:311_4: cirakatassa cirabhāsitassa ca anussaraṇaṭṭhena. Idanti yaṃ “satiyeva satipaṭṭhāna”nti
tika-s0305t:311_5: vuttaṃ, idaṃ idha imasmiṃ suttapadese adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0305t:312_0: Yadi evanti yadi sati eva satipaṭṭhānaṃ, sati nāma eko dhammo, evaṃ sante kasmā satipaṭṭhānāti
tika-s0305t:312_1: bahuvacananti āha “satīnaṃ bahuttā”tiādi. Yadi bahukā tā satiyo, atha kasmā maggoti
tika-s0305t:312_2: ekavacananti yojanā. Magganaṭṭhenāti niyyānaṭṭhena. Niyyāniko hi maggadhammo, teneva
tika-s0305t:312_3: niyyānikabhāvena ekattupagato ekantato nibbānaṃ gacchati, atthikehi ca tadatthaṃ
tika-s0305t:312_4: maggīyatīti āha “vuttañheta”ntiādi. Tattha catassopi cetāti kāyānupassanādivasena
tika-s0305t:312_5: catubbidhāpi ca etā satiyo. Aparabhāgeti ariyamaggakkhaṇe. Kiccaṃ sādhayamānāti pubbabhāge
tika-s0305t:312_6: kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu subhasaññādividhamanavasena visuṃ visuṃ pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe
tika-s0305t:312_7: sakiṃyeva tattha catubbidhassapi vipallāsassa samucchedavasena pahānakiccaṃ sādhayamānā
tika-s0305t:312_8: ārammaṇakaraṇavasena nibbānaṃ gacchanti, tamevassa catukiccasādhanataṃ upādāya bahuvacananiddeso,
tika-s0305t:312_9: tathāpi atthato bhedābhāvato maggoti ekavacanena vuccati. Tenāha – “tasmā catassopi
tika-s0305t:313_0: Kathetukamyatāpucchā itarāsaṃ pucchānaṃ idha asambhavato niddesādivasena desetukāmatāya
tika-s0305t:313_1: ca tathā vuttattā. “Ayañceva kāyo bahiddhā ca nāmarūpa”ntiādīsu khandhapañcakaṃ,
tika-s0305t:313_2: “sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetī”tiādīsu vedanādayo tayo arūpakkhandhā, “yā tasmiṃ
tika-s0305t:313_3: samaye kāyassa passaddhi paṭippassaddhī”tiādīsu vedanādayo tayo cetasikā khandhā
tika-s0305t:313_4: “kāyo”ti vuccanti, tato visesanatthaṃ “kāyeti rūpakāye”ti āha. Kāyānupassīti ettha
tika-s0305t:313_5: tassīlatthaṃ dassento “kāyaṃ anupassanasīlo”ti āha. Aniccato anupassatīti catusamuṭṭhānikakāyaṃ
tika-s0305t:313_6: “anicca”nti anupassati, evaṃ passanto eva cassa aniccākārampi anupassatīti vuccati,
tika-s0305t:313_7: tathābhūtassa cassa niccagāhassa visesopi na hotīti vuttaṃ “no niccato”ti. Tathā
tika-s0305t:313_8: hesa “niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”ti vutto. Ettha ca aniccato eva anupassatīti evakāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti
tika-s0305t:313_9: tena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “no niccato”ti vuttaṃ. Na cettha dukkhānupassanādinivattanamāsaṅkitabbaṃ
tika-s0305t:313_10: paṭiyoginivattanaparattā eva-kārassa, upari desanāāruḷhattā ca tāsaṃ. Dukkhato anupassatītiādīsupi
tika-s0305t:313_11: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – aniccassa dukkhattā tameva kāyaṃ dukkhato anupassati,
tika-s0305t:314_0: Yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, na taṃ abhinanditabbaṃ, yañca na abhinanditabbaṃ,
tika-s0305t:314_1: na tattha rajjitabbaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “aniccato anupassati, no niccato, dukkhato anupassati,
tika-s0305t:314_2: no sukhato, anattato anupassati, no attato, nibbindati, no nandati, virajjati, no
tika-s0305t:314_3: rajjatī”ti. So evaṃ arajjanto rāgaṃ nirodheti, no samudeti, samudayaṃ na karotīti
tika-s0305t:314_4: attho. Evaṃ paṭipanno ca paṭinissajjati, no ādiyati. Ayañhi aniccādianupassanā tadaṅgavasena
tika-s0305t:314_6: tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato “pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo
tika-s0305t:314_7: cā”ti vuccati. Tasmā tāya samannāgato bhikkhu vuttanayena kilese ca pariccajati,
tika-s0305t:314_8: nibbāne ca pakkhandati, tathābhūto ca pariccajanavasena kilese na ādiyati, nāpi adosadassitāvasena
tika-s0305t:314_9: saṅkhatārammaṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “paṭinissajjati, no ādiyatī”ti. Idāni nissitāhi anupassanāhi
tika-s0305t:314_10: yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”tiādi
tika-s0305t:314_11: vuttaṃ. Tattha niccasaññanti saṅkhārā niccāti evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītasaññaṃ. Diṭṭhicittavipallāsapahānamukheneva
tika-s0305t:314_12: saññāvipallāsappahānanti saññāgahaṇaṃ, saññāsīsena vā tesampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:315_0: Viharatīti iminā kāyānupassanāsamaṅgino iriyāpathavihāro vuttoti āha – “iriyatī”ti,
tika-s0305t:315_1: iriyāpathaṃ pavattetīti attho. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena abhibyāpanato “tīsu bhavesū”ti
tika-s0305t:315_2: vuttaṃ, uppajjanavasena pana kilesā parittabhūmakā evāti. Yadipi kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ
tika-s0305t:315_3: ātāpananti taṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnampi attheva, ātappa-saddoviya pana ātāpa-saddopi vīriye
tika-s0305t:315_4: eva niruḷhoti vuttaṃ “vīriyassetaṃ nāma”nti. Atha vā paṭipakkhappahāne sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0305t:315_5: abbhussahanavasena pavattamānassa vīriyassa sātisayaṃ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā
tika-s0305t:316_0: Ātāpīti cāyamīkāro pasaṃsāya, atisayassa vā dīpakoti ātāpīgahaṇena sammappadhānasamaṅgitaṃ
tika-s0305t:316_1: dasseti. Sammā samantato sāmañca pajānanto sampajāno, asammissato vavatthāne aññadhammānupassitābhāvena
tika-s0305t:316_2: sammā aviparītaṃ, sabbākārapajānanena samantato, uparūpari visesāvahabhāvena pavattiyā
tika-s0305t:316_3: sāmaṃ pajānantoti attho. Yadi paññāya anupassati, kathaṃ satipaṭṭhānatāti āha “na
tika-s0305t:316_4: hī”tiādi. Tasmā satiyā laddhupakārāya eva paññāya ettha yathāvutte kāye kammaṭṭhāniko
tika-s0305t:316_5: bhikkhu anupassako, tasmā “kāyānupassī”ti vuccati. Antosaṅkhepo antolīnatā, kosajjanti
tika-s0305t:316_6: attho. Upāyapariggahoti ettha sīlavisodhanādi gaṇanādi uggahakosallādi ca upāyo,
tika-s0305t:316_7: tabbipariyāyato anupāyo veditabbo. Yasmā ca upaṭṭhitassatī yathāvuttaṃ upāyaṃ na
tika-s0305t:316_8: pariccajati, anupāyañca na upādiyati, tasmā vuttaṃ “muṭṭhassati…pe… asamattho hotī”ti.
tika-s0305t:316_9: Tenāti upāyānupāyānaṃ pariggahaparivajjanesu apariccāgāpariggahesu ca asamatthabhāvena. Assa yogino.
tika-s0305t:317_0: Yasmā satiyevettha satipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttā, tasmāssa sampayuttadhammā vīriyādayo aṅganti
tika-s0305t:317_1: āha – “sampayogaṅgañcassa dassetvā”ti. Aṅga-saddo cettha kāraṇapariyāyo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0305t:317_2: Satiggahaṇenevettha sammāsamādhissapi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tassā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitattā.
tika-s0305t:317_3: Yasmā vā satisīsenāyaṃ desanā. Na hi kevalāya satiyā kilesappahānaṃ sambhavati, nibbānādhigamo
tika-s0305t:317_4: vā, nāpi kevalā sati pavattati, tasmāssa jhānadesanāyaṃ savitakkādivacanassa viya
tika-s0305t:317_6: kāmehī”tiādīsu viya pahātabbaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ. Yasmā ettha pubbabhāgamaggo adhippeto,
tika-s0305t:317_7: na lokuttaramaggo, tasmā pubbabhāgiyameva vinayaṃ dassento “tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena
tika-s0305t:317_8: vā”ti āha. Assāti yogino. Tesaṃ dhammānanti vedanādidhammānaṃ. Tesañhi tattha anadhippetattā
tika-s0305t:317_9: “atthuddhāranayenetaṃ vutta”nti āha. Yaṃ panāti vibhaṅge, vibhaṅgapakaraṇeti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t:317_10: Etthāti “loke”ti etasmiṃ pade, tā ca lokiyā eva anupassanā nāma sammasananti katvā.
tika-s0305t:318_1: attho. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Yo sukhaṃ dukkhato addāti yo bhikkhu sukhaṃ vedanaṃ
tika-s0305t:318_2: vipariṇāmadukkhatāya dukkhanti paññācakkhunā addakkhi. Dukkhamaddakkhi sallatoti
tika-s0305t:318_3: dukkhavedanaṃ pīḷājananato antotudanato dunnīharaṇato ca sallanti addakkhi passi.
tika-s0305t:318_4: Adukkhamasukhanti upekkhāvedanaṃ. Santanti sukhadukkhānaṃ viya anoḷārikatāya paccayavasena
tika-s0305t:318_5: vūpasantasabhāvattā ca santaṃ. Aniccatoti hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato tāvakālikato
tika-s0305t:318_6: niccapaṭikkhepato ca aniccanti yo addakkhi. Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhūti so bhikkhu
tika-s0305t:318_7: ekaṃsena, paribyattaṃ vā vedanāya sammā passanakoti attho.
tika-s0305t:319_0: Dukkhātipīti saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhā itipi. Sabbaṃ taṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhasmiṃ antogadhaṃ
tika-s0305t:319_1: pariyāpannanti vadāmi saṅkhāradukkhanti vattabbato. Sukhadukkhatopi cāti sukhādīnaṃ
tika-s0305t:319_2: ṭhitivipariṇāmañāṇasukhatāya ca vipariṇāmaṭṭhitiaññāṇadukkhatāya ca vuttattā tissopi
tika-s0305t:319_3: sukhato tissopi ca dukkhato anupassitabbāti attho. Satta anupassanā heṭṭhā pakāsitā eva.
tika-s0305t:320_6: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Sarāgādīnanti mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutte āgatānaṃ sarāgavītarāgādibhedānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:321_1: hi iminā yo ito bāhirakehi sāminivāsīkārakavedakaadhiṭṭhāyakabhāvena parikappito
tika-s0305t:321_2: attā, tassa saṅkhāresu niccatā sukhatā viya katthacipi abhāvo vibhāvito. Natthi etesaṃ
tika-s0305t:321_3: attāti anattā, yasmā pana saṅkhāresu ekadhammopi attā na hoti, tasmā te na attātipi
tika-s0305t:321_4: anattāti ayaṃ tesaṃ suññatadhammo. Tassa suññatadhammassa, yaṃ vibhāvetuṃ abhidhamme
tika-s0305t:321_5: “tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā hontī”tiādinā suññatavāradesanā vuttā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0305t:324_0: 368. Saratīti sato. Ayaṃ pana na yāya kāyaci satiyā sato, atha kho edisāyāti dassento
tika-s0305t:324_2: abhikkamanaṃ abhikkantanti āha – “abhikkantaṃ vuccati gamana”nti. Tathā paṭikkamanaṃ
tika-s0305t:324_3: paṭikkantanti vuttaṃ – “paṭikkantaṃ nivattana”nti. Nivattanañca nivattimattaṃ, nivattitvā
tika-s0305t:324_4: pana gamanaṃ gamanameva. Kāyaṃ abhiharanto abhigamanavasena kāyaṃ nāmento. Ṭhānanisajjāsayanesu
tika-s0305t:324_5: yo gamanādividhinā kāyassa purato abhihāro, so abhikkamo, pacchato apaharaṇaṃ paṭikkamoti
tika-s0305t:324_7: Saṃsarantoti saṃsappanto. Paccāsaṃsarantoti paṭiāsappanto. Eseva nayoti iminā sarīrasseva
tika-s0305t:325_0: Sammā pajānanaṃ sampajānaṃ. Tena attanā kātabbakiccassa karaṇasīlo sampajānakārīti
tika-s0305t:325_1: āha – “sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī”ti. Sampajānameva hi sampajaññaṃ. Sampajaññasseva
tika-s0305t:325_2: vā kārīti sampajaññasseva karaṇasīlo. Sampajaññaṃ karotevāti abhikkantādīsu asammohaṃ
tika-s0305t:325_3: uppādeti eva, sampajānasseva vā kāro etassa atthīti sampajānakārī.
tika-s0305t:326_0: Dhammato vaḍḍhitasaṅkhātena saha atthena vattatīti sātthakaṃ, abhikkantādi, sātthakassa
tika-s0305t:326_1: sampajānanaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ. Sappāyassa attano upakārāvahassa hitassa sampajānanaṃ
tika-s0305t:326_2: sappāyasampajaññaṃ. Abhikkamādīsu bhikkhācāragocare, aññatthāpi ca pavattesu avijahite
tika-s0305t:326_3: kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocare sampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ. Abhikkamādīsu asammuyhanameva
tika-s0305t:326_4: sampajaññaṃ asammohasampajaññaṃ. Pariggaṇhitvāti tulayitvā tīretvā, paṭisaṅkhāyāti
tika-s0305t:326_5: attho. Saṅghadassaneneva uposathapavāraṇādiatthaṃ gamanaṃ saṅgahitaṃ. Asubhadassanādīti
tika-s0305t:326_6: ādi-saddena kasiṇaparikammādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ
tika-s0305t:326_7: “cetiyaṃ disvāpi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Arahattaṃ pāpuṇātīti ukkaṭṭhaniddeso eso. Samathavipassanuppādanampi
tika-s0305t:326_8: hi bhikkhuno vuddhi eva. Dakkhiṇadvāreti cetiyaṅgaṇassa dakkhiṇadvāre, tathā pacchimadvāretiādīsu.
tika-s0305t:327_1: thero. Paññāyanaṭṭhāneti cetiyassa paññāyanaṭṭhāne. Ekapaduddhāreti paduddhārapatiṭṭhānaparivattanaṃ
tika-s0305t:328_0: Tasmiṃ panāti sātthakasampajaññavasena pariggahitaatthepi gamane. Attho nāma dhammato
tika-s0305t:328_1: vaḍḍhīti yaṃ sātthakanti adhippetaṃ gamanaṃ, taṃ sappāyamevāti siyā kassaci āsaṅkāti
tika-s0305t:328_3: cittakammakatā paṭimāyo viya, yantapayogena vā vicittakammā paṭimāya sadisā yantarūpakā
tika-s0305t:328_4: viya. Asamapekkhanaṃ gehassitaaññāṇupekkhāvasena ārammaṇe ayoniso olokanādi. Yaṃ
tika-s0305t:328_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:329_0: Pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃ anuvattanakathā āciṇṇā, ananuvattanakathā pana
tika-s0305t:329_1: tassā aparā dutiyā nāma hotīti āha – “dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā”ti. Evanti iminā
tika-s0305t:329_2: “sace panā”tiādikaṃ sabbampi vuttākāraṃ paccāmasati, na “purisassa mātugāmāsubha”ntiādikaṃ vuccamānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:330_0: Yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānatāya bhāvanāya ārammaṇaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuccatīti āha “kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0305t:330_1: gocara”nti. Uggahetvāti yathā uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati, evaṃ uggahakosallassa sampādanavasena uggahetvā.
tika-s0305t:331_0: Haratīti kammaṭṭhānaṃ pavatteti, yāva piṇḍapātapaṭikkamā anuyuñjatīti attho. Na paccāharatīti
tika-s0305t:331_1: āhārūpabhogato yāva divāṭṭhānupasaṅkamanā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paṭineti. Samādāya vattati
tika-s0305t:331_2: sammā ādiyitvā tesaṃ vattānaṃ paripūraṇavasena vattati. Sarīraparikammanti mukhadhovanādisarīrapaṭijagganaṃ.
tika-s0305t:331_3: Dve tayo pallaṅketi dve tayo nisajjāvāre dve tīṇi uṇhāsanāni. Tenāha – “usumaṃ gāhāpento”ti.
tika-s0305t:331_4: Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevāti kammaṭṭhānamukheneva kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahanto eva. Tena “pattopi
tika-s0305t:331_5: acetano”tiādinā pavattetabbakammaṭṭhānaṃ, yathāparihariyamānaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahitvāti
tika-s0305t:331_6: dasseti. Tathevāti tikkhattumeva. Paribhogacetiyato sarīracetiyaṃ garutaranti katvā
tika-s0305t:331_7: “cetiyaṃ vanditvā”ti cetiyavandanāya paṭhamaṃ karaṇīyatā vuttā. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0305t:331_9: bodhiñca paṇipātakaraṇanti āha – “buddhassa bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccakāraṃ
tika-s0305t:332_0: Janasaṅgahaṇatthanti “mayi akathente etesaṃ ko kathessatī”ti dhammānuggahena janasaṅgahaṇatthaṃ.
tika-s0305t:332_1: Tasmāti yasmā “dhammakathā nāma kathetabbā evā”ti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti, yasmā
tika-s0305t:332_2: ca dhammakathā kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma natthi, tasmā. Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevāti attanā
tika-s0305t:332_3: parihariyamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahanto tadanuguṇaṃyeva dhammakathaṃ kathetvā. Anumodanaṃ
tika-s0305t:332_5: paricito aparicitotiādivibhāgaṃ akatvā sampattakoṭiyā eva, samāgamamattenevāti attho.
tika-s0305t:333_0: Kammajatejoti gahaṇiṃ sandhāyāha. Kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ nārohati khudāparissamena kilantakāyattā
tika-s0305t:333_1: samādhānābhāvato. Avasesaṭṭhāneti yāguyā aggahitaṭṭhāne. Poṅkhānupoṅkhanti kammaṭṭhānupaṭṭhānassa
tika-s0305t:333_2: aviccheda-dassanametaṃ, yathā poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ pavattāya sarapaṭipāṭiyā anavicchedo,
tika-s0305t:334_0: Nikkhittadhuro bhāvanānuyoge. Vattapaṭipattiyā apūraṇena sabbavattāni bhinditvā.
tika-s0305t:334_1: Kāme avītarāgo hoti. Kāye avītarāgo. Rūpe avītarāgo. Yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehaṃ bhuñjitvā
tika-s0305t:334_2: seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati. Aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya
tika-s0305t:334_3: brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ pañcavidhacetovinibandhacitto. Caritvāti pavattitvā.
tika-s0305t:335_1: etassa atthīti gatapaccāgatikaṃ, tadeva vattaṃ, tassa vasena. Attano hitasukhaṃ kāmenti
tika-s0305t:335_2: icchantīti attakāmā, dhammacchandavanto. “Dhammo”ti hi hitaṃ taṃnimittakañca sukhanti.
tika-s0305t:335_3: Atha vā viññūnaṃ dhammānaṃ attaniyattā attabhāvaparicchannattā ca attā nāma dhammo.
tika-s0305t:335_4: Tenāha bhagavā – “attadīpā, bhikkhave, viharatha attasaraṇā”tiādi. Taṃ kāmenti icchantīti
tika-s0305t:335_5: attakāmā. Usabhaṃ nāma vīsati yaṭṭhiyo. Tāya saññāyāti tāya pāsāṇasaññāya, “ettakaṃ
tika-s0305t:335_6: ṭhānamāgatā”ti jānantāti adhippāyo. So eva nayo ayaṃ bhikkhūtiādiko yo ṭhāne vutto,
tika-s0305t:335_7: so eva nisajjāyapi nayo. Pacchato āgacchantānaṃ chinnabhattabhāvabhayenapi yonisomanasikāraṃ paribrūheti.
tika-s0305t:336_0: Maddantāti dhaññakaraṇaṭṭhāne sālisīsāni maddantā. Mahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmīti amhākaṃ
tika-s0305t:336_1: atthāya lokanāthena cha vassāni kataṃ dukkaracariyaṃ evāhaṃ yathāsatti pūjessāmīti.
tika-s0305t:336_2: Paṭipattipūjā hi satthupūjā, na āmisapūjāti. Ṭhānacaṅkamamevāti adhiṭṭhātabbairiyāpathakālavasena
tika-s0305t:336_3: vuttaṃ, na bhojanādikālesu avassaṃ kātabbanisajjāya paṭikkhepavasena.
tika-s0305t:337_0: Vīthiṃ otaritvā ito cito anoloketvā paṭhamameva vīthiyo sallakkhetabbāti āha “vīthiyo
tika-s0305t:337_1: sallakkhetvā”ti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuccati – “pāsādikena abhikkantenā”tiādi. Taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0305t:337_2: “tattha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āhāre paṭikūlasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0305t:337_3: taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatanti “yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā”tiādinā
tika-s0305t:337_4: vuttehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ katvā. Neva davāyātiādi pana paṭikkhepadassanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:338_0: Paccekabodhiṃ sacchikaroti, yadi upanissayasampanno hotīti sambandho. Idañca yathā
tika-s0305t:338_1: heṭṭhā tīsu ṭhānesu, evaṃ ito paresu ṭhānesu upanetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Tattha paccekabodhiyā
tika-s0305t:338_2: upanissayasampadā kappānaṃ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni satasahassañca tajjaṃ puññañāṇasambhārasambharaṇaṃ,
tika-s0305t:338_3: sāvakabodhiyaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ kappasatasahassañca, mahāsāvakānaṃ
tika-s0305t:338_4: kappasatasahassameva tajjaṃ sambhārasambharaṇaṃ, itaresaṃ atītāsu jātīsu vivaṭṭasannissayavasena
tika-s0305t:338_5: nibbattitaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ kusalaṃ. Bāhiyo dārucīriyoti bāhiyavisaye jātasaṃvaddhatāya
tika-s0305t:338_6: bāhiyo, dārucīrapariharaṇena dārucīriyoti laddhasamañño. So hi āyasmā “tasmātiha
tika-s0305t:338_7: te, bāhiya, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ – diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”tiādivasappavattena
tika-s0305t:338_8: saṃkhitteneva ovādena khippataraṃ visesaṃ adhigacchi. Tena vuttaṃ “khippābhiñño vā
tika-s0305t:338_9: hoti seyyathāpi thero bāhiyo dārucīriyo”ti. Evaṃ mahāpañño vātiādīsu yathārahaṃ vattabbanti.
tika-s0305t:339_0: Tanti asammuyhanaṃ. Evanti idāni vuccamānākāradassanaṃ. Attā abhikkamatīti iminā
tika-s0305t:339_1: andhaputhujjanassa diṭṭhiggāhavasena abhikkame sammuyhanaṃ dasseti, ahaṃ abhikkamāmīti
tika-s0305t:339_2: pana iminā mānaggāhavasena, tadubhayaṃ pana taṇhāya vinā na hotīti taṇhāggāhavasenapi
tika-s0305t:339_3: sammuyhanaṃ dassitameva hoti, “tathā asammuyhanto”ti vatvā taṃ asammuyhanaṃ yena
tika-s0305t:339_4: ghanavinibbhogena hoti, taṃ dassento “abhikkamāmīti citte uppajjamāne”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:339_5: Tattha yasmā vāyodhātuyā anugatā tejodhātu uddharaṇassa paccayo. Uddharaṇagatikā
tika-s0305t:339_6: hi tejodhātūti uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo, tasmā imāsaṃ dvinnamettha
tika-s0305t:339_7: dhātūnaṃ sāmatthiyato adhimattatā, itarāsañca omattatāti dassento “ekekapāduddharaṇe…pe…
tika-s0305t:339_8: balavatiyo”ti āha. Yasmā pana tejodhātuyā anugatā vāyodhātu atiharaṇavītiharaṇānaṃ
tika-s0305t:339_9: paccayo. Tiriyagatikāya hi vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu sātisayo byāpāroti tejodhātuyā
tika-s0305t:339_10: tassānugatabhāvo, tasmā imāsaṃ dvinnamettha sāmatthiyato adhimattatā, itarāsañca
tika-s0305t:339_11: omattatāti dassento “tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesū”ti āha. Satipi anugamanānugantabbatāvisese
tika-s0305t:340_0: Tattha akkantaṭṭhānato pādassa ukkhipanaṃ uddharaṇaṃ, ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā purato
tika-s0305t:340_2: vā passena haraṇaṃ vītiharaṇaṃ. Yāva patiṭṭhitapādo, tāva āharaṇaṃ atiharaṇaṃ, tato
tika-s0305t:340_3: paraṃ haraṇaṃ vītiharaṇanti ayaṃ vā etesaṃ viseso. Yasmā pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātu
tika-s0305t:340_4: vossajjanassa paccayo. Garutarasabhāvā hi āpodhātūti vossajjane pathavīdhātuyā tassānugatabhāvo,
tika-s0305t:340_5: tasmā tāsaṃ dvinnamettha sāmatthiyato adhimattatā, itarāsañca omattatāti dassento
tika-s0305t:340_6: āha “vossajjane…pe… balavatiyo”ti. Yasmā pana āpodhātuyā anugatā pathavīdhātu sannikkhepanassa
tika-s0305t:340_7: paccayo. Patiṭṭhābhāve viya patiṭṭhāpanepi tassā sātisayakiccattā āpodhātuyā tassā
tika-s0305t:340_8: anugatabhāvo, tathā ghaṭṭanakiriyāya pathavīdhātuyā vasena sannirumbhanassa sijjhanato
tika-s0305t:340_9: tatthāpi pathavīdhātuyā āpodhātuanugatabhāvo, tasmā vuttaṃ – “tathā sannikkhepanasannirumbhanesū”ti.
tika-s0305t:341_0: Tatthāti tasmiṃ abhikkamane, tesu vā vuttesu uddharaṇādīsu chasu koṭṭhāsesu. Uddharaṇeti
tika-s0305t:341_1: uddharaṇakkhaṇe. Rūpārūpadhammāti uddharaṇākārena pavattā rūpadhammā taṃsamuṭṭhāpakā
tika-s0305t:341_2: arūpadhammā ca. Atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti khaṇamattāvaṭṭhānato. Tattha tatthevāti yattha
tika-s0305t:341_3: yattha uppannā, tattha tattheva. Na hi dhammānaṃ desantarasaṅkamanaṃ atthi. Pabbaṃ
tika-s0305t:341_4: pabbantiādi uddharaṇādikoṭṭhāse sandhāya sabhāgasantativasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:341_5: Atiittaro hi rūpadhammānampi pavattikkhaṇo, gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyāyena
tika-s0305t:341_6: paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi pāde ca baddhakhuradhārāsamāgamatopi sīghataro. Yathā
tika-s0305t:341_7: tilānaṃ bhajjiyamānānaṃ taṭataṭāyanena bhedo lakkhīyati, evaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ uppādenāti
tika-s0305t:341_8: dassanatthaṃ “taṭataṭāyantā”ti vuttaṃ. Uppannā hi ekantato bhijjantīti.
tika-s0305t:342_0: Saddhiṃ rūpenāti idaṃ tassa tassa cittassa nirodhena saddhiṃ nirujjhanakarūpadhammavasena
tika-s0305t:342_1: vuttaṃ, yaṃ tato sattarasamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ. Aññathā yadi rūpārūpadhammā
tika-s0305t:342_2: samānakkhaṇā siyuṃ, “rūpaṃ garupariṇāmaṃ dandhanirodha”ntiādivacanehi virodho siyā.
tika-s0305t:342_3: Tathā – “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ,
tika-s0305t:342_4: yathayidaṃ citta”nti evamādipāḷiyā ca. Cittacetasikā hi sārammaṇasabhāvā yathābalaṃ
tika-s0305t:342_5: attano ārammaṇapaccayabhūtamatthaṃ vibhāventāyeva uppajjantīti tesaṃ taṃsabhāvanipphattianantaraṃ
tika-s0305t:342_6: nirodho, rūpadhammā pana anārammaṇā pakāsetabbā. Evaṃ tesaṃ pakāsetabbabhāvanipphatti
tika-s0305t:342_7: soḷasahi cittehi hotīti taṅkhaṇāyukatā tesaṃ icchitā, lahukaviññāṇassa visayasaṅgatimattapaccayatāya
tika-s0305t:342_8: tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ, visayasaṅgatimattatāya ca viññāṇassa lahuparivattitā, dandhamahābhūtapaccayatāya
tika-s0305t:342_9: rūpadhammānaṃ dandhaparivattitā. Nānādhātuyā yathābhūtañāṇaṃ kho pana tathāgatasseva,
tika-s0305t:342_10: tena ca purejātapaccayo rūpadhammova vutto, pacchājātapaccayo ca tassevāti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ
tika-s0305t:342_11: samānakkhaṇatā na yujjateva, tasmā vuttanayenevettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:343_0: Aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ, aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti yaṃ purimuppannaṃ cittaṃ, taṃ aññaṃ,
tika-s0305t:343_1: taṃ pana nirujjhantaṃ aparassa anantarādipaccayo hutvā eva nirujjhatīti tathāladdhapaccayaṃ
tika-s0305t:343_2: aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ. Yadi evaṃ tesaṃ antaro labbheyyāti, noti āha “avīcimanupabandho”ti.
tika-s0305t:343_3: Yathā vīci antaro na labbhati, “tadeveta”nti avisesavidū maññanti, evaṃ anu anu pabandho
tika-s0305t:343_4: cittasantāno rūpasantāno ca nadīsotova nadiyaṃ udakappavāho viya vattati.
tika-s0305t:344_0: Abhimukhaṃ lokitaṃ ālokitanti āha “puratopekkhana”nti. Yasmā yaṃdisābhimukho gacchati
tika-s0305t:344_1: tiṭṭhati nisīdati vā, tadabhimukhaṃ pekkhanaṃ ālokitaṃ, tasmā tadanugataṃ vidisālokanaṃ
tika-s0305t:344_3: olokitassa, ullokāharaṇādīsu ullokitassa, pacchato āgacchantassa parissayassa parivajjanādivasena
tika-s0305t:344_4: apalokitassa ca siyā sambhavoti āha – “iminā vā mukhena sabbānipi tāni gahitānevā”ti.
tika-s0305t:345_0: Kāyasakkhinti kāyena sacchikatavantaṃ, paccakkhakārinanti attho. Sohāyasmā vipassanākāle
tika-s0305t:345_1: eva “yamevāhaṃ indriyesu aguttadvārataṃ nissāya sāsane anabhiratiādivippakāraṃ patto,
tika-s0305t:345_2: tameva suṭṭhu niggahessāmī”ti ussāhajāto balavahirottappo, tattha ca katādhikārattā
tika-s0305t:345_3: indriyasaṃvare ukkaṃsapāramippatto, teneva naṃ satthā – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama
tika-s0305t:345_4: sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
tika-s0305t:346_0: Sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā ālokitavilokitassāti ānetvā sambandho. Tasmāti
tika-s0305t:346_2: Attano kammaṭṭhānavaseneva ālokanavilokanaṃ kātabbaṃ, khandhādikammaṭṭhānikehi añño
tika-s0305t:346_3: upāyo na gavesitabboti adhippāyo. Yasmā ālokitādisamaññāpi dhammamattasseva pavattiviseso,
tika-s0305t:346_4: tasmā tassa yāthāvato pajānanaṃ asammohasampajaññanti dassetuṃ “abbhantare”tiādi
tika-s0305t:346_6: calanākārapavattivasena. Adho sīdatīti thokaṃ otarati. Uddhaṃ laṅghetīti laṅghantaṃ
tika-s0305t:347_0: Aṅgakiccaṃ sādhayamānanti padhānabhūtaṃ aṅgakiccaṃ nipphādentaṃ, upapattibhavassa
tika-s0305t:347_1: sarīraṃ hutvāti attho. Paṭhamajavanepi…pe… sattamajavanepi na hotīti idaṃ pañcadvāraviññāṇavīthiyaṃ
tika-s0305t:347_2: “itthī puriso”ti rajjanādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha hi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ
tika-s0305t:347_3: ayoniso āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanavasena iṭṭhe itthirūpādimhi lobhamattaṃ, aniṭṭhe paṭighamattaṃ
tika-s0305t:347_4: uppajjati. Manodvāre pana “itthī puriso”ti rajjanādi hoti, tassa pañcadvārajavanaṃ
tika-s0305t:347_5: mūlaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ vā sabbaṃ bhavaṅgādi. Evaṃ manodvārajavanassa mūlabhūtadhammaparijānanavaseneva
tika-s0305t:347_6: mūlapariññā vuttā, āgantukatāvakālikatā pana pañcadvārajavanasseva apubbabhāvavasena
tika-s0305t:347_7: ceva ittarabhāvavasena ca vuttā. Heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesūti heṭṭhimassa
tika-s0305t:348: Tanti javanaṃ. Tassa javanassa na yuttanti sambandho. Āgantuko abbhāgato. Udayabbayaparicchinno tāvatako kālo etesanti tāvakālikāni.
tika-s0305t:349_0: Etaṃ asammohasampajaññaṃ. Samavāyeti sāmaggiyaṃ. Tatthāti pañcakkhandhavasena ālokanavilokane
tika-s0305t:349_1: paññāyamāne tabbinimutto – ko eko āloketi, ko viloketi. Upanissayapaccayoti idaṃ
tika-s0305t:349_2: suttantanayena pariyāyato vuttaṃ. Sahajātapaccayoti nidassanamattametaṃ aññamaññasampayuttaatthiavigatādipaccayānampi labbhanato.
tika-s0305t:350: Kāleti samiñjituṃ yuttakāle samiñjantassa, tathā pasāretuṃ yuttakāle pasārentassa. “Maṇisappo nāma ekā sappajātī”ti vadanti. Laḷananti kampanaṃ, līḷākaraṇaṃ vā.
tika-s0305t:351_0: Uṇhapakatiko pariḷāhabahulakāyo. Sīlassa vidūsanena ahitāvahattā micchājīvavasena
tika-s0305t:351_1: uppannaṃ asappāyaṃ. “Cīvarampi acetana”ntiādinā cīvarassa viya kāyopi acetanoti kāyassa
tika-s0305t:353_1: kāyassa ṭhitiyā”tiādinā nayena vutto daṭṭhabbo. Imasmiṃ pakkhe “neva davāyātiādinā
tika-s0305t:353_2: nayenā”ti pana idaṃ paṭikkhepaṅgadassanamukhena pāḷi āgatāti katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:354_0: Pathavīsandhārakajalassa taṃsandhārakavāyunā viya paribhuttassa āhārassa vāyodhātuyāva
tika-s0305t:354_1: āsaye avaṭṭhānanti āha – “vāyodhātuvaseneva tiṭṭhatī”ti. Atiharatīti yāva mukhā abhiharati.
tika-s0305t:354_2: Vītiharatīti tato kucchiyaṃ vimissaṃ karonto harati. Atiharatīti vā mukhadvāraṃ atikkāmento
tika-s0305t:354_3: harati. Vītiharatīti kucchigataṃ passato harati. Parivattetīti aparāparaṃ cāreti.
tika-s0305t:354_4: Ettha ca āhārassa dhāraṇaparivattanasañcuṇṇanavisosanāni pathavīdhātusahitā eva vāyodhātu
tika-s0305t:354_5: karoti, na kevalāti tāni pathavīdhātuyā kiccabhāvena vuttāni, sā eva dhāraṇādīni
tika-s0305t:354_6: kiccāni karontassa sādhāraṇāti vuttāni. Allattañca anupāletīti yathā vāyodhātuādīhi
tika-s0305t:354_7: aññehi visosanaṃ na hoti, tathā anupāleti allabhāvaṃ. Tejodhātūti gahaṇīsaṅkhātā
tika-s0305t:354_8: tejodhātu. Sā hi antopaviṭṭhaṃ āhāraṃ paripāceti. Añjaso hotīti āhārassa pavisanādīnaṃ
tika-s0305t:354_10: ca āvajjeti, vijānātīti attho. Taṃtaṃvijānanassa paccayabhūtoyeva hi payogo “sammāpayogo”ti
tika-s0305t:354_11: vutto. Yena hi payogena pariyesanādi nipphajjati, so tabbisayavijānanampi nipphādeti
tika-s0305t:354_12: nāma tadavinābhāvato. Atha vā sammāpayogaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ anvāya āgamma ābhujati
tika-s0305t:354_13: samannāharati. Ābhogapubbako hi sabbopi viññāṇabyāpāroti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:355_0: Gamanatoti bhikkhācāravasena gocaragāmaṃ uddissa gamanato. Pariyesanatoti gocaragāme
tika-s0305t:355_1: bhikkhatthaṃ āhiṇḍanato. Paribhogatoti āhārassa paribhuñjanato. Āsayatoti pittādiāsayato.
tika-s0305t:355_2: Āsayati ettha ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammabalavavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ
tika-s0305t:355_3: asaṅkarato sayati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti āsayo, āmāsayassa upari tiṭṭhanako pittādiko.
tika-s0305t:355_4: Mariyādattho hi ayamākāro. Nidheti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati etthāti
tika-s0305t:355_5: nidhānaṃ, āmāsayo, tato nidhānato. Aparipakkatoti gahaṇīsaṅkhātena kammajatejena
tika-s0305t:355_6: avipakkato. Paripakkatoti yathābhuttassa āhārassa vipakkabhāvato. Phalatoti nipphattito.
tika-s0305t:355_7: Nissandatoti ito cito ca vissandanato. Sammakkhanatoti sabbaso makkhanato. Ayamettha
tika-s0305t:356_0: Sarīrato sedā muccantīti vegasandhāraṇena uppannapariḷāhato sarīrato sedā muccanti.
tika-s0305t:356_1: Aññe ca rogā kaṇṇasūlabhagandarādayo. Aṭṭhāneti manussāmanussapariggahe ayuttaṭṭhāne
tika-s0305t:356_2: khettadevāyatanādike. Kuddhā hi manussā amanussāpi vā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpenti. Vissaṭṭhattā
tika-s0305t:356_3: neva tassa bhikkhuno attano, kassaci anissajjitattā jigucchanīyattā ca na parassa,
tika-s0305t:357_0: Ettha ca eko iriyāpatho dvīsu ṭhānesu āgato, so pubbe abhikkamapaṭikkamagahaṇena.
tika-s0305t:357_1: “Gamanepi purato pacchato ca kāyassa abhiharaṇaṃ vuttanti idha gamanameva gahita”nti
tika-s0305t:357_2: apare. Yasmā idha sampajaññakathāyaṃ asammohasampajaññameva dhuraṃ, tasmā antarantare
tika-s0305t:357_3: iriyāpathe pavattānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ tattha tattheva nirodhadassanavasena sampajānakāritā
tika-s0305t:357_4: gahitāti. Majjhimabhāṇakā pana evaṃ vadanti – eko hi bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṃ cintento,
tika-s0305t:357_5: aññaṃ vitakkento gacchati, eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva gacchati, tathā eko tiṭṭhanto,
tika-s0305t:357_6: nisīdanto, sayanto aññaṃ cintento, aññaṃ vitakkento sayati, eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva
tika-s0305t:357_7: sayati. Ettakena pana na pākaṭaṃ hotīti caṅkamanena dīpenti. Yo bhikkhu caṅkamanaṃ
tika-s0305t:357_8: otaritvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito pariggaṇhāti – “pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattā rūpārūpadhammā
tika-s0305t:357_9: pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattāpi
tika-s0305t:357_10: pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, caṅkamanamajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo
tika-s0305t:357_11: appatvā ettheva niruddhā, caṅkamane pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṃ appatvā ettheva
tika-s0305t:357_12: niruddhā, ṭhāne pavattā nisajjaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, nisajjāya pavattā sayanaṃ
tika-s0305t:357_13: appatvā ettheva niruddhā”ti, evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhanto eva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ
tika-s0305t:357_14: otāreti, uṭṭhahanto pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva uṭṭhahati. Ayaṃ bhikkhu gatādīsu
tika-s0305t:358_0: Evampi sutte kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ na kātabbaṃ, tasmā
tika-s0305t:358_1: so bhikkhu yāva sakkoti, tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṃ pariggahetvā
tika-s0305t:358_2: sayati – “kāyo acetano mañco acetano, kāyo na jānāti ‘ahaṃ mañce sayito’ti, mañcopi
tika-s0305t:358_3: na jānāti ‘mayi kāyo sayito’ti, acetano kāyo acetane mañce sayito”ti, evaṃ pariggaṇhanto
tika-s0305t:358_4: eva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti, pabujjhanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva pabujjhatīti ayaṃ
tika-s0305t:358_5: sutte sampajānakārī nāma hoti. Kāyikādikiriyānibbattanena tammayattā āvajjanakiriyānibbattakattā
tika-s0305t:358_6: āvajjanakiriyāsamuṭṭhitattā ca javanaṃ, sabbampi vā chadvārappavattaṃ kiriyāmayapavattaṃ
tika-s0305t:358_7: nāma, tasmiṃ sati jāgaritaṃ nāma hotīti pariggaṇhanto jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma.
tika-s0305t:358_8: Apica rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañca koṭṭhāse jaggantopi jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hotīti.
tika-s0305t:359_0: Vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā dhammaṃ desentopi bāttiṃsatiracchānakathaṃ pahāya dasakathāvatthunissitasappāyakathaṃ
tika-s0305t:359_1: kathentopi bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma hoti. Aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ
tika-s0305t:359_2: ārammaṇaṃ manasikāraṃ pavattentopi dutiyajjhānaṃ samāpannopi tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī
tika-s0305t:359_3: nāma. Dutiyañhi jhānaṃ vacīsaṅkhārappahānato visesato tuṇhībhāvo nāmāti. Oṭṭhe cātiādīsu
tika-s0305t:359_4: ca-saddena kaṇṭhasīsanābhiādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tadanurūpaṃ payoganti tassa uppattiyā
tika-s0305t:359_5: anucchavikaṃ cittassa pavattiākārasaññitaṃ payogaṃ, yato sabbe vicārādayo nipphajjanti.
tika-s0305t:359_7: Sattasupi ṭhānesu asammuyhanavasena “missaka”nti vuttaṃ. Maggasammāsatiyāpi kāyānupassanādianurūpattā
tika-s0305t:362_0: 369. Yasmā so bhikkhu “desetu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhamma”nti saṃkhittena
tika-s0305t:362_1: dhammadesanaṃ yāci, tassa saṃkhittarucibhāvato, tasmā saṃkhitteneva dhammaṃ desetukāmo
tika-s0305t:362_2: bhagavā “tasmātihā”tiādimāhāti vuttaṃ – “yasmā saṃkhittena desanaṃ yācasi, tasmā”ti.
tika-s0305t:364_0: 370. Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyadukkhe apātanavasena dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhammo,
tika-s0305t:364_1: sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ, tadeva tadaṅgādivasena kilesānaṃ vinayanaṭṭhena vinayoti āha
tika-s0305t:364_2: – “dhammoti vā…pe… nāma”nti. Paṭipakkhadhammehi anabhibhūtatāya eko udetīti ekodīti
tika-s0305t:364_3: laddhanāmo samādhi bhūto jāto etesanti ekodibhūtā. Ettha ca ekodibhūtāti etena upacārajjhānāvaho
tika-s0305t:364_4: pubbabhāgiko samādhi vutto. Samāhitāti etena upacārappanāsamādhi. Ekaggacittāti etena
tika-s0305t:364_5: subhāvito vasippatto appanāsamādhi vuttoti veditabbo. Navakabhikkhūhi bhāvitasatipaṭṭhānā
tika-s0305t:364_6: pubbabhāgā. Te hi yathābhūtañāṇāya bhāvitā. Yathābhūtañāṇanti hi sotāpattimaggañāṇaṃ
tika-s0305t:364_7: idhādhippetaṃ. Khīṇāsavehi bhāvitasatipaṭṭhānāpi pubbabhāgā. Tesañhi katakaraṇīyānaṃ
tika-s0305t:364_9: pariññatthāya pavattā lokiyā, parijānanavasena pavattā lokuttarāti “missakā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:366: 371. Pañcame kevaloti kusaladhammehi asammisso, tato eva sakalo sukkapakkho anavajjaṭṭho. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-s0305t:368_0: 372. Pākatikasakuṇakulesu balavabhāvato tesaṃ hananato sakuṇagghi. Senoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0305t:368_1: “senassetaṃ adhivacana”nti, senaviseso pana so veditabbo. Āmisatthāya pattattā “lobhasāhasena
tika-s0305t:368_2: pattā”ti vuttaṃ, lobhanimittena sāhasākārena pattāti attho. Naṅgalena kaṭṭhaṃ kasitaṃ
tika-s0305t:368_3: naṅgalakaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ karīyati etthāti naṅgalakaṭṭhakaraṇanti āha – “adhunā kaṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0305t:368_4: khettaṭṭhāna”nti. Leḍḍuyo tiṭṭhanti etthāti leḍḍuṭṭhānaṃ, leḍḍunimittaṃ kasitaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:368_5: Vajjatīti vadaṃ, vacanaṃ. Kucchitaṃ vadaṃ avadaṃ. Garahane hi ayaṃ a-kāro yathā –
tika-s0305t:368_6: “aputto abhariyā”ti. Avadaṃ mānetīti avadamānā, attano balamadena lāpaṃ atimaññitvā
tika-s0305t:368_7: vadantīti attho. Tenevāha “gaccha kho, tvaṃ lāpa, tatrapi me gantvā na mokkhasī”ti.
tika-s0305t:368_8: Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “attano balassa suṭṭhu vaṇṇaṃ vadamānā”ti, tattha attato
tika-s0305t:368_9: āpannaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. “Vadamāno”ti vā pāṭho, sārambhavasena avhāyantoti attho.
tika-s0305t:368_10: Tenāha “ehi kho dāni sakuṇagghī”ti. Suṭṭhu ṭhapetvāti jiyāmuttasarassa viya sīghapātayogyatākaraṇena
tika-s0305t:368_11: ubho pakkhe sammā ṭhapetvā. Ayanti sakuṇagghi. Ñatvāti yathābhūtadassanena attano
tika-s0305t:368_12: ñāṇena jānitvā. Phālīyitthāti phālacchedatikhiṇasikhare sukkhaleḍḍusmiṃ bhijjittha.
tika-s0305t:370_0: 373. Sañcāroti sañcaraṇaṃ. Lepanti silesasadisaṃ ālepanaṃ. Kājasikkā viyāti kājadaṇḍake
tika-s0305t:370_1: olaggetabbā sikkā viya. Apica catasso rajjuyo upari bandhanaṭṭhānañcāti pañcaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:372_0: 374. Āhārasampādanena taṃtaṃāhāravatthugate sūdeti paggharetīti sūdo, bhattakārako.
tika-s0305t:372_1: Daharehi manāpataraṃ accetabbato atikkamitabbato accayā, bhojane rasavisesā, tasmā
tika-s0305t:372_2: nānaccayehīti nānappakārarasavisesehīti attho. Tena vuttaṃ “nānaccayehī”tiādi. Aggīyati
tika-s0305t:372_3: asaṅkarato vibhajīyatīti aggo, ambilameva aggo ambilaggoti āha – “ambilaggehīti ambilakoṭṭhāsehī”ti.
tika-s0305t:372_4: Dātuṃ abhiharitabbatāya abhihārā, deyyadhammā. Tenāha – “abhihaṭānaṃ dāyāna”nti.
tika-s0305t:372_5: Idaṃ me kammaṭṭhānaṃ anulomaṃvāti idaṃ mama kammaṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ pavattamānaṃ anulomāvasānameva
tika-s0305t:372_6: hutvā tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ puna pavattamānaṃ ussakkitvā visesanibbattanatthameva hotīti
tika-s0305t:372_7: evaṃ nimittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti bālo abyatto, paṇḍito pana sakkoti. Attano cittassāti
tika-s0305t:372_8: attano bhāvanācittassa. Pubbabhāgavipassanā satipaṭṭhānāva kathitā “sakassa cittassa
tika-s0305t:374_0: 375. Pādagāmoti nagarassa padasadiso mahantagāmo. Tenevāha “vesāliyaṃ viharati veḷuvagāmake”ti.
tika-s0305t:374_2: mittā. Ye pana diṭṭhamattasahāyā, te sandiṭṭhā. Ye savisesaṃ bhattimanto, te sambhattāti
tika-s0305t:374_3: dassento “mittāti mittāvā”tiādimāha. Assāti bhagavato. Pañcamiyaṃ aṭṭhamiyaṃ cātuddasiyaṃ
tika-s0305t:374_4: pañcadasiyanti ekekasmiṃ pakkhe cattāro vāre katvā māsassa aṭṭhavāre.
tika-s0305t:375_0: Vedanānaṃ balavabhāvena kharo pharuso kakkhaḷo. Ābādhoti pubbakammahetutāya kammasamuṭṭhāno
tika-s0305t:375_1: ābādho saṅkhāradukkhatāsaṅkhāto sabbakālikattā sarīrassa sabhāgarogo nāma. Nāyamīdiso
tika-s0305t:375_2: ābādho, ayaṃ pana bahalatarabyādhitāya “visabhāgarogo”ti vutto. Anta-saddo samīpapavattoti
tika-s0305t:375_4: Apīḷiyamānoti apīḷiyamāno viya. Ovādameva bhikkhusaṅghassa apalokananti āha – “ovādānusāsaniṃ
tika-s0305t:375_5: adatvāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Pubbabhāgavīriyaṃ nāma phalasamāpattiyā parikammabhūtavipassanāvīriyaṃ.
tika-s0305t:375_6: Jīvitampi jīvitasaṅkhāro patituṃ adatvā attabhāvassa abhisaṅkharaṇato.
tika-s0305t:376_0: “Ettakaṃ kālaṃ atikkamitvā vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti khaṇaparicchedavatī samāpatti khaṇikasamāpatti.
tika-s0305t:376_1: Niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvāti rūpasattakārūpasattakavasena pavattiyamānaṃ vipassanābhāvanaṃ
tika-s0305t:376_2: sabbaso khilavirahena niggumbaṃ, abyākulatāya nijjaṭaṃ katvā. Mahāvipassanāvasenāti
tika-s0305t:376_3: paccekaṃ savisesaṃ vitthāritānaṃ aṭṭhārasādīnaṃ mahāvipassanānaṃ vasena vipassitvā
tika-s0305t:376_4: samāpannā yā samāpatti, sā suṭṭhu vikkhambheti vedanaṃ mahābalavatāya pubbārammaṇassa,
tika-s0305t:376_5: mahānubhāvatāya tathāpavattitavipassanāvīriyassa. Yathā nāmātiādinā tassa nidassanaṃ
tika-s0305t:376_6: dasseti. Vedanāti dukkhavedanā. Cuddasahākārehīti tasseva sattakadvayassa vasena
tika-s0305t:377_0: Gilānā vuṭṭhitoti gilānabhāvato vuṭṭhito. Sarīrassa garuthaddhabhāvappatti madhurakatāti
tika-s0305t:377_2: Satipaṭṭhānadhammāti pubbe attanā bhāviyamānā satipaṭṭhānadhammā. Pākaṭā na honti
tika-s0305t:377_3: kāyacittānaṃ akammaññatāya. Tanti dhammāti pariyattidhammā na ñāyanti.
tika-s0305t:378_0: Anantaraṃ abāhiranti dhammavasena puggalavasena ca antarabāhiraṃ akatvā. Ettakantiādinā
tika-s0305t:378_1: vuttamevatthaṃ vivarati. Daharakāleti attano daharakāle. Na evaṃ hotīti “ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
tika-s0305t:378_3: na hoti, nattheva pageva tesaṃ samucchinnattāti āha – “bodhipallaṅkeyevā”tiādi. Paṭisaṅkharaṇena
tika-s0305t:378_4: veṭhena missakena. Maññeti yathāvuttaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇasaññitena veṭhamissakena viya
tika-s0305t:379_0: Phalasamāpattiyā adhippetattā “ekaccānaṃ vedanānanti lokiyānaṃ vedanāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:379_1: Attadīpāti ettha atta-saddena dhammo eva vutto, svāyamattho heṭṭhā vibhāvito eva.
tika-s0305t:379_2: Navavidho lokuttaradhammo veditabbo. So hi catūhi oghehi anajjhottharaṇīyato “dīpo”ti
tika-s0305t:379_3: vutto. Tamaaggeti tamayogābhāvena sadevakassa lokassa agge. Sabbesanti sabbesaṃ sikkhākāmānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:379_4: Te “dhammadīpā viharathā”ti vuttā catusatipaṭṭhānagocarāva bhikkhū agge bhavissanti.
tika-s0305t:381: 376. Kammaṭṭhānakammikāti kammaṭṭhānamanuyuttā. Visesetīti viseso, atisayo, svāyaṃ pubbāparaviseso upādāyupādāya gahetabboti taṃ dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:382_0: Uppajjati kilesapariḷāhoti kāye asubhādivasena manasikāraṃ adahantassa manasikārassa
tika-s0305t:382_1: vīthiyaṃ apaṭipannatā subhādivasena kāyārammaṇo kilesapariḷāho ca uppajjati. Vīriyārambhassa
tika-s0305t:382_2: abhāvena tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cetaso vā līnattaṃ hoti, gocarajjhattato bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe
tika-s0305t:382_3: cittaṃ vikkhipati. Evaṃ kilesapariḷāhe cātiādinā tividhampi bhāvanānuyogassa kilesavatthubhāvaṃ
tika-s0305t:382_4: upādāya samuccayavasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana te pariḷāhalīnattavikkhepā
tika-s0305t:382_5: ekajjhaṃ na pavattanti, tasmā pāḷiyaṃ “kāyārammaṇo vā”tiādinā aniyamattho vā-saddo
tika-s0305t:382_6: gahito. Kilesānurañjitenāti kilesavivaṇṇitacittena hutvā na vattitabbaṃ. Kathaṃ pana
tika-s0305t:382_7: vattitabbanti āha “kismiñcidevā”ti. Na ca vitakketi na ca vicāretīti kilesasahagate
tika-s0305t:382_8: vitakkavicāre na pavatteti. Sukhitoti jhānasukhena sukhito.
tika-s0305t:383_0: Imassa bhikkhuno bhāvanā pavattāti sambandho. Yasmā hi imassa bhikkhuno taṃ mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0305t:383_1: paripanthe sati ṭhapetvā buddhaguṇādianussaraṇena cittaṃ pasādetvā mūlakammaṭṭhānabhāvanā
tika-s0305t:383_2: pavattā, tasmā paṇidhāya bhāvanāti vuttanti sambandho. Aṭṭhapetvāti cittaṃ appavattetvāti
tika-s0305t:383_3: attho veditabbo. Kammaṭṭhānādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi vasena atthayojanā sambhavati. Tenāha
tika-s0305t:383_4: “tatthā”tiādi. Sārento viyāti rathaṃ vāhayanto viya. Samappamāṇato aṭṭhakādivasena
tika-s0305t:383_5: sutacchitaṃ pakkhipanto viya. Sukheneva kilesānaṃ okāsaṃ adento antarā asajjanto
tika-s0305t:383_6: alagganto. Vipassanācārassa āraddhavuttitaṃ aparipanthatañca dassento opammadvayamāha.
tika-s0305t:384: Guḷakhaṇḍādīnīti guḷakhaṇḍasakkharakhaṇḍādīni ucchuvikārabhūtāni. “Kāye kāyānupassī viharāmī”tiādivacanato “pubbabhāgavipassanā kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:388: 378. Dutiyavagge paṭhamasuttaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyanti taṃ laṅghitvā “dutiye”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:389_0: Bhiyyataro abhiññātoti sambodhiyā seṭṭhataroti abhilakkhito. Bhiyyatarābhiññoti sabbasattesu
tika-s0305t:389_1: adhikatarapañño. Tenāha “uttaritarañāṇo”ti. Sammā anavasesato bujjhati etenāti sambodhīti
tika-s0305t:389_2: āha – “sambodhiyanti sabbaññutaññāṇe”ti. Nippadesā gahitāti anavasesā buddhaguṇā
tika-s0305t:389_3: gahitā aggamaggasiddhiyāva bhagavato sabbaguṇānaṃ siddhattā. Na kevalañca buddhānaṃ,
tika-s0305t:390_0: Aparo nayo – pasannoti iminā pasādassa vattamānatā dīpitāti uppannasaddhoti imināpi
tika-s0305t:390_1: saddhāya paccuppannatā pakāsitāti āha – “evaṃ saddahāmīti attho”ti. Abhijānāti abhimukhabhāvena
tika-s0305t:390_2: sabbaññeyyaṃ jānātīti abhiñño, bhiyyo adhiko abhiññoti bhiyyobhiñño. So eva atisayavacanicchāvasena
tika-s0305t:390_3: bhiyyobhiññataroti vuttoti āha – “bhiyyataro abhiññāto”ti. Dutiyavikappe pana abhijānātīti
tika-s0305t:390_4: abhiññā, abhivisiṭṭhā paññā. Bhiyyo abhiññā etassāti bhiyyobhiñño, so eva atisayavacanicchāvasena
tika-s0305t:390_5: bhiyyobhiññataro. Svāyaṃ assa atisayo abhiññāya bhiyyobhāvakatoti āha – “bhiyyatarābhiñño
tika-s0305t:390_6: vā”ti. Sambujjhati etāyāti sambodhi, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ aggamaggañāṇañca. Sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānañhi
tika-s0305t:390_7: aggamaggañāṇaṃ, aggamaggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sambodhi nāma. Tattha
tika-s0305t:390_8: padhānavasena tadatthadassane paṭhamavikappo, padaṭṭhānavasena dutiyavikappo. Kasmā
tika-s0305t:390_9: panettha arahattamaggañāṇasseva gahaṇaṃ, nanu heṭṭhimānipi bhagavato maggañāṇāni
tika-s0305t:390_10: savāsanameva yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanavasena pavattāni. Savāsanappahānañhi ñeyyāvaraṇappahānanti?
tika-s0305t:390_11: Saccametaṃ, taṃ pana aparipuṇṇaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanassa vippakatabhāvatoti āha “arahattamaggañāṇe
tika-s0305t:391_0: Khādanīyānaṃ uḷāratā sātarasānubhāvenāti āha “madhure āgacchatī”ti. Pasaṃsāya uḷāratā
tika-s0305t:391_1: visiṭṭhabhāvenāti āha – “seṭṭhe”ti. Obhāsassa uḷāratā mahantabhāvenāti vuttaṃ – “vipule”ti.
tika-s0305t:391_2: Usabhassa ayanti āsabhī, idha pana āsabhī viyāti āsabhī. Tenāha – “usabhassa vācāsadisī”ti.
tika-s0305t:391_3: Yena guṇena sā taṃsadisā, taṃ dassetuṃ “acalā asampavedhī”ti vuttaṃ. Yato kutoci
tika-s0305t:391_4: anussavanaṃ anussavo. Vijjāṭṭhānādīsu kataparicayānaṃ ācariyānaṃ taṃ taṃ atthaṃ ñāpentī
tika-s0305t:391_5: paveṇī ācariyaparamparā. Kevalaṃ attano matiyā “iti kira evaṃ kirā”ti parikappanā
tika-s0305t:391_6: itikirā. Piṭakassa ganthassa sampadānato bhūtato tassa gahaṇaṃ piṭakasampadānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:391_7: Yathāsutānaṃ attānaṃ ākārassa parivitakkanaṃ ākāraparivitakko. Tathevassa “evameta”nti
tika-s0305t:391_8: diṭṭhiyā nijjhānakkhamanaṃ diṭṭhinijjhānakkhanti. Āgamādhigamehi vinā kevalaṃ anussutato
tika-s0305t:391_9: takkamaggaṃ nissāya takkanaṃ takko. Anumānavidhiṃ nissāya gahaṇaṃ nayaggāho. Yasmā
tika-s0305t:391_10: buddhavisaye ṭhatvā bhagavato ayaṃ therassa codanā therassa ca so avisayo, tasmā
tika-s0305t:391_11: “paccakkhato ñāṇena paṭivijjhitvā viyā”ti vuttaṃ. Sīhanādo viyāti sīhanādo. Taṃsadisatā
tika-s0305t:391_12: cassa seṭṭhabhāvena, so cettha evaṃ veditabboti dassento “sīhanādo”tiādimāha. Unnādayantenāti
tika-s0305t:392_0: Anuyogadāpanatthanti anuyogaṃ sodhāpetuṃ. Vimaddakkhamañhi sīhanādaṃ nadanto atthato
tika-s0305t:392_1: anuyogaṃ sodheti nāma, anuyujjhanto ca naṃ sodhāpeti nāma. Dātunti sodhetuṃ. Keci
tika-s0305t:392_2: “dānattha”nti atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Na hi yo sīhadānaṃ nadati, so eva tattha
tika-s0305t:392_3: anuyogaṃ detīti yujjati. Nighaṃsananti vimaddanaṃ. Dhamamānanti tāpayamānaṃ. Tāpanañcettha
tika-s0305t:393_0: Sabbe teti sabbe te atīte niruddhe sammāsambuddhe. Tenetaṃ dasseti – ye te ahesuṃ
tika-s0305t:393_1: atītamaddhānaṃ tava abhinīhārato oraṃ sammāsambuddhā, tesaṃ tāva sāvakañāṇagocare
tika-s0305t:393_2: dhamme paricchindanto mārādayo viya ca buddhānaṃ lokiyacittācāraṃ tvaṃ jāneyyāsi.
tika-s0305t:393_3: Ye pana te abbhatītā, tato parato chinnavaṭumā chinnapapañcā pariyādinnavaṭṭā sabbadukkhavītivattā
tika-s0305t:393_4: sammāsambuddhā, tesaṃ sabbesampi tava sāvakañāṇassa avisayabhūte dhamme kathaṃ jānissasīti.
tika-s0305t:393_6: tādisasīlā. Samādhipakkhāti samādhi ca samādhipakkhā ca samādhipakkhā ekadesasarūpekasesanayena.
tika-s0305t:393_7: Tattha samādhipakkhāti vīriyasatiyo tadanuguṇā ca dhammā veditabbā. Jhānasamāpattīsu
tika-s0305t:394_0: Yathā pana heṭṭhā gahitāpi samādhipaññā paṭipakkhato vimuttattā vimuccana-saṅkhāta-kiccavisesa-dassanavasena
tika-s0305t:394_1: vimuttipariyāyena puna gahitā “evaṃvimuttā”ti, evaṃ dibbavihāro dibbavihāravisesadassanavasena
tika-s0305t:394_2: puna gahito “evaṃvihārī”ti, tasmā sabbesaṃ samāpattivihārānaṃ vasenettha attho yujjatīti
tika-s0305t:394_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti vimuccitthāti katvā. Esa nayo sesesupi. Paṭippassaddhanteti
tika-s0305t:394_4: paṭippassambhanosāpanena. Sabbakilesehi nissaṭattā asaṃsaṭṭhattā vimuttattā ca nissaraṇavimutti nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:395_0: Anāgatabuddhānaṃ panāti pana-saddo visesatthajotano. Tena atītesu tāva khandhānaṃ
tika-s0305t:395_1: bhūtapubbattā tattha siyā ñāṇassa savisaye gati, anāgatesu pana sabbaso asañjātesu
tika-s0305t:395_2: kathanti imamatthaṃ joteti. Tenāha “anāgatāpī”tiādi. “Attano cetasā paricchinditvā
tika-s0305t:395_3: viditā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Nanu atītānāgate sattāhe eva pavattaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa
tika-s0305t:395_4: visayo, na tato paranti? Nayidaṃ cetopariyañāṇakiccavasena vuttaṃ, atha kho pubbenivāsaanāgataṃsañāṇānaṃ
tika-s0305t:395_5: vasena vuttaṃ, tasmā nāyaṃ doso. Viditaṭṭhāne na karoti sikkhāpadeneva tādisassa
tika-s0305t:395_6: paṭikkhepassa paṭikkhittattā setughātato ca. Kathaṃ pana thero dvayasambhave paṭikkhepameva
tika-s0305t:395_7: akāsi, na vibhajja byākāsīti āha “thero kirā”tiādi. Pāraṃ pariyantaṃ minotīti pāramī,
tika-s0305t:395_8: sā eva ñāṇanti pāramiñāṇaṃ, sāvakānaṃ pāramiñāṇaṃ sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ. Tasmiṃ sāvakānaṃ
tika-s0305t:395_9: ukkaṃsapariyantagate jānane nāyamanuyogo, atha kho sabbaññutaññāṇe sabbaññutāya jānane.
tika-s0305t:395_10: Keci pana “sāvakapāramiñāṇeti sāvakapāramiñāṇavisaye”ti atthaṃ vadanti, tathā sesapadesupi.
tika-s0305t:395_12: Buddhasīlādayo hi buddhānaṃ buddhakiccassa parehi ete buddhāti jānanassa ca kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0305t:396_0: Anumānañāṇaṃ viya saṃsayaṭṭhitaṃ ahutvā idamidanti yathāsabhāvato ñeyyaṃ dhāreti
tika-s0305t:396_1: nicchinotīti dhammo, paccakkhañāṇanti āha “dhammassa paccakkhato ñāṇassā”ti. Anuetīti
tika-s0305t:396_2: anvayoti āha “anuyogaṃ anugantvā”ti. Paccakkhasiddhañhi atthaṃ anugantvā anumānañāṇassa
tika-s0305t:396_3: pavatti “diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa anumāna”nti veditabbā. Vidite vedakampi ñāṇaṃ atthato
tika-s0305t:396_4: viditameva hotīti “anumānañāṇaṃ nayaggāho vidito”ti vuttaṃ. Viditoti viddho paṭiladdho,
tika-s0305t:396_5: adhigatoti attho. Appamāṇoti aparimāṇo mahāvisayattā. Tenāha “apariyanto”ti. Tenāti
tika-s0305t:396_6: apariyantattā. Tena vā apariyantena ñāṇena. Etena thero yaṃ yaṃ anumeyyamatthaṃ ñātukāmo
tika-s0305t:396_7: hoti, tattha tattha tassa asaṅgamappaṭihataṃ anumānañāṇaṃ pavattetīti dasseti. Tenāha
tika-s0305t:397_0: Pākārassa thirabhāvaṃ uddhamuddhaṃ āpetīti uddhāpaṃ, pākāramūlaṃ. Ādi-saddena pākāradvārabandhaparikhādīnaṃ
tika-s0305t:397_1: saṅgaho veditabbo. Paccante bhavaṃ paccantimaṃ. Paṇḍitadovārikaṭṭhāniyaṃ katvā thero
tika-s0305t:397_2: attānaṃ dassetīti dassento “ekadvāranti kasmā āhā”ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
tika-s0305t:398_0: Yassā paññāya vasena puriso paṇḍitoti vuccati, taṃ paṇḍiccanti āha – “paṇḍiccena
tika-s0305t:398_1: samannāgato”ti. Taṃtaṃitikattabbatāsu chekabhāvo byattabhāvo veyyattiyaṃ. Medhati
tika-s0305t:398_2: aññāṇaṃ hiṃsati vidhamatīti medhā, sā etassa atthīti medhāvī. Ṭhāne ṭhāne uppatti
tika-s0305t:398_3: etissā atthīti ṭhānuppattikā, ṭhānaso uppajjanapaññā. Anupariyāyanti etenāti anupariyāyo,
tika-s0305t:398_4: so eva pathoti anupariyāyapatho, parito pākārassa anuyāyanamaggo. Pākārabhāgā sambandhitabbā
tika-s0305t:398_5: etthāti pākārasandhi, pākārassa phullitapadeso. So pana heṭṭhimantena dvinnampi iṭṭhakānaṃ
tika-s0305t:398_6: vigamena evaṃ vuccatīti āha – “dvinnaṃ iṭṭhakānaṃ apagataṭṭhāna”nti. Chinnaṭṭhānanti
tika-s0305t:398_7: chinnabhinnapadesaṃ, chinnaṭṭhānaṃ vā. Tañhi “vivara”nti vuccati. Kīliṭṭhanti malīnaṃ.
tika-s0305t:398_8: Upatāpentīti kilesapariḷāhena santāpenti. Vibādhentīti pīḷenti. Uppannāya paññāya
tika-s0305t:398_9: nīvaraṇehi na kiñci kātuṃ sakkāti āha “anuppannāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na dentī”ti.
tika-s0305t:398_10: Tasmāti paccayūpaghātena uppajjituṃ appadānato. Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suṭṭhu ṭhapitacittāti
tika-s0305t:398_11: catubbidhāyapi satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya sammadeva ṭhapitacittā appitacittā. Yathāsabhāvena
tika-s0305t:398_12: bhāvetvāti yāthāvato sammadeva yathā paṭipakkhā samucchijjanti, evaṃ bhāvetvā.
tika-s0305t:399_0: Purimanaye satipaṭṭhānāni bojjhaṅgā ca missakā adhippetāti tato aññathā vattuṃ “apicetthā”tiādi
tika-s0305t:399_1: vuttaṃ. Missakāti samathavipassanāmaggavasena missakā. “Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittāti
tika-s0305t:399_2: paṭhamaṃ vuttattā satipaṭṭhānesu vipassanaṃ gahetvā satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṃ bhāvetvāti
tika-s0305t:399_3: vuttattā maggapariyāpannānaṃyeva ca nesaṃ nippariyāyabojjhaṅgabhāvato tesu ca adhigatameva
tika-s0305t:399_4: hotīti bojjhaṅge maggo ca sabbaññutaññāṇañcāti gahite sundaro pañho bhaveyyā”ti mahāsivatthero
tika-s0305t:399_5: āha. Na panevaṃ gahitaṃ porāṇehīti adhippāyo. Itīti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. Theroti sāriputtatthero.
tika-s0305t:400_0: Tatthāti tesu paccantanagarādīsu. Nagaraṃ viya nibbānaṃ tadatthikehi upagantabbato
tika-s0305t:400_1: upagatānañca parissayarahitasukhādhigamaṭṭhānato. Pākāro viya sīlaṃ tadupagatānaṃ
tika-s0305t:400_2: parito ārakkhabhāvato. Anupariyāyapatho viya hirī sīlapākārassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato.
tika-s0305t:400_3: Vuttañhetaṃ – “pariyāyapathoti kho bhikkhu hiriyā etaṃ adhivacana”nti. Dvāraṃ viya
tika-s0305t:400_4: ariyamaggo nibbānanagarappavesane añjasabhāvato. Paṇḍitadovāriko viya dhammasenāpati
tika-s0305t:400_5: nibbānanagaraṃ paviṭṭhapavisanakānaṃ sattānaṃ sallakkhaṇato. Dinnoti dāpito, sodhitoti
tika-s0305t:402_0: 379. Pubbe sāvatthito veḷuvagāmassa gatattā vuttaṃ “āgatamaggeneva paṭinivattanto”ti.
tika-s0305t:402_1: Sattannanti upaseno, revato, khadiravaniyo, cundo, samaṇuddeso ahanti catunnaṃ, cālā,
tika-s0305t:402_2: upacālā, sīsūpacālāti, tissannanti imesaṃ sattannaṃ arahantānaṃ. Natthi nu khoti
tika-s0305t:402_3: etthāpi “olokento”ti ānetvā sambandho sīhāvalokanañāyena. Bhavissanti me vattāro
tika-s0305t:402_4: harituṃ nāsakkhīti sambandho. Idaṃ dāni pacchimadassananti bhūtakathanamattaṃ, na
tika-s0305t:402_5: tattha sālayatādassanaṃ yathā tathāgatassa vesāliyā nikkhamitvā nāgāpalokitaṃ.
tika-s0305t:403_0: Tassa tassa visesassa adhiṭṭhānavaseneva iddhibhedadassanaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ. Sīhassa
tika-s0305t:403_1: vijambhanādivasena kīḷitvā nādasadisī ayaṃ dhammakathāti vuttaṃ “sīhavikīḷito dhammapariyāyo”ti.
tika-s0305t:403_2: Gamanakālo mayhantīti ettha iti-saddo parisamāpane. Tena therena yathārambhassa vacanapabandhassa
tika-s0305t:403_3: samāpitabhāvaṃ joteti. Esa nayo sesesupi edisesu sabbaṭṭhānesu. Yugandharādayo paribhaṇḍapabbatāti
tika-s0305t:403_4: veditabbā. Ekappahārenevāti ekappahārena iva. Svāyaṃ iva-saddo na sakkomīti ettha
tika-s0305t:404_0: Paṭipādessāmīti ṭhitakāyaṃ paṭipādessāmi. Patthanākāle anomadassissa bhagavato vacanasutānusārena
tika-s0305t:404_1: ñāṇena diṭṭhamattataṃ sandhāya “taṃ paṭhamadassana”nti vuttaṃ. Dhāretuṃ asakkontī
tika-s0305t:404_2: guṇasāraṃ. Esa maggoti eso jātānaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇaniṭṭhito pantho. Punapi evaṃbhāvino
tika-s0305t:404_3: nāma saṅkhārāti saṅkhārā nāma evaṃbhāvino, maraṇapariyosānāti attho. Ettakanti ettakaṃ
tika-s0305t:404_4: kālaṃ. Saṅkaḍḍhitvā saṃharitvā. Mukhaṃ pidhāyāti mukhaṃ chādetvā. Agghikasatānīti
tika-s0305t:405_0: Purimadivaseti atītadivase. Yasmā dhammasenāpatino arahattappattadivaseyeva satthu
tika-s0305t:405_1: sāvakasannipāto ahosi, tasmā “pūritasāvakasannipāto esa bhikkhū”ti vuttaṃ. Pañca
tika-s0305t:406: Kaḷopihatthoti vilīvamayabhājanahattho. “Cammamayabhājanahattho”ti ca vadanti. Purantareti nagaramajjhe. Vaneti araññe.
tika-s0305t:407_1: Dhammojanti dhammarasaṃ, ojavantaṃ desanādhammanti attho. Dhammabhoganti dhammaparibhogaṃ,
tika-s0305t:407_2: parehi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajanavasena pavattaṃ dhammasambhoganti desanādhammameva vadati.
tika-s0305t:408_0: Piyāyitabbato piyehi. Manassa vaḍḍhanato manāpehi. Jātiyāti khattiyādijātiyā. Nānābhāvo
tika-s0305t:408_1: asahabhāvo visuṃbhāvo. Aññathābhāvo aññathattaṃ. Sarīranti rūpadhammakāyasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0305t:408_2: sarīraṃ. Rūpakāye hi bhijjante bhijjanteva. So bhijjeyyāti so mahantataro khandho bhijjeyya.
tika-s0305t:409_0: Dakkhiṇadisaṃ gatoti dakkhiṇadisāmukhe pavatto. Mahākhandho viyāti mahanto sāravanto
tika-s0305t:409_1: sākhākhandho viya. Sākhakhandhā hi disābhimukhapavattākārā, mūlakhandho pana uddhamuggato.
tika-s0305t:409_2: Soḷasannaṃ pañhānanti soḷasannaṃ aparāpariyapavattaniyānaṃ atthānaṃ. Ñātuṃ icchito hi attho pañho.
tika-s0305t:411: 380-381. Amāvasuposatheti amāvasiuposathe, kālapakkhauposatheti attho. Purimanayenevāti anantarasutte vuttanayeneva.
tika-s0305t:415_0: 384. Tasmiṃ kāleti paṭhamābhisambodhiyaṃ. Bhikkhuyeva natthi dhammacakkassa appavattitattā,
tika-s0305t:415_1: bhikkhuyeva bhikkhulakkhaṇayogato. Ekako maggo, na dvedhāpathabhūtoti ekamaggo, taṃ
tika-s0305t:415_2: ekamaggaṃ. Jātiyā khayo vaṭṭadukkhassa antabhūtoti jātikkhayanto, nibbānaṃ, taṃ diṭṭhattā
tika-s0305t:417_0: 385. Ayaṃ tassa laddhīti ayaṃ idāni vuccamānā tassa ācariyassa laddhi. Tato anāmentoti
tika-s0305t:417_1: yena vaṃso namati, tena kāyaṃ anāmento. Tathā namanto hi patitvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0305t:417_2: Tanti kāyaṃ, taṃ vaṃsaṃ vā. Ākaḍḍhento viyāti namitaṭṭhānato parabhāgena ākaḍḍhento
tika-s0305t:417_3: viya. Ekatobhāgiyaṃ katvāti yathāvuttaṃ satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā onataṃ viya katvā.
tika-s0305t:417_4: Tathā karaṇaṃ pana tathā vātūpatthambhagāhāpanenāti āha – “vātūpatthambhaṃ gāhāpetvā”ti.
tika-s0305t:417_5: Tañca satiyā tadatthaṃ upaṭṭhānenāti vuttaṃ “satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā”ti. Niccalova
tika-s0305t:417_6: nisīdanto antevāsī ācariyaṃ rakkhati, ettakaṃ ācariyassa laddhivasena vuttaṃ. “Ācariyo
tika-s0305t:417_7: vaṃsaṃ suggahitaṃ gaṇhanto”tiādi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
tika-s0305t:418_0: “Attānameva rakkhatī”ti idaṃ attano rakkhaṇaṃ padhānaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, na antevāsikanti
tika-s0305t:418_1: avadhāraṇaphalaṃ. Attarakkhāya panettha sijjhamānāya antevāsikarakkhāpi siddhā eva
tika-s0305t:418_2: hotīti. Dutiyapakkhepi eseva nayo. So tattha ñāyoti yā attano eva rakkhā, sā atthato
tika-s0305t:418_3: pararakkhāpi hotīti ayamettha ñāyo yuttappayogo. Anuvaḍḍhiyāti yathāvaḍḍhitassa anuanuvaḍḍhiyā.
tika-s0305t:418_5: attho”ti. Āsevanāyātiādīni padāni anudayatāpariyosānāni (yasmā satipaṭṭhānaṃ sevantassa
tika-s0305t:418_6: siddhaṃ attano ca parassa ca rakkhaṇaṃ pakāsenti, tasmā) – “attānaṃ, bhikkhave, rakkhissāmīti
tika-s0305t:420_0: 386. Janapadasmiṃ kalyāṇīti sakalajanapade bhaddā rūpasampattiyā sikkhāsampattiyā
tika-s0305t:420_1: ca sundarā seṭṭhā. Rūpasampatti ca nāma sabbaso rūpadosābhāvena rūpaguṇapāripūriyā
tika-s0305t:420_3: Taṃ duvidhampi vivaranto “sā hī”tiādimāha. Pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatāti pañcavidhasarīraguṇasampadāhi
tika-s0305t:420_4: samannāgatā. Nātidīghā nātirassāti pamāṇamajjhimā dīghatarappamāṇā na hoti, na atirassā,
tika-s0305t:420_5: lakuṇḍakarūpā na hoti. Nātikisāti ativiya kisathaddhamaṃsalohitā dissamānā aṭṭhisarīrā
tika-s0305t:420_6: jālasarīrā na hoti. Nātithūlāti bhāriyamaṃsā mahodarā na hoti. Nātikāḷā nāccodātāti
tika-s0305t:420_7: ativiya kāḷavaṇṇā jhāmaṅgāro viya, dadhitakkādīhi pamajjitamattakaṃsalohavaṇṇā na
tika-s0305t:420_8: hoti. Manussaloke tādisiyā rūpasampattiyā abhāvato atikkantā manussavaṇṇaṃ. Yathā
tika-s0305t:420_9: pamāṇayuttā, evaṃ ārohapariṇāhayogato ca paresaṃ pasādāvahā nātidīghatādayo. Evaṃ
tika-s0305t:420_10: manussānaṃ dibbarūpatāsampattīpīti vuttaṃ “appattā dibbavaṇṇa”nti. Ettha ca nātidīghanātirassatāvacanena
tika-s0305t:420_11: ārohasampatti vuttā ubbedhena pāsādikabhāvato. Kisathūladosābhāvavacanena pariṇāhasampatti
tika-s0305t:420_12: vuttā. Ubhayenapi saṇṭhānasampadā vibhāvitā, nātikāḷatāvacanena vaṇṇasampatti vuttā
tika-s0305t:420_14: adharoṭṭhamāha. Ayaṃ yathāvuttā sarīravaṇṇasampatti. Assāti janapadakalyāṇiyā. Chavikalyāṇatā
tika-s0305t:420_15: chavisampattihetukattā tassā. Esa nayo sesesupi. Nakhā eva pattasadisatāya nakhapattāni.
tika-s0305t:421_0: (Pasāvo sarīrāvayavena iriyananti āha – “pavattīti attho”ti, pasāvo yathāparitameva
tika-s0305t:421_1: kanatanti, na sabhāvasandhānaṃ. Yathāvibhāvasena uttamameva naccaṃ naccati. Te vā
tika-s0305t:421_2: vīsatiyāsūtiraṃ dhānappattiyā pavattiyā pavattimakatamandatā vibhāvasuṭatassa uttamameva
tika-s0305t:421_3: gītañca gāyatīti attho.) [Etthantare pāṭho asuddho dussodhanīyo ca. Suddhapāṭho gavesitabbo.]
tika-s0305t:421_4: Samatittiko telapattoti mukhavattisamaṃ telānaṃ pūritattā samatittikamukhaṃ telabhājanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:421_5: Antarena ca mahāsamajjaṃ antarena ca janapadakalyāṇinti janapadakalyāṇiyā, tassā
tika-s0305t:421_6: ca naccagītaṃ pekkhituṃ sannipatitamahājanasamūhassa majjhato pariharitabbo netabbo.
tika-s0305t:421_7: Nanti telaṃ. Āhareyyāti āpajjeyya. Tatridaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – telapattaṃ viya kāyagatāsati,
tika-s0305t:421_8: tassa pariharaṇapuggalo viya vipassako, janakāyā viya puthuttārammaṇāni, asipuriso
tika-s0305t:421_9: viya mano, telassa cajanaṃ viya kilesuppādanaṃ, sīsapātanaṃ viya ariyamaggañāṇasīsānuppatti.
tika-s0305t:421_10: “Kāyagatā sati no bhāvitā…pe… sikkhitabba”nti vuttattā “pubbabhāgavipassanāva kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:425_0: 387-388. Sīlānīti bahuvacanaṃ anekavidhattā sīlassa. Tañhi sīlanaṭṭhena ekavidhampi
tika-s0305t:427: 389-391. Puggalavasena parihānaṃ hoti na dhammavasena. Yo na bhāveti, tasseva parihāyati. Tenāha “yo hī”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:429: 392. Padesato bhāvitattāti ekadesato bhāvitattā bhāvanāpāripūriyā ananuppattattā. Tenāha – “cattāro hi magge”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:433_0: 394-396. Mahāvisayattā mahatiyo abhiññā etassāti mahābhiñño, tassa bhāvoti sabbaṃ
tika-s0305t:433_1: vattabbaṃ. “Satatavihāravasena vutta”nti vatvā tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “thero kirā”tiādi
tika-s0305t:433_2: vuttaṃ. Tassāti therassa. Āvajjanassa gatinti ekāvajjanasseva gamanavīthiṃ. Anubandhati
tika-s0305t:433_3: cakkavāḷānaṃ sahassaṃ ekāvajjaneneva sahassalokadhātuyā icchitamatthaṃ jānituṃ samatthoti dasseti.
tika-s0305t:436_0: 397-407. Yā vedanā sammasitvāti yā tebhūmakavedanā sammasitvā. Tāvassāti tā tebhūmakavedanā
tika-s0305t:436_1: eva assa bhikkhuno. Sadisavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ, aniccādisammasanavasena viditā pubbabhāge
tika-s0305t:436_2: sammasanakāle upaṭṭhahanti. Pariggahitesūti parijānanavasena paricchijja gahitesu.
tika-s0305t:436_3: “Vedanā taṇhāpapañcassa, vitakko mānapapañcassa, saññā diṭṭhipapañcassa mūlavasena
tika-s0305t:436_4: sammasanaṃ vuttā”ti vadanti. “Vedanāvitakkasaññā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcānaṃ mūladassanavasenā”ti apare.
tika-s0305t:440: 408. Sārammaṇasatipaṭṭhānāti ārammaṇalakkhitā satipaṭṭhānā kathitā, na satilakkhaṇā.
tika-s0305t:442: 410. Suddhikaṃ katvā visuṃ visuṃ katvā. Tathā ca vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “kāye vā bhikkhū”ti.
tika-s0305t:444_1: āgataṃ. Tenāha “tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero panā”tiādi. Tattha pātimokkhasaṃvarova sīlanti
tika-s0305t:444_2: avadhāraṇaṃ itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ekadesena pātimokkhantogadhabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Tathā hi anolokiyolokane
tika-s0305t:444_3: ājīvahetu ca chasikkhāpadavītikkamane gilānapaccayassa appaccavekkhitaparibhoge ca
tika-s0305t:444_4: āpatti vihitāti. Tīṇīti indriyasaṃvarādīni. Sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthīti sīlapariyāyena
tika-s0305t:444_5: tesaṃ katthaci sutte gahitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthīti nippariyāyasīlataṃ tesaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0305t:444_7: Itaradvayepi eseva nayo. Paccayuppattimattakanti phalena hetuṃ dasseti. Uppādanahetukā
tika-s0305t:444_8: hi paccayānaṃ uppatti. Idamatthanti idaṃ payojanaṃ imassa paccayassa paribhuñjaneti
tika-s0305t:444_9: adhippāyo. Nippariyāyenāti iminā indriyasaṃvarādīni tīṇi padhānasīlassa paripālanaparisodhanavasena
tika-s0305t:444_10: pavattiyā pariyāyasīlāni nāmāti dasseti. Idāni pātimokkhasīlasseva padhānabhāvaṃ
tika-s0305t:444_11: byatirekato anvayato ca upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yassā”tiādimāha. Tattha soti pātimokkhasaṃvaro.
tika-s0305t:444_12: Sesāni indriyasaṃvarādīni. Pātimokkhasaddassa attho pana visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanādīsu
tika-s0305t:445_0: Ācārena ca gocarena ca sampannoti kāyikacetasikaavītikkamasaṅkhātena ācārena ca navesiyādigocaratādisaṅkhātena
tika-s0305t:445_1: gocarena ca sampanno, sampannaācāragocaroti attho. Appamattakesūti atiparittakesu
tika-s0305t:445_3: Te pana ekantato akusalā hontīti āha – “akusaladhammesū”ti. Bhayadassāvīti bhayato
tika-s0305t:445_4: dassanasīlo, paramāṇumattampi vajjaṃ sineruppamāṇaṃ viya katvā dassanasīlo. Sammā
tika-s0305t:445_5: ādiyitvāti sammadeva sakkaccaṃ sabbaso ca ādiyitvā. Sikkhāpadesūti niddhāraṇe bhummanti
tika-s0305t:445_6: samudāyato avayavaniddhāraṇaṃ dassento “sikkhāpadesu taṃ taṃ sikkhāpada”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:445_7: Sikkhāpadaṃ samādātabbaṃ sikkhitabbañcāti adhippāyo. Sikkhāti adhisīlasikkhā. Pubbe
tika-s0305t:445_8: pada-saddo adhiṭṭhānaṭṭho, idha bhāgatthoti daṭṭhabbanti āha – “sikkhākoṭṭhāsesū”ti.
tika-s0305t:445_9: Mūlapaññattianupaññattiādibhedaṃ yaṃkiñci sikkhitabbaṃ pūretabbaṃ sīlaṃ, taṃ pana
tika-s0305t:445_10: dvāravasena duvidhamevāti āha – “kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā”ti. Imasmiṃ atthavikappe
tika-s0305t:445_11: sikkhāpadesūti ādhāre bhummaṃ sikkhābhāgesu kassaci visuṃ aggahaṇato. Tenāha – “taṃ
tika-s0305t:445_12: taṃ sabba”nti. “Tato tvaṃ bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāyā”ti vacanato anabhijjhā abyāpādasammādiṭṭhiyopi
tika-s0305t:445_13: sīlanti vuttā, tasmā imasmiṃ sutte “pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlameva kathita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:447_0: 413. Etthāpi manosucaritaṃ sīlaṃ nāmāti dassetīti katvā vuttaṃ “pacchimāpi tayo”ti.
tika-s0305t:447_1: Anabhijjhāabyāpādasammādiṭṭhidhammā sīlaṃ hotīti veditabbā kāyavacīsucaritehi saddhiṃ
tika-s0305t:447_2: manosucaritampi vatvā “tato tvaṃ bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāyā”ti vuttattā.
tika-s0305t:447_3: Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Chaṭṭhasattamesūti chaṭṭhasattamavaggesu apubbaṃ natthi. Tena
tika-s0305t:447_4: vuttaṃ “heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo”ti. Vaggapeyyālato pana imasmiṃ satipaṭṭhānasaṃyutte
tika-s0305t:447_5: katipayavaggā saṅgahaṃ ārūḷhā, tathāpi tesaṃ atthavisesābhāvato ekaccesu potthakesu
tika-s0305t:447_6: mukhamattaṃ dassetvā saṃkhittā, ekaccesu atisaṃkhittāva, te saṅkhepavasena dve katvā
tika-s0305t:453_0: 471. Catubhūmaka …pe… labbhanti kusalābyākatabhāvato tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ indriyānaṃ. Vīriyindriyasamādhindriyāni…pe…
tika-s0305t:453_1: sabbattha labbhanti kusalattikasādhāraṇattā. Catubhūmaka …pe… vasenāti catubhūmakadhammaparicchedavasena
