tika-s0305t:453_2: ceva kusalādīhi sabbasaṅgāhakadhammaparicchedavasena ca vuttanti attho.
tika-s0305t:455_0: 477. Dukkhasaccavasenāti dukkhasaccabhāvena na pajānanti. Tañhi pariññeyyatāya dukkhasaccasaṅgahaṃ.
tika-s0305t:455_1: Samudayasaccavasenāti taṇhāvijjādiṃ saddhindriyassa samudayasaccabhāvena na pajānanti.
tika-s0305t:455_2: Nirodhanti saddhindriyassa anupādāya nirodhanimittaṃ nibbānaṃ. Paṭipadanti saddhindriyanirodhagāminiṃ
tika-s0305t:456_2: āvajjanuppattiyā. Tasmā paṭhamuppannā saddhā eva hettha “āvajjana”nti vuttā, na manodvārāvajjanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:456_3: Esa nayo sesesupi. Tasmā paṭhamuppannā āvajjanā paggahuppattiṭṭhānānaṃ tikkhānaṃ
tika-s0305t:456_4: vīriyindriyādīnaṃ paṭhamuppattiyā āvajjanapariyāyena vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dubbalā
tika-s0305t:456_5: hi paṭhamuppannā paggahābhāvato vīriyindriyādīnaṃ samudayoti balavabhāvappattavīriyindriyādikassa
tika-s0305t:456_6: āvajjanaṭṭhāniyāni hontīti tesaṃ samudayoti vuttā, pubbe adhimuccanādivasena pavattassa
tika-s0305t:456_7: āvajjanassa samudayāti attho. Puna chandavasenāti kattukāmatākusalacchandavasena
tika-s0305t:456_8: saddhādīnaṃ uppādetukāmatākārappavattassa chandassa vasena. Manasikāravasena āvajjanasamudayāti
tika-s0305t:456_10: āvajjanassa uppattiyā. Evampīti “adhimokkhavasenā”tiādinā vuttākārenapi. Chasu suttesūti
tika-s0305t:456_11: dutiyato paṭṭhāya chasu suttesu. Catusaccameva kathitaṃ. Assādaggahaṇena hi samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-s0305t:458_0: 478. Soto āpajjīyati etenāti sotāpatti, anāgataṃ pati paṭhamamaggo. Sototi ariyamaggasoto
tika-s0305t:458_2: aṅgāni idha “sotāpattiyaṅgānī”ti vuttāni. Tāni pana tīsu ṭhānesu saddhā ariyakantasīlañcāti
tika-s0305t:458_4: Yattha saddhādiindriyānaṃ sātisayakiccaṃ, tesaṃ kiccātirekataṃ dassetunti attho.
tika-s0305t:458_5: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāhi vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Patvāti attano kiccātirekaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0305t:458_6: paṭilabhitvā. Pubbaṅgamanti saddahanakiccesu purecāraṃ dhorayhaṃ. Sesāni vīriyindriyādīni.
tika-s0305t:458_7: Tadanvayānīti tadanugatāni tassa saddhindriyādikassa pakkhikāni. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0305t:458_8: Jhānavimokkheti jhānasaṅkhāte vimokkhe samādhipadhānatāya jhānānaṃ. Evañca katvā
tika-s0305t:458_9: “sotāpattiyaṅgāni patvā”ti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Saddhūpanisañhi sīlanti.
tika-s0305t:458_10: Ariyasaccāni patvāti cattāri saccāni abhisametabbāni pāpuṇitvā.
tika-s0305t:460_0: 479-480. Nepakkaṃ vuccati paññāti āha – “paññāyetaṃ nāma”nti. Nipāyati saṃkilesadhamme
tika-s0305t:460_1: visoseti nikkhāmetīti nipako, thiratikkhasatipuggalo, tassa bhāvo nepakkanti satiyāpi
tika-s0305t:460_2: nepakkabhāvo yujjateva. Evañhi “satinepakkenā”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti, satiyā
tika-s0305t:460_3: ca nepakkenāti evaṃ vuccamānena satiniddeso nāma kato hotiyeva. Asukaṃ nāma suttaṃ
tika-s0305t:460_4: vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā me bhāsitanti. Vossajjīyati saṅkhāragataṃ etasmiṃ adhigateti vossaggo,
tika-s0305t:460_5: nibbānaṃ. Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ karitvāti āha – “nibbānārammaṇaṃ katvā”ti. Gacchantiyāti
tika-s0305t:460_6: saṅkhārānaṃ udayañca vayañca udayabbayaṃ gacchantiyā bujjhantiyā. Tenāha “udayabbayapariggāhikāyā”ti.
tika-s0305t:460_7: Saddhāsatipaññindriyāni pubbabhāgāni “itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ, cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi
tika-s0305t:460_8: saritā anussaritā, udayatthagāminiyā paññāyā”ti ca vuttattā. “Āraddhavīriyo viharati,
tika-s0305t:460_9: so anuppannāna”ntiādinā ca vuttattā vīriyindriyaṃ missakaṃ. “Vossaggārammaṇaṃ karitvā”ti
tika-s0305t:460_10: vuttattā samādhindriyaṃ nibbattitalokuttarameva. Ayamevāti yvāyaṃ navame vutto. Ayameva
tika-s0305t:464_0: 481. Sammappadhāne ārabbhāti sammappadhāne bhāvanāvasena ārabbha. Tenāha “bhāvento”ti.
tika-s0305t:464_1: Yathā vīriyindriyaniddese “cattāro sammappadhāne ārabbha vīriyaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti desanā
tika-s0305t:464_2: āgatā, evaṃ satindriyaniddese “cattāro satipaṭṭhāne ārabbha satiṃ paṭilabhatī”ti,
tika-s0305t:464_3: tasmā “satindriyepi eseva nayo”ti vuttaṃ. Saddhindriyādiniddesesu pana na tathā deseti.
tika-s0305t:466_0: 482. Indriyānaṃ tikkhādibhāvo vipassanāvasena vā maggavasena vā phalavasena vā gahetabboti
tika-s0305t:466_1: vuttaṃ “tatoti…pe… veditabba”nti. Nanu cettha mudubhāvo eva pāḷiyaṃ gahitoti? Saccametaṃ,
tika-s0305t:466_2: taṃ pana tikkhabhāve asati na hoti tikkhādibhāvoti vuttaṃ. Yato hi ayaṃ mudu, ito
tika-s0305t:466_3: taṃ tikkhanti vattabbataṃ labhati apekkhāsiddhattā tikkhamudubhāvānaṃ pārāpāraṃ viya.
tika-s0305t:466_5: vuttaṃ. Tattha samattānīti sampannāni. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Samattānīti vā pariyattāni,
tika-s0305t:466_6: samattānīti attho. “Tato mudutarāni dhammānusārīmaggassā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Tatoti
tika-s0305t:466_8: dhammānusārī vā siyā saddhānusārī vāti byabhicarati? Nāyaṃ doso, sotāpattimaggekadesavaseneva
tika-s0305t:466_9: laddhabbapaṭhamamaggāpekkhāya vipassanāya vibhāgassa adhippetattā. Yo hi sotāpanno
tika-s0305t:466_10: hutvā iriyāpathaṃ akopetvā yathānisinnova sakadāgāmimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti, tassa vipassanindriyāni
tika-s0305t:466_11: sandhāya avibhāgena vuttaṃ – “tato mudutarāni sotāpattimaggassa vipassanindriyāni
tika-s0305t:466_12: nāmā”ti. Yo pana sotāpanno hutvā kālantarena sakadāgāmī hoti, tassa sotāpattimaggatthāya
tika-s0305t:466_13: pavattāni vipassanindriyāni nāma honti. So ce dhammānusārīgotto, tassa yathāvuttavipassanindriyato
tika-s0305t:466_14: mudutarānīti “tato mudutarāni dhammānusārīmaggassā”ti vuttaṃ. Vipassanindriyāni nāmāti
tika-s0305t:466_16: kāraṇaṃ sayameva vakkhati. Dhammena paññāya maggasotaṃ anussaratīti dhammānusārī,
tika-s0305t:466_17: paññuttaro ariyo. Saddhāya maggasotaṃ anussaratīti saddhānusārī, saddhuttaro ariyo.
tika-s0305t:467_0: Evaṃ vipassanāvasena dassetvā maggavasena dassetuṃ “tathā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Sampayogato
tika-s0305t:467_1: sabhāvato ca arahattamaggapariyāpannāni arahattamaggindriyāni. Arahattaphalindriyānīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0305t:468_0: Idāni phalavasena dassetuṃ “samattāni paripuṇṇānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sotāpattimaggaṭṭhapuggalavasena
tika-s0305t:468_1: nānattaṃ jātaṃ, tasmā te dvepi idha tatiyavāre na labbhantīti adhippāyo. Dhammānusārīsaddhānusārīnaṃ
tika-s0305t:468_2: nānattaṃ kathaṃ jātanti āha “āgamanenapi maggenapī”ti. Tadubhayaṃ dassento “saddhānusārīpuggalo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:469_0: Maggo tikkho hoti upanissayindriyānaṃ tikkhavisadabhāvato. Tenāha “sūraṃ ñāṇaṃ vahatī”ti.
tika-s0305t:469_1: Asaṅkhārenāti saraseneva. Appayogenāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Dhammānusārīpuggalo hi
tika-s0305t:469_2: āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appadukkhena appakasirena akilamantova vikkhambhetuṃ
tika-s0305t:469_3: sakkoti. Saddhānusārīpuggalo pana dukkhena kasirena kilamanto hutvā vikkhambhetuṃ
tika-s0305t:469_4: sakkoti, tasmā dhammānusārissa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe kilesacchedakañāṇaṃ adandhaṃ
tika-s0305t:469_5: tikhiṇaṃ hutvā vahati, yathā nāma tikhiṇena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0305t:469_6: maṭṭhaṃ hoti, asi khippaṃ vahati, saddo na suyyati, balavavāyāmakiccaṃ na hoti, evarūpā
tika-s0305t:469_7: dhammānusārino pubbabhāgabhāvanā hoti, saddhānusārino pana pubbabhāgakkhaṇe kilesacchedakañāṇaṃ
tika-s0305t:469_8: dandhaṃ na tikhiṇaṃ asūraṃ hutvā vahati, yathā nāma nātitikhiṇena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa
tika-s0305t:469_9: chinnaṭṭhānaṃ na maṭṭhaṃ hoti, asi sīghaṃ na vahati, saddo suyyati, balavavāyāmakiccaṃ
tika-s0305t:469_10: icchitabbaṃ hoti, evarūpā saddhānusārino pubbabhāgabhāvanā hoti. Evaṃ santepi kilesakkhaye
tika-s0305t:469_11: nānattaṃ natthi. Tenāha “kilesakkhaye panā”tiādi. Avasesā ca kilesā khīyanti saṃyojanakkhayāya yogattā.
tika-s0305t:471_0: 483. Tatoti phalato phalavemattatāya cariyamānattā. Indriyavemattatā saddhādīnaṃ
tika-s0305t:473_0: 484. Sīlakkhandhādīhi saddhindriyādīhi ca parito pūraṇena paripūraṃ arahattamaggaṃ
tika-s0305t:473_1: karonto nipphattito arahattaphalaṃ ārādheti nipphādeti. Tayo padesamaggeti sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ
tika-s0305t:473_2: apāripūriyā ekadesabhūte tayo heṭṭhimamagge. Padesaṃ heṭṭhimaphalattayaṃ. Catūsūti
tika-s0305t:473_3: imasmiṃ vagge paṭhamādīsu catūsu suttesu. Kāmañcettha tatiye “tatoti phalavasena
tika-s0305t:473_4: nissakka”nti vuttaṃ, catutthe “paripūraṃ paripūrakārī ārādheti, padesaṃ padesakārī”ti,
tika-s0305t:473_5: “catūsupi suttesu missakāneva indriyāni kathitānī”ti pana vacanato vipassanāvasenapi
tika-s0305t:475_0: 485-487. Vipassanāvasena nissakkaṃ veditabbaṃ, na maggaphalavasena, imasmiṃ sutte
tika-s0305t:475_1: sabbasova vipassanindriyānaṃ eva adhippetattā. Idāni tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “paripuṇṇāni
tika-s0305t:475_2: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Avihādīsu pañcasu suddhāvāsesu tattha tattha āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā
tika-s0305t:475_3: antarā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyanato antarāparinibbāyī, asaṅkhārena appayogena
tika-s0305t:475_5: uddhaṃ vāhibhāvena uddhamassa taṇhāsotaṃ vaṭṭasotaṃ vāti uddhaṃsoto, uddhaṃ vā gantvā
tika-s0305t:475_6: paṭilabhitabbato uddhamassa maggasotanti uddhaṃsoto, akaniṭṭhabhavaṃ gacchatīti akaniṭṭhagāmīti
tika-s0305t:476_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāneti “vipassanāvasena nissakka”nti vuttaṭṭhāne. Arahattamaggeyeva
tika-s0305t:476_1: ṭhatvāti imasmiṃyeva bhave arahattamaggeyeva, na vipassanāya ca ṭhatvā. Pañca nissakkāni
tika-s0305t:476_2: nīharitabbānīti “tato mudutarehi antarāparinibbāyī hotī”tiādīni pañca nissakkāni
tika-s0305t:476_3: niddhāretvā kathetabbāni. Idāni tamatthaṃ vivaranto “arahattamaggassa hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:476_4: Tattha avihādīsu uppajjitvā uppannasamanantarāya parinibbāyanato paṭhamaantarāparinibbāyī.
tika-s0305t:476_5: Tattha āyuppamāṇavemajjhaṃ appatvāva parinibbāyanato dutiyaantarāparinibbāyī, āyuvemajjhaṃ
tika-s0305t:476_6: patvā parinibbāyanato tato paraṃ tatiyaantarāparinibbāyī veditabbo. “Pañca nissakkānī”ti
tika-s0305t:476_7: kasmā vuttaṃ? Nanu asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyīti vattabbanti? Na vattabbanti dassento
tika-s0305t:477_0: Tīṇi nissakkānīti “tato mudutarehi sotāpanno hotī”tiādīni tīṇi nissakkapadāni. Idha
tika-s0305t:477_1: sakadāgāmī na gahito, so anāgāmimagge ṭhatvā nīharitabbo, anāgāmimaggassa vipassanindriyehi
tika-s0305t:477_2: mudutarehi sakadāgāmī hoti. Sakadā…pe… mudutarānīti idaṃ sakadāgāmimaggassa vipassanindriyehi
tika-s0305t:477_3: ekabījisaṅkhātasotāpannavipassanindriyāni mudutarāni hontīti tīṇi katvā vuttaṃ. Dhammānusārītiādidvayaṃ
tika-s0305t:477_4: kolaṃkolādidvayena gahitaṃ hotīti. Sakadāgāmimaggassa hītiādi vuttasseva atthassa
tika-s0305t:477_5: vivaraṇaṃ. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Chaṭṭhasattamāni vuttanayānevāti chaṭṭhasattamāni
tika-s0305t:477_6: suttāni dutiyatatiyesu vuttanayāneva. Tattha pana missakāni indriyāni kathitāni,
tika-s0305t:479_1: paṭipanno hotī”tiādinā. Aṭṭhahīti catūhi phalehi catūhi ca maggehīti aṭṭhahi. Bahibhūto
tika-s0305t:479_2: na antobhāvo. Lokuttarāneva indriyāni kathitāni maggaphalacittuppādapariyāpannattā.
tika-s0305t:481: 489-490. Indriyasampannoti ettha sampannasaddo paripūriatthoti āha “paripuṇṇindriyo”ti. Missakāni indriyāni kathitāni sāmaññatova desitattā.
tika-s0305t:485_1: Itthiyā eva indriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ. Esa nayo purisindriye. Jīviteti sahajātadhammānaṃ
tika-s0305t:485_2: jīvane pālane pavattane. Vaṭṭindriyānīti vaṭṭahetubhūtāni indriyāni. Imesu hi upādinnaindriyesu
tika-s0305t:487_0: 493. Ajānitapubbaṃ dhammanti catusaccadhammamāha, tathā tesaṃyeva ñātadhammānanti.
tika-s0305t:487_1: Ayaṃ panettha attho – ājānātīti aññā, paṭhamamaggena ñātamanatikkamitvā jānātīti
tika-s0305t:487_2: attho. Sotāpannādīnaṃ chaariyānaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ. Aññassa indriyāni aññindriyāni. Aññātāvīsūti
tika-s0305t:487_3: ājānitavantesu. Yasmā aggaphaladhammesu ñāṇakiccaṃ sātisayaṃ, tasmā taṃ kiccaṃ sesadhammesupi
tika-s0305t:487_4: samāropetvā vuttaṃ “aññātāvīsu arahattaphaladhammesū”ti. Tattha tattha tesu tesu
tika-s0305t:489_0: 494. Vipassanato nissakkanti vipassanindriyehi nissakkaṃ. Idāni tameva saṅkhepato
tika-s0305t:489_1: vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “samattānī”tiādimāha. Tīṇi nissakkāni evamidha pañca nissakkāni
tika-s0305t:489_3: vipassanindriyāni nāma tenattabhāvena sakadāgāmimaggaṃ pattuṃ gacchantassa sotāpannassa
tika-s0305t:489_4: vipassanindriyāni. Pañcapi te sotāpattimaggassa bhedāyevāti “sakadāgāmimagge ṭhatvā
tika-s0305t:490_0: Ekabījīti ettha khandhabījaṃ nāma kathitaṃ. Yassa hi sotāpannassa ekaṃ khandhabījaṃ
tika-s0305t:490_1: atthi, ekaṃ attabhāvaggahaṇaṃ, so ekabīji nāma. Tenāha – “sotāpanno hutvā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:490_2: Mānusakaṃ bhavanti idaṃ panettha desanāmattaṃ, devabhavaṃ nibbattetītipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-s0305t:490_3: Bhagavatā gahitanāmānetāni. Ettakañhi pamāṇaṃ gato sattakkhattuparamo nāma hoti,
tika-s0305t:490_4: ettakaṃ kolaṃkolo, ettakaṃ ekabījīti bhagavatā etesaṃ nāmaṃ gahitaṃ.
tika-s0305t:491_0: Dve tayo bhaveti devamanussesu eva dve tayo bhave. Sambodhicatusaccadhammo paraṃ
tika-s0305t:491_1: ayanaṃ nissayo gati etassāti sambodhiparāyaṇo. Kulato kulaṃ gacchatīti kolaṃkolo.
tika-s0305t:491_2: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyato paṭṭhāya hi nīcakule uppatti nāma natthi, mahābhogesu
tika-s0305t:491_3: kulesu eva nibbattatīti attho. Kevalopi hi kula-saddo mahābhogakulameva vadati. Dve
tika-s0305t:491_4: vā tīṇi vā kulānīti devamanussavasena dve vā tayo vā bhaveti ayampi missakabhavena
tika-s0305t:491_5: kathito. Jātassa kumārassa viya ariyāya jātiyā jātassa nāmametaṃ, yadidaṃ niyatoti
tika-s0305t:491_6: sattakkhattuparamādikoti ca samaññāti dassento āha “bhagavatā gahitanāmavasenevā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:492_0: Yadi pubbahetuniyamato sotāpanno ca niyatoti sotāpattimaggato uddhaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ
tika-s0305t:492_1: upanissayābhāvato pubbahetukiccaṃ natthīti sotāpattimaggassa upanissayabhāvo āpajjati.
tika-s0305t:492_2: Yadi tassapi pubbahetuupanissayo siyā, tāva niyamato sotāpattimagguppattito pubbe
tika-s0305t:492_3: eva niyamito, yāvañca akaniṭṭhaṃ tassa pubbahetu nāma, ahetukatā āpannā, iccassa
tika-s0305t:492_4: ahetu appaccayā nipphatti pāpuṇāti. Kiñca hetu ce? Niyamato sotāpanno ca niyatoti
tika-s0305t:492_5: paṭhamamaggādhigameneva anukkamena upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ kiccāni nipphajjanti, evaṃ
tika-s0305t:492_6: sattakkhattuparamatādiniyame sati sattamabhavādito uddhaṃ pavattatāya dukkhassa mūlabhūtā
tika-s0305t:492_7: kilesā paṭhamamaggeneva khīṇāti upari tayo maggā akiccā siyuṃ. Tenāha “paṭhamamaggassa
tika-s0305t:493_0: Yadi upari tayo maggā sattakkhattuparamāditaṃ niyamenti, tato ca añño sotāpanno natthīti
tika-s0305t:493_1: sotāpattimaggassa akiccakatā nippayojanatā āpajjeyya. Atha sakkāyadiṭṭhiādippahānaṃ
tika-s0305t:493_2: tassa kiccaṃ, tesaṃ tesaṃ pahānena sattakkhattuparamādiniyamatāya. Bhavitabbaṃ, yāva
tika-s0305t:493_3: uparimaggā eva hontīti sattabhavādito uddhamapavattanato tena vinānena sakkāyadiṭṭhiādippahānena
tika-s0305t:493_4: ca tena vinā bhavitabbanti āha – “paṭhamamagge anuppanneva upari tayo maggā uppannāti
tika-s0305t:493_5: āpajjatī”ti. Tiṇṇaṃ maggānanti upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ. Vipassanā niyametīti yujjatīti
tika-s0305t:494_0: Sotāpanno vaṭṭajjhāsayo. Tatrekacce pākaṭe paññāte dassento “anāthapiṇḍiko”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:494_1: Idhaṭṭhakavokiṇṇasukkhavipassakassāti yo imasmiṃ kāmabhave ṭhito manussadevavasena
tika-s0305t:494_2: vokiṇṇabhavūpapattiko sukkhavipassako ca, tassa vasena. Nāmaṃ kathitanti sattakkhattuparamoti
tika-s0305t:494_3: nāmaṃ kathitaṃ. Keci pana “kāmabhave sattakkhattuṃyeva uppajjati, na tato”ti vadanti, taṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:495_0: Sodhessāmīti jambudīpe kenaci tepiṭakena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ piṭakattayameva mayhaṃ
tika-s0305t:495_1: uggahaparipucchāvasena sodheyyāmīti paratīraṃ jambudīpaṃ gato. Yo bhikkhu sakkotīti
tika-s0305t:495_2: yojanā. Aniccānupassanādīsu ekamukhena abhiniviṭṭhenapi abhidhammapariyāyena tīhi
tika-s0305t:495_3: eva vimokkhehi maggaṃ labhatīti abhinivesabhedena tayo puggalā suññatato vuṭṭhitā,
tika-s0305t:495_4: tathā tayo appaṇihitato vuṭṭhitāti cha honti, teva saddhādhurapaññādhuravasena dvādasa
tika-s0305t:495_5: sakadāgāmino. Tathā arahanto, tayo antarāparinibbāyino eko upahaccaparinibbāyī eko
tika-s0305t:495_6: uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañca, te asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyibhedena dasāti
tika-s0305t:495_7: avihādīsu catūsupi cattālīsa, akaniṭṭhe pana uddhaṃsoto natthīti aṭṭhacattālīsa anāgāmino.
tika-s0305t:497_1: evaṃ taṃdvārikadhammesupi adhipateyyaṃ tehi anuvattanīyattāti vuttaṃ – “adhipateyyasaṅkhātena
tika-s0305t:497_2: indaṭṭhenā”ti. Esa nayo sesindriyādīsupi. Catusaccavasena kathitāni sabhāvādivibhāvanassa kathitattā.
tika-s0305t:501_0: 501-505. Yathā cakkhu dassane adhipateyyaṭṭhena cakkhundriyaṃ, evaṃ sukhavedanā sukhane
tika-s0305t:501_1: adhipateyyaṭṭhena sukhindriyaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Sesaṃ tebhūmakanti sesaṃ bhūmittayavasena tebhūmakaṃ.
tika-s0305t:503_0: 506. Kāyikanti ayamassa nissayavasena niddesoti āha – “kāyapasādavatthuka”nti. Sarūpaniddeso
tika-s0305t:503_1: sukhaṃ sukhindriyassa sarūpanti. Sādanīyaṭṭhena dhammapadāni attani assādayatīti
tika-s0305t:503_2: sātaṃ, madhuraṃ. Vedayitanti vediyanaṃ, anubhavananti attho. Aññadhammavisiṭṭhoti
tika-s0305t:503_3: phassādīhi aññehi dhammehi visadiso. Kāyikanti pasādakāyasannissitaṃ. Cetasikanti
tika-s0305t:503_4: cetosannissitaṃ, tena vuttaṃ “ettha panā”tiādi. Kāyapasāda…pe… natthi, tasmā “cattāro
tika-s0305t:505_0: 509. Dvinnaṃ araṇīnanti adharuttarāraṇīnaṃ. Kiñci dvayaṃ saṅghaṭṭitamattaṃ hutvā
tika-s0305t:505_1: na samodhānagataṃ hotīti taṃnivattanatthaṃ “saṅghaṭṭanasamodhānā”ti vuttaṃ. Punappunaṃ
tika-s0305t:505_2: saṅghaṭṭanena hi tejopātubhāvo. Adharāraṇī viya vatthārammaṇaṃ asatipi vāyāme tajjasamphassapaccayato.
tika-s0305t:505_3: Uttarāraṇī viya phasso vatthārammaṇādiphassena pavattanato. Saṅghaṭṭo viya phassasaṅghaṭṭanaṃ
tika-s0305t:505_4: araṇidvayasaṅghaṭṭanā viya phassasseva vatthārammaṇesu saṅghaṭṭanākārena pavattito.
tika-s0305t:505_5: Aggi viya vedanā anudahanaṭṭhena khaṇikāvāyañca. Vatthārammaṇaṃ vā uttarāraṇī viya
tika-s0305t:505_6: indhanāpātagahaṇādīsu ussāhassa viya pavattisambhavato. Phasso adharāraṇī viya nirussāhanirīhatāvasena attasādhanato.
tika-s0305t:507_0: 510. Rasanaṃ bhañjanaṃ nirujjhanaṃ raso. Yo yo dhammānaṃ raso yathādhammaraso, tena
tika-s0305t:507_1: yathādhammarasena. Paṭipāṭiyāti kamena, ubhayenapi dhammānaṃ pahānakkamenāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0305t:507_2: hoti. Imasmiṃ indriyavibhaṅgeti imasmiṃ indriyasaṃyuttasaññite indriyavibhaṅge. Adesitattāti
tika-s0305t:507_3: sesasuttāni viya “sukhindriya”ntiādinā adesitattā idaṃ uppaṭipāṭikasuttaṃ nāma. Valiyā
tika-s0305t:507_4: kharasamphassāya phuṭṭhassa. Tanti kaṇṭakavedanādiṃ. Etassa dukkhindriyassa.
tika-s0305t:508: Tesaṃ tesanti domanassindriyādīnaṃ. Kāraṇavasenevāti taṃtaṃasādhāraṇakāraṇavasena. Tesañhi visesakāraṇaṃ dassento “pattacīvarādīnaṃ vā”ti āha.
tika-s0305t:509_0: Ekatovāti punappunaṃ paduddhāraṇaṃ akatvā ekajjhameva. Dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ upacārakkhaṇe
tika-s0305t:509_1: eva nirujjhantīti ānetvā sambandho. Tesaṃ dukkhindriyadomanassādīnaṃ. Atisayanirodhoti
tika-s0305t:509_2: suṭṭhu pahānaṃ ujuppaṭipakkhena vūpasamo. Nirodhoyevāti nirodhamattameva. Nānāvajjaneti
tika-s0305t:509_3: yena āvajjanena appanāvīthi hoti, tato bhijjāvajjane, anekāvajjane vā. Appanāvīthiyañhi
tika-s0305t:509_4: upacāro ekāvajjano, itaro anekāvajjano anekakkhattuṃ pavattanato. Visamanisajjāya
tika-s0305t:509_5: uppannakilamatho visamāsanupatāpo. Pītipharaṇenāti pītiyā pharaṇarasattā. Pītisamuṭṭhānānaṃ
tika-s0305t:509_6: vā paṇītarūpānaṃ kāyassa byāpanato vuttaṃ. Tenāha “sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hotī”ti.
tika-s0305t:509_7: Vitakkavicārapaccayepīti pi-saddo aṭṭhānapayutto, so “pahīnassā”ti ettha ānetvā sambandhitabbo
tika-s0305t:509_9: “Tassa mayhaṃ aticiraṃ vitakkayato vicārayato kāyopi kilami, cittampi vihaññī”ti
tika-s0305t:509_10: ca vacanato kāyacittakhedānaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayatā veditabbā. Vitakkavicārabhāve
tika-s0305t:509_11: uppajjati domanassindriyanti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Tatthassa siyā uppattīti tattha
tika-s0305t:509_12: dutiyajjhānupacāre assa domanassassa uppatti bhaveyya. “Tatthassa siyā uppattī”ti
tika-s0305t:509_13: idaṃ parikappavacanaṃ upacārakkhaṇe domanassassa suppahīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Tathā
tika-s0305t:509_14: hi vuttaṃ “na tveva dutiyajjhāne pahīnapaccayattā”ti. Pahīnampi somanassindriyaṃ
tika-s0305t:509_15: pīti viya na dūreti katvā “āsannattā”ti vuttaṃ. Nānāvajjanupacāre pahīnampi pahānaṅgaṃ
tika-s0305t:509_16: paṭipakkhena avihatattā antarantarā uppajjeyyāti imamatthaṃ dassento “appanāppattāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:509_17: “Tādisāya āsevanāya icchitabbattā yathā maggavīthito pubbe dve tayo javanavārā sadisānupassanāva
tika-s0305t:509_18: pavattanti, evamidhāpi appanāvārato pubbe dve tayo javanavārā upekkhāsahagatāva pavattantī”ti
tika-s0305t:509_19: vadanti. Aparisesanti suvikkhambhitanti katvā vikkhambhanena anavasesaṃ.
tika-s0305t:510_0: Tathattāyāti tathabhāvāya paṭhamajjhānasamaṅgitāya. Sā panassa uppādanena vā uppannassa
tika-s0305t:510_1: samāpajjanena vā hotīti vuttaṃ “uppādanatthāya samāpajjanatthāyā”ti. Dvīsūti navamadasamesu suttantesu.
tika-s0305t:514_0: 511. Pamukhe, pāsādassa ca pacchimabhāge ātapo pacchātapo, tasmiṃ pacchātape. So
tika-s0305t:514_1: hi pāsādassa pamukhabhāvena kato. Kiṃ pana bhagavato vajirasāraṃ sarīraṃ otāpetabbaṃ
tika-s0305t:514_2: hotīti āha – “sammāsambuddhassā”tiādi. Ayañca imaṃ suttaṃ desitasamaye. Na sakkoti
tika-s0305t:514_3: byāmappabhāya kāyaci pabhāya anabhibhavanīyattā. Kiñcāpi buddhābhā sūriyābhāya anabhibhavanīyā,
tika-s0305t:514_4: ghammasabhāvatāya pana rasmīnaṃ parito pharantī sūriyābhā tikhiṇā uṇhāti āha “rasmiteja”nti.
tika-s0305t:514_5: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yatheva hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:515_0: Suvaṇṇāvaṭṭaṃ viyāti acche suvaṇṇapatte vinivattaāvaṭṭaṃ viya. Garahaṇacchariyaṃ
tika-s0305t:515_1: nāma kiretaṃ “acchariyametaṃ avisicchephalavada”ntiādīsu viya. Na evametarahīti attano
tika-s0305t:515_2: pākaṭavasena vadati, na itaresampīti. Sirājālāti sirāsantānā. Evarūpaṃ na hotīti
tika-s0305t:515_3: aññesaṃ pākatikasattānaṃ vuttākāraṃ viya na hoti puññasambhārassa uḷāratamattā vipaccanassa
tika-s0305t:515_4: pariyantagatattā. Tenāha “aññesaṃ apākaṭa”nti. Valiyāvaṭṭakanti appakaṃ valiyāvaṭṭaṃ.
tika-s0305t:515_5: Tenāha “kesaggappamāṇa”nti. Sabbānīti sirājālāni. Purato vaṅkoti thokaṃ purato natamattaṃ
tika-s0305t:515_6: sandhāyāha. Tena vuttaṃ “svāyaṃ aññesaṃ apākaṭo”ti. Nayaggāhatoti anumānato. Dhī
tika-s0305t:515_7: tanti dhī-saddayoge upayogavacanaṃ. Dhīti jigucchanatthe nipāto. Dhikkāroti jigucchāpayogo.
tika-s0305t:517: 512. Aññamaññassāti añño aññassa. Na paccanubhoti attano avisayabhāvato. Idāni taṃ aññavisayataṃ anvayato byatirekato vibhāvetuṃ “sace hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:518_0: Visayāni paṭisaranti etthāti paṭisaraṇaṃ. Indriyaviññāṇāni hi asatipi tādise adhippāye
tika-s0305t:518_1: attano ārammaṇassa yāthāvato sampajānanato pavedanavijānanāni karontāni viya pavattanti,
tika-s0305t:518_2: tathā lokassa aññattha siddhito. Tenāha bhagavā – “mano paṭisaraṇaṃ, manova nesaṃ
tika-s0305t:518_3: gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotī”ti manodvārikajavanamano hi savisesaṃ manovisayaṃ paccanubhoti,
tika-s0305t:518_5: tasmā saddahanādipi gahitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, pañcadvārappavattivasena tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:519_0: Dubbalabhojakāti appānubhāvā rājabhoggā. Āyanti bhoguppattiṭṭhānaṃ. Yottabandhādinimittaṃ
tika-s0305t:519_2: Māghātaghosanāya katāya hiṃsānimittaṃ gahetabbakahāpaṇo māpahārakahāpaṇo. Tassa parimāṇaṃ
tika-s0305t:520_0: Maggasatīti ariyamaggasati. Bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa hi javanamano ussakkitvāva maggasatiṃ
tika-s0305t:520_1: paṭisarati tappariyosānattā. Tanti nibbānaṃ. Sāti phalavimutti. Paṭisarati aggamaggasatiyā.
tika-s0305t:520_2: Phalavimutti nibbānanti ubhayaṃ maggassa siddhāyevāti. Ārammaṇavasena natthi etassa
tika-s0305t:520_3: paṭisaraṇanti appaṭisaraṇaṃ asaṅkhatāmatassa santiniccasabhāvattā. Sayaṃ pana sabbesaṃyeva
tika-s0305t:520_4: ariyānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ. Tenāha “nibbānaṃ arahato gatī”ti. Nibbānaṃ anupaviṭṭhaṃ nibbānanissayattā.
tika-s0305t:520_5: Na tato paraṃ gacchati gatassa aññassa tādisassa abhāvā. Nibbānaṃ pari sabbaso osānanti nibbānapariyosānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:521_0: Mūlajātā jātamūlā. Tato eva patiṭṭhitā. Kā panassāti āha “maggena āgatasaddhā”ti.
tika-s0305t:521_1: Maggo daḷhāya asaṃhāriyasaddhāya mūlaṃ diṭṭhisampayuttāni ceva vicikicchācittañcāti
tika-s0305t:521_2: pañca akusalacittāni samucchedavasena pahīnāni. Pañca nīvaraṇānīti ettha apāyagamanīyāni
tika-s0305t:521_3: paṭhamamaggeneva pahīnāni, itarāni vikkhambhanavasena jhānena pahīnānīti pañcasu
tika-s0305t:521_4: orambhāgiyakilesasaṃyojanesu ekadesavigameneva bahiddhāsaṃyojano viya jātoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0305t:523: 515. Pubbakoṭṭhake evaṃ āgatasuttaṃ ādiṃ katvā phalindriyāneva kathitāni aggaphalavasena desanāya āgatattā.
tika-s0305t:525_0: 520. Upari saha vipassanāya tayo maggāti vipassanāya saha sotāpattiphalato upari
tika-s0305t:525_1: tayo maggā. Maggādhigamena idāni paccakkhabhūtattā “ime kho te dhammā”ti vuttā. Tattha
tika-s0305t:525_2: yaṃ aggabhūtaṃ, tassa vasena dassetuṃ “arahattaphalindriyaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ indriyabhāvasāmaññena
tika-s0305t:525_3: ekajjhaṃ katvā. Ativijjhitvā passāmīti sacchikatvā yāthāvato passāmi. Catūhi indriyehīti
tika-s0305t:525_4: vīriyindriyādīhi catūhi indriyehi. Sā vipassanāmaggaphalasahagatā siyāti missakā vuttā.
tika-s0305t:531_0: 522. Cattāri indriyānīti paññindriyaṃ ṭhapetvā sesāni cattāri. “Ariyañāṇaṃ lokuttara”nti
tika-s0305t:531_1: vuttaṃ maggañāṇaṃ katvā. Ariya-saddo pana yathā tathā visuddhepi hotīti tādisaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0305t:531_2: vuttaṃ “tampi panā”tiādi. Yathā hi cattārindriyāni missakāni, evaṃ paññindriyampi
tika-s0305t:531_3: missakanti vuccamāne na koci virodhoti adhippāyenāha “tampi pana…pe… vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-s0305t:533: 523. Na sakkoti indriyānaṃ aparipakkattā. Atthīti pajānāti nayaggāhena, na paccakkhato. Na hi ariyāpi anadhigataṃ maggaphalaṃ paccavekkhituṃ sakkonti.
tika-s0305t:535: 526. Sāsavesūti caturāsavavinimuttesu sesadhammesu ārammaṇesu. Tesupi uppajjanakaanatthato cittaṃ rakkhati nāma.
tika-s0305t:537_0: 528. Taṃ sandhāyāti taṃ sūkarakhataleṇaṃ sandhāya. Etaṃ “sūkarakhatāya”nti vacanaṃ
tika-s0305t:537_1: vuttaṃ. Bhāvanapuṃsakanti bhāvajotakaṃ napuṃsakavacanaṃ yathā “visamaṃ vātā vāyanti,
tika-s0305t:537_2: ekamantaṃ nisīdī”ti. Kiccapaṭipatti tesaṃ saṃkāsanaṭṭhena sapatiso, sapatiso eva
tika-s0305t:540_0: 531-650. Sattānaṃ phalānaṃ hetubhūtāni “imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ
tika-s0305t:540_1: bhāvitattā”tiādinā vuttāni, pañcindriyāniyeva phalūpacārena “satta phalānī”ti vuttāni.
tika-s0305t:540_2: Tāni ca pubbabhāgāni “imesaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ bhāvitattā…pe… sattānisaṃsā
tika-s0305t:540_3: pāṭikaṅkhā”ti vacanato. Tesanti sattānaṃ phalānaṃ. “Dvinnaṃ phalānaṃ aññataraṃ phala”nti
tika-s0305t:540_4: evaṃ atītasutte vuttāni heṭṭhā dve phalāni nāmāti vadanti. Yehi pana indriyehi aññatra
tika-s0305t:540_5: pana antarāparinibbāyiṃ sesāni phalāni honti, tāni cattāri sapubbabhāgāni lokuttarānīti vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-s0305t:551_0: 813. Chandaṃ nissāya pavatto samādhīti kattukamyatāchandaṃ adhipatiṃ katvā paṭiladdhasamādhi
tika-s0305t:551_2: Tehīti chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārehi. Iddhiyā pādanti nipphattipariyāyena ijjhanaṭṭhena,
tika-s0305t:551_3: ijjhanti etāya saddhā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iminā vā pariyāyena “iddhī”ti
tika-s0305t:551_5: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena pādabhūtaṃ, sesacittacetasikarāsinti attho. Sā eva ca yathāvuttaiddhi
tika-s0305t:551_6: yasmā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā uparimāya uparimāya pādabhūtā, tasmā vuttaṃ “iddhibhūtaṃ
tika-s0305t:551_7: vā pādanti iddhipāda”nti. Sesesūti vīriyasamādhiādīsu. Tattha hi vīriyaṃ cittaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ
tika-s0305t:551_8: adhipatiṃ katvā paṭiladdhasamādhi vīmaṃsāsamādhīti attho veditabbo. Idhāti imasmiṃ
tika-s0305t:553: 817. Iddhipadesanti iddhiyā ekadesaṃ. Ko pana soti āha – “tayo ca magge tīṇi ca phalānī”ti.
tika-s0305t:555: 818. Samattanti sāmaññassa samaṃ attanaṃ ijjhanaṃ samattaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ. Vivaṭṭapādakā eva iddhipādā kathitā “apārā pāraṃ gamanāya saṃvattantī”tiādivacanato.
tika-s0305t:557_0: 822. Udenayakkhassa cetiyaṭṭhāneti udenassa nāma yakkhassa devāyatanasaṅkhepena iṭṭhakāhi
tika-s0305t:557_1: kate mahājanassa cittīkataṭṭhāne. Katavihāroti bhagavantaṃ uddissa tattha katavihāro.
tika-s0305t:557_3: evamādīsupi. Eseva nayoti cetiyaṭṭhāne katavihārabhāvaṃ atidisati. Vaḍḍhitāti bhāvanāpāripūrivasena
tika-s0305t:557_4: paribrūhitā. Punappunaṃ katāti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇavasena aparāparaṃ pavattitā
tika-s0305t:557_5: ānītā. Yuttayānaṃ viya katāti yathā yuttamājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0305t:557_6: yathāruci pavattimarahati, evaṃ yathāruci pavattanārahataṃ gamitā. Patiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0305t:557_7: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena. Vatthu viya katāti sabbaso upakkilesavisodhanena iddhivisesānaṃ
tika-s0305t:557_8: pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato suvisodhitaparissayavatthu viya katā. Adhiṭṭhitāti paṭipakkhadūrībhāvato
tika-s0305t:557_9: subhāvitabhāvena taṃtaṃadhiṭṭhānayogyatāya ṭhapitā. Samantato citāti sabbabhāgena
tika-s0305t:557_10: bhāvanupacayaṃ gamitā. Tenāha “suvaḍḍhitā”ti. Suṭṭhu samāraddhāti iddhibhāvanāya
tika-s0305t:558_1: niyametvā. Āyuppamāṇanti paramāyuppamāṇaṃ vadati. Tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ brahmajālavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0305t:558_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Mahāsīvatthero pana mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhave paṭisandhidāyino
tika-s0305t:558_3: kammassa asaṅkheyyāyukatāsaṃvattanasamatthataṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā buddhānaṃ āyusaṅkhārassa
tika-s0305t:558_4: parissayavikkhambhanasamatthatā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā evāti imaṃ bhaddakappameva tiṭṭheyyāti avoca.
tika-s0305t:559_0: Khaṇḍiccādīhi abhisuyyatīti etena yathā iddhibalena jarāya na paṭighāto, evaṃ tena
tika-s0305t:559_1: maraṇassapi na paṭighātoti atthato āpannamevāti. “Kva saro khitto, kvacani patito”ti
tika-s0305t:559_2: aññathā vuṭṭhitenapi theravādena aṭṭhakathāvacanameva samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0305t:560_0: Pariyuṭṭhitacittoti yathā kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ abhibhūtacitto.
tika-s0305t:560_1: So pana abhibhavo mahatā udakoghena appakassa udakassa ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya ahosīti
tika-s0305t:560_2: vuttaṃ “ajjhotthaṭacitto”ti. Aññoti therato, ariyehi vā añño yo koci paro puthujjano.
tika-s0305t:560_3: Puthujjanaggahaṇañcettha yathā sabbena sabbaṃ appahīnavipallāso mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto
tika-s0305t:560_4: kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ thero bhagavatā kataṃ nimittobhāsaṃ
tika-s0305t:560_5: sabbaso na sallakkhesīti dassanatthaṃ. Tenāha “māro hī”tiādi. Cattāro vipallāsāti
tika-s0305t:560_7: cittavipallāsoti ime cattāro vipallāsā. Tenāti yadipi itare aṭṭha vipallāsā pahīnā,
tika-s0305t:560_8: yathāvuttānaṃ catunnaṃ vipallāsānaṃ appahīnabhāvena. Assāti therassa.
tika-s0305t:561_0: Maddatīti phusanamattena maddanto viya hoti, aññathā tena maddite sattānaṃ maraṇameva
tika-s0305t:561_1: siyā, kiṃ sakkhissati na sakkhissatīti adhippāyo. Kasmā na sakkhissati? Nanu esa
tika-s0305t:561_2: aggasāvakassa mahiddhikassa mahānubhāvassa kucchiṃ paviṭṭhoti? Saccaṃ paviṭṭho, tañca
tika-s0305t:561_3: kho attano mahānubhāvassa dassanatthaṃ, na vibādhanādhippāyena. Vibādhanādhippāyena
tika-s0305t:561_4: pana idha “kiṃ sakkhissatī”ti vuttaṃ hadayamaddanassa adhikatattā. Nimittobhāsanti
tika-s0305t:561_5: ettha “tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa”nti sakalakappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya “yassa kassaci,
tika-s0305t:561_6: ānanda, cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā”tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena
tika-s0305t:561_7: kappaṃ avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvasena saññuppādanaṃ nimittaṃ. Tathā pana pariyāyaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0305t:561_8: muñcitvā ujukaṃyeva attano adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ obhāso. Jānantoyevāti mārena pariyuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ
tika-s0305t:561_9: jānanto eva. Attano aparādhahetuko sattānaṃ soko tanuko hoti, na balavāti āha – “dosāropanena
tika-s0305t:561_10: sokatanukaraṇattha”nti. Kiṃ pana thero mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittakāle pavattiṃ pacchā
tika-s0305t:561_11: jānātīti? Na jānāti sabhāvena, buddhānubhāvena pana jānāti.
tika-s0305t:562_0: Anatthe niyojento guṇamāraṇena māreti, virāgavibandhanena vā jātinimittatāya tattha
tika-s0305t:562_1: tattha jātaṃ mārento viya hotīti “māretīti māro”ti vuttaṃ. Atipāpattā pāpimā. Kaṇhadhammasamannāgato
tika-s0305t:562_2: kaṇho. Virāgādiguṇānaṃ antakaraṇato antako. Sattānaṃ anatthāvahaṃ paṭipattiṃ na muñcatīti
tika-s0305t:562_3: namuci. Attano mārapāsena pamatte bandhati, pamattā vā bandhū etassāti pamattabandhu.
tika-s0305t:562_4: Sattamasattāhato paraṃ satta ahāni sandhāyāha “aṭṭhame sattāhe”ti, na pana pallaṅkasattāhādi
tika-s0305t:562_5: viya niyatakiccassa aṭṭhamasattāhassa nāma labbhanato. Sattamasattāhassa hi parato
tika-s0305t:562_6: ajapālanigrodhamūle brahmuno sakkassa ca paṭiññātadhammadesanaṃ bhagavantaṃ ñatvā
tika-s0305t:562_7: “idāni satte dhammadesanāya mama visayaṃ atikkāmessatī”ti sañjātadomanasso hutvā
tika-s0305t:562_8: ṭhito cintesi, “handāhaṃ dāni naṃ upāyena parinibbāpessāmi, evamassa manoratho aññathattaṃ
tika-s0305t:562_9: gamissati, mama manoratho ijjhissatī”ti cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ
tika-s0305t:562_10: ṭhito – “parinibbātu dāni, bhante, bhagavā”tiādinā parinibbānaṃ yāci. Taṃ sandhāya
tika-s0305t:562_11: vuttaṃ “aṭṭhame sattāhe”tiādi. Tattha ajjāti āyusaṅkhāravossajjanadivasaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0305t:562_12: Bhagavā cassa atibandhanādhippāyaṃ jānantopi taṃ anāvikatvā parinibbānassa akālabhāvameva
tika-s0305t:563_0: Maggavasena byattāti saccapaṭivedhaveyyattiyena byattā. Tatheva vinītāti maggavasena
tika-s0305t:563_1: kilesānaṃ samucchedavinayena vinītā. Tathā visāradāti ariyamaggādhigameneva satthusāsane
tika-s0305t:563_3: visāradabhāvaṃ pattāti attho. Yassa sutassa vasena vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇaṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0305t:563_4: taṃ idha ukkaṭṭhaniddesena “suta”nti adhippetanti āha “tepiṭakavasenā”ti. Tiṇṇaṃ
tika-s0305t:563_5: piṭakānaṃ samūho tepiṭakaṃ, tīṇi vā piṭakāni tipiṭakaṃ, tipiṭakameva tepiṭakaṃ, tassa
tika-s0305t:563_6: vasena. Tadevāti yaṃ taṃ tepiṭakaṃ sotabbabhāvena sutanti vuttaṃ, tameva. Dhammanti
tika-s0305t:563_7: pariyattidhammaṃ. Dhārentīti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya avinassantaṃ
tika-s0305t:563_8: katvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena dhārenti hadaye ṭhapenti. Iti pariyattidhammavasena
tika-s0305t:563_9: bahussutadhammadharabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni paṭivedhavasenapi taṃ dassento “atha vā”tiādi
tika-s0305t:563_10: vuttaṃ. Ariyadhammassāti maggaphaladhammassa, navavidhassa vā lokuttaradhammassa.
tika-s0305t:563_11: Anudhammabhūtanti adhigamāyānurūpaṃ dhammabhūtaṃ. Anucchavikapaṭipadanti tameva vipassanādhammamāha,
tika-s0305t:563_12: chabbidhā visuddhiyo vā. Anudhammanti nibbānadhammassa anudhammo, yathāvuttapaṭipadā,
tika-s0305t:563_13: tassānurūpaṃ abhisallekhitaṃ appicchatādidhammaṃ. Caraṇasīlāti samādāya vattanasīlā.
tika-s0305t:563_14: Anumaggaphaladhammo etissāti vā anudhammā, vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā, tassa caraṇasīlā.
tika-s0305t:563_15: Attano ācariyavādanti attano ācariyassa sammāsambuddhassa vādaṃ. Sadevakassa lokassa
tika-s0305t:563_16: ācārasikkhāpanena ācariyo, bhagavā, tassa vādo, catusaccadesanā.
tika-s0305t:564_0: Ācikkhissantīti ādito kathessanti, attanā uggahitaniyāmena pare uggaṇhāpessantīti
tika-s0305t:564_1: attho. Desessantīti vācessanti, pāḷiṃ sammā pabodhessantīti attho. Paññapessantīti
tika-s0305t:564_2: pajānāpessanti, saṅkāsessantīti attho. Paṭṭhapessantīti pakārehi ṭhapessanti, pakāsessantīti
tika-s0305t:564_3: attho. Vivarissantīti vivaṭaṃ karissanti. Vibhajissantīti vibhattaṃ karissanti. Uttānīkarissantīti
tika-s0305t:564_4: anuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissanti. Sahadhammenāti ettha dhamma-saddo
tika-s0305t:564_5: kāraṇapariyāyo “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “sahetukena sakāraṇena vacanenā”ti.
tika-s0305t:565_0: Sappāṭihāriyanti sanissaraṇaṃ. Yathā paravādaṃ bhañjitvā sakavādo patiṭṭhahati, evaṃ
tika-s0305t:565_1: hetudāharaṇehi yathādhigatamatthaṃ sampādetvā dhammaṃ kathessanti. Tenāha “niyyānikaṃ
tika-s0305t:565_2: katvā dhammaṃ desessantī”ti, navavidhaṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ pabodhessantīti attho.
tika-s0305t:565_3: Ettha ca “paññapessantī”tiādīhi chahi padehi cha atthapadāni dassitāni, ādito pana
tika-s0305t:565_4: dvīhi padehi cha byañjanapadāni. Ettāvatā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayena
tika-s0305t:565_5: saṅgahetvā dassitaṃ hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ nettiyaṃ “dvādasa padāni suttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ
tika-s0305t:566_1: anavasesaṃ satthusāsanabhūtaṃ seṭṭhacariyaṃ. Samiddhanti sammadeva vaḍḍhitaṃ. Jhānassādavasenāti
tika-s0305t:566_2: tehi tehi bhikkhūhi samadhigatajhānasukhavasena. Vuḍḍhippattanti uḷārapaṇītabhāvūpagamanena
tika-s0305t:566_3: sabbaso parivuḍḍhimupagataṃ. Sabbapāliphullaṃ viya abhiññāsampadāhi sāsanābhivuḍḍhiyā
tika-s0305t:566_5: Paṭivedhavasena bahuno janassa hitaṃ bāhujaññaṃ. Tenāha “mahājanābhisamayavasenā”ti.
tika-s0305t:566_6: Puthu puthulaṃ bhūtaṃ jātaṃ, puthuttaṃ bhūtaṃ pattanti vā puthubhūtaṃ. Tenāha “sabbākārena
tika-s0305t:566_7: puthulabhāvappatta”nti. Suṭṭhu pakāsitanti sammadeva ādikalyāṇādibhāvena paveditaṃ.
tika-s0305t:567_0: Satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvāti ayaṃ kāyādivibhāgo attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro mayā ettakaṃ
tika-s0305t:567_1: kālaṃ vahito, idāni pana na vahitabbo, etassa avahanatthaṃ cirataraṃ kālaṃ ariyamaggasambhāro
tika-s0305t:567_2: sambhato, svāyaṃ ariyamaggo paṭividdho, yato ime kāyādayo asubhādito sabhāvādito
tika-s0305t:567_3: sammadeva pariññātāti catubbidhampi satiṃ yathātathaṃ visaye suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitaṃ katvā.
tika-s0305t:567_4: Ñāṇena paricchinditvāti yasmā imassa attabhāvasaññitassa dukkhabhārassa vahane payojanabhūtaṃ
tika-s0305t:567_5: attahitaṃ bodhimūle eva parisamāpitaṃ, parahitaṃ pana buddhaveneyyavinayanaṃ parisamāpitaṃ
tika-s0305t:567_6: matthakappattaṃ, taṃ dāni māsattayeneva parisamāpanaṃ pāpuṇissati, tasmā āha “visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ
tika-s0305t:567_7: parinibbāyissāmī”ti, evaṃ buddhañāṇena paricchinditvā saccabhāgena vinicchayaṃ katvā.
tika-s0305t:567_8: Āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajīti āyuno jīvitassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ phalasamāpattidhammaṃ na samāpajjissāmīti
tika-s0305t:567_9: vissaji, taṃ vissajjaneneva tena abhisaṅkharīyamānaṃ jīvitasaṅkhāraṃ na pavattayissāmīti
tika-s0305t:568_0: Ṭhānamahantatāyapi pavattiākāramahantatāyapi mahanto pathavīkampo. Tattha ṭhānamahantatāya
tika-s0305t:568_1: bhūmicālassa mahantataṃ dassetuṃ “tadā…pe… akampitthā”ti vuttaṃ, sā pana jātikhettabhūtā
tika-s0305t:568_2: dasasahassī lokadhātu eva, na yā kāci. Yā mahābhinīhāramahājātiādīsupi akampittha,
tika-s0305t:568_3: tadāpi tattakāya eva kampane kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Jātikhettabhāvena tasseva ādito pariggahassa
tika-s0305t:568_4: katattā, pariggahaṇañcassa dhammatāvasena veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi purimabuddhānampi
tika-s0305t:568_5: tattakameva jātikhettaṃ ahosi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “dasasahassī lokadhātu nissaddā hoti
tika-s0305t:568_6: nirākulā…pe… mahāsamuddo ābhujati, dasasahassī pakampatī”ti ca ādi. Udakapariyantaṃ
tika-s0305t:568_7: katvā chappakārappavedhanena. Avītarāge bhiṃsetīti bhiṃsano, so eva bhiṃsanakoti
tika-s0305t:568_9: cettha kāci bherī devadundubhīti adhippetā, atha kho uppātabhāvena labbhamāno ākāsato
tika-s0305t:568_10: nigghosasaddo. Tenāha “devo”tiādi. Devoti megho. Tassa hi tadā acchabhāvena ākāsassa
tika-s0305t:568_11: vassābhāvena sukkhagajjitasaññite sadde niccharante devadundubhisamaññā. Tenāha “devo
tika-s0305t:569_0: Pītivegavissaṭṭhanti “evaṃ ciratarakālaṃ vahito ayaṃ attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro,
tika-s0305t:569_1: dāni na cirasseva nikkhipissāmī”ti sañjātasomanasso bhagavā sabhāveneva pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0305t:569_2: udānaṃ udāneti, evaṃ udānentena ayampi attho sādhito hotīti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0305t:570_0: Tulīyatīti tulanti tula-saddo kammasādhanoti dassetuṃ “tulita”nti vuttaṃ. Appānubhāvatāya
tika-s0305t:570_1: paricchinnaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ paṭipakkhena parito khaṇḍitabhāvena parittanti vuccati.
tika-s0305t:570_2: Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato dīghasantānatāya vipulaphalatāya ca na tulaṃ na paricchinnaṃ.
tika-s0305t:570_3: Yehi kāraṇehi pubbe avisesato “mahaggataṃ atula”nti vuttaṃ, tāni kāraṇāni rūpāvacarato
tika-s0305t:570_4: āruppassa sātisayaṃ vijjantīti arūpāvacaraṃ atulanti vuttaṃ, itarañca tulanti. Appavipākanti
tika-s0305t:570_5: tīsupi kammesu yaṃ appavipākaṃ hīnaṃ, taṃ tulaṃ. Bahuvipākanti yaṃ mahāvipākaṃ paṇītaṃ,
tika-s0305t:570_6: taṃ atulaṃ. Yaṃ panettha majjhimaṃ, taṃ hīnaṃ ukkaṭṭhanti dvidhā bhinditvā dvīsu
tika-s0305t:570_7: bhāgesu pakkhipitabbaṃ. Hīnattikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva appabahuvipākataṃ niddhāretvā
tika-s0305t:570_8: tassa vasena tulātulabhāvo veditabbo. Sambhavati etasmāti sambhavoti āha “sambhava^
tika-s0305t:570_10: ca rato. Savipākaṃ samānaṃ pavattivipākamattadāyikammaṃ savipākaṭṭhena sambhavaṃ,
tika-s0305t:570_11: na ca taṃ kāmādi^ bhavābhisaṅkhārakanti tato visesanatthaṃ sambhavanti vatvā “bhavasaṅkhāra”nti
tika-s0305t:570_12: vuttaṃ. Ossajīti ariyamaggena avassaji. Kavacaṃ viya attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ
tika-s0305t:570_13: attani sambhūtattā attasambhavaṃ kilesañca abhindīti kilesabhedasahabhāvikammossajjanaṃ
tika-s0305t:571_0: Paṭhamavikappe avasajjanameva vuttaṃ. Ettha avasajjanākāroti taṃ dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t:571_1: Tattha tīrentoti “uppādo bhayaṃ, anuppādo khema”ntiādinā vīmaṃsanto. Tulento tīrentotiādinā
tika-s0305t:571_2: saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “pañcakkhandhā”tiādiṃ vatvā bhavasaṅkhārassa
tika-s0305t:571_3: avasajjanākāraṃ sarūpato dasseti. Evantiādinā pana udānagāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ ādito vuttamatthaṃ
tika-s0305t:571_4: nigamanavasena dasseti. Abhītabhāvañāpanatthañcāti ayampi attho saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:575_0: 823-824. Parato imasmiṃ pāsādakampanavagge dasamasutte āvi bhavissanti. Chaabhiññāpādakāti
tika-s0305t:575_1: channaṃ abhiññānaṃ pādakabhūtā padhānabhūtā. Yathā paṭhamasutte, tathā dutiyatatiyasuttesupi
tika-s0305t:577_0: 825. Yo samādhissa nissayabhūto chando, so idhādhippetoti āha “chandanti kattukamyatāchanda”nti.
tika-s0305t:577_1: Tassa ca adhipateyyaṭṭho nissayaṭṭho, na vinā taṃ chandaṃ nissāyāti āha – “nissāyāti
tika-s0305t:577_2: nissayaṃ katvā, adhipatiṃ katvāti attho”ti. Padhānabhūtāti seṭṭhabhūtā, seṭṭhabhāvo
tika-s0305t:577_3: ca ekassapi catukiccasādhanavasena pavattiyā, tato eva bahuvacananiddeso, padhānasaṅkhāraṭṭhena
tika-s0305t:577_4: padhānasaṅkharaṇato. “Chandaṃ ce nissāya…pe… ayaṃ vuccati chandasamādhī”ti imāya
tika-s0305t:577_5: pāḷiyā chandādhipati samādhi chandasamādhīti adhipatisaddalopaṃ katvā samāso vuttoti
tika-s0305t:577_6: viññāyati, adhipatisaddatthadassanavasena vā chandahetuko, chandādhiko vā samādhi
tika-s0305t:577_8: ca samannāgatā”ti vakkhati, taṃ ānetvā sambandho. Padhānabhūtāti vīriyabhūtā. Keci
tika-s0305t:577_9: vadanti – “saṅkhatasaṅkhārādinivattanatthaṃ padhānaggahaṇa”nti. Atha vā taṃ taṃ visesaṃ
tika-s0305t:577_10: saṅkharotīti saṅkhāro, sabbampi vīriyaṃ. Tattha catukiccasādhakato tadaññassa nivattanatthaṃ
tika-s0305t:577_11: padhānaggahaṇanti. Yathā chando chandasamādhinā ceva padhānasaṅkhārehi ca samannāgato,
tika-s0305t:577_12: evaṃ chandasamādhi chandena ceva padhānasaṅkhārehi ca samannāgato. Padhānasaṅkhārāpi
tika-s0305t:577_13: chandena ceva chandasamādhinā ca samannāgatāti tīsupi padesu samannāgatasaddo yojetabbo.
tika-s0305t:577_14: Tasmāti yasmā tayopi chandādayo ekacittuppādapariyāpannā, tasmā sabbe te dhammā ekato
tika-s0305t:577_15: katvā “ayaṃ vuccati…pe… iddhipādo”ti vuttanti. Evaṃ chandādīnaṃyeva cettha iddhipādabhāvo
tika-s0305t:577_16: vutto, vibhaṅge pana tesaṃ iddhibhāvo sampayuttānaṃ iddhipādabhāvo vuttoti dassento
tika-s0305t:578_0: Idāni nesaṃ iddhipādatāpi sambhavatīti dassento “apicā”tiādimāha. Tattha chandañhi
tika-s0305t:578_1: bhāvayato padhānaṃ katvā bhāventassa tathā pavattapubbābhisaṅkhāravasena ijjhamāno
tika-s0305t:578_2: chando iddhi nāma, tassa nissayabhūtā padhānasaṅkhārā iddhipādo nāma. Sesadvayepi
tika-s0305t:578_3: eseva nayo. Tathā bhāvayantassa mukhyatāmattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, ijjhanattho pana
tika-s0305t:579_0: Iddhipāde asaṅkarato dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha chandādayoti chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārā.
tika-s0305t:579_2: dvikkhattuṃ vīriyaṃ āgataṃ, tattha purimaṃ samādhivisesaṃ, vīriyādhipatisamādhi eva
tika-s0305t:579_3: vīriyasamādhīti dutiyaṃ samannāgamaṅgadassanaṃ. Dveyeva hi sabbattha samannāgamaṅgāni
tika-s0305t:579_4: samādhi padhānasaṅkhāro ca, chandādayo samādhivisesanāni, padhānasaṅkhāro pana padhānavacaneneva
tika-s0305t:579_5: visesito, na chandādīhīti na idha vīriyādhipatitā padhānasaṅkhārassa vuttā hoti.
tika-s0305t:579_6: Vīriyañca samādhiṃ visesetvā ṭhitameva samannāgamaṅgavasena padhānasaṅkhāravacanena
tika-s0305t:579_7: vuttanti nāpi dvīhi vīriyehi samannāgamo vutto hoti. Yasmā pana chandādīhi visiṭṭho
tika-s0305t:579_8: samādhi, tathāpi visiṭṭheneva ca tena sampayutto padhānasaṅkhāro sesadhammā ca, tasmā
tika-s0305t:579_9: samādhivisesanānaṃ vasena cattāro iddhipādā vuttā, visesanabhāvo ca chandādīnaṃ taṃtaṃavassayadassanavasena
tika-s0305t:579_10: hotīti “chandasamādhi…pe… iddhipādo”ti ettha nissayatthepi pāda-sadde upādāyaṭṭhena
tika-s0305t:579_11: chandādīnaṃ iddhipādatā vuttā hoti, teneva abhidhamme uttaracūḷabhājaniye “cattāro
tika-s0305t:579_12: iddhipādā chandiddhipādo”tiādinā chandādīnaṃyeva iddhipādatā vuttā, pañhapucchake
tika-s0305t:579_13: ca – “cattāro iddhipādā idha bhikkhu chandasamādhī”tiādināva uddesaṃ katvāpi puna
tika-s0305t:579_14: chandādīnaṃyeva kusalādibhāvo vibhatto. Upāyiddhipādadassanatthameva hi nissayiddhipādadassanaṃ
tika-s0305t:579_15: kataṃ, aññathā catubbidhatā na hotīti ayamettha pāḷivasena atthavinicchayo. Tattha
tika-s0305t:579_16: upāyiddhipādadassanatthamevāti chandādike dhure jeṭṭhake pubbaṅgame katvā nibbattitasamādhi
tika-s0305t:579_18: tadatthameva “tathābhūtassa vedanākkhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandho”ti tattha tattha pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0305t:579_20: Evañcetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, aññathā kevalaṃ iddhisampayuttānaṃyeva khandhānaṃ vasena
tika-s0305t:579_21: iddhipādabhāve gayhamāne tesaṃ catubbidhatā na hoti visesakāraṇabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t:580_0: Kecīti uttaravihāravāsino. Anibbattoti hetupaccayehi na nibbatto, na sabhāvadhammo,
tika-s0305t:580_1: paññattimattanti adhippāyo. Vādamaddanatthāya hoti, abhidhamme ca āgato uttaracūḷavāroti
tika-s0305t:580_2: yojanā. Cattāro iddhipādātiādi uttaracūḷavāradassanaṃ. Ime pana uttaracūḷavāre āgatā iddhipādā.
tika-s0305t:581_0: Raṭṭhapālatthero chande sati kathaṃ nānujānissantīti sattāhāni bhattāni abhuñjitvā
tika-s0305t:581_1: mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā pabbajitvā chandameva nissāya arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti āha – “raṭṭhapālatthero
tika-s0305t:581_2: chandaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesī”ti. Soṇattheroti sukhumālasoṇatthero.
tika-s0305t:581_3: So hi āyasmā attano sukhumālabhāvaṃ acintetvā ativelaṃ caṅkamanena pādesu uṭṭhitesupi
tika-s0305t:581_4: ussāhaṃ avissajjento vīriyaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi. Sambhutatthero
tika-s0305t:581_5: “cittavato ce alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso ijjheyya, mayhaṃ ijjheyyāti cittaṃ dhuraṃ
tika-s0305t:581_6: katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi. Mogharājā “paññavato ce maggabhāvanā ijjheyya,
tika-s0305t:581_7: mayhaṃ ijjheyyā”ti paññāpubbaṅgamaṃ paññādhuraṃ paññājeṭṭhakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti
tika-s0305t:581_8: āha “mogharājā vīmaṃsaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesī”ti. Idāni nesaṃ
tika-s0305t:581_9: ariyānaṃ upaṭṭhānussāhamantajātisampadaṃ nissāya rañño santike laddhavisese amaccaputte
tika-s0305t:581_10: nidassanabhāvena dassetuṃ “tattha yathā”tiādimāha. Ettha ca punappunaṃ chanduppādanaṃ
tika-s0305t:581_11: tosanaṃ viya hotīti chandassa upaṭṭhānasadisatā vuttā, thāmabhāvato ca vīriyassa
tika-s0305t:581_13: kusaladhammesu paññā seṭṭhāti vīmaṃsāya jātisampattisadisatā vuttā.
tika-s0305t:583_1: vipphanditacittatāya vipphandamānacittā. Tucchatāya naḷo viyāti naḷo, māno, uggato
tika-s0305t:583_2: naḷo etesanti unnaḷāti āha – “unnaḷāti…pe… vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Capalāti cāpalyatā nāma
tika-s0305t:583_3: lolabhāvo. Murāti kharavacanā, pharusavacanāti attho. Vikiṇṇavācā nāma samphappalāpinoti
tika-s0305t:583_4: vuttaṃ “asaṃyatavacanā”tiādi. Paṭipattidhamme pamuṭṭhā vinaṭṭhā paṭivinaṭṭhā sati
tika-s0305t:583_5: etesanti muṭṭhasatīti āha – “naṭṭhassatino”ti. Ubbhantacittāti samādhino abhāvena
tika-s0305t:583_6: uddhacceneva uparūpari bhantacittā. Pākatindriyā abhāvitakāyatāya gāmadārakā viya
tika-s0305t:583_7: pakatibhūtaindriyā. Nemo vuccati bhūmiyā baddhabhāvanimittapadeso, gambhīro nemo
tika-s0305t:583_8: etassāti gambhīranemo. Suṭṭhu nikhātotiādi tassa pādassa suppatiṭṭhitabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:589: 832. Chandaṃ uppādetvāti bhāvanāchandaṃ uppādetvā. Līnākāroti bhāvanācittassa layāpatti. Kosajjena vokiṇṇāpajjanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:590_0: Evaṃ pasādābhāvena cittassa vikkhepāpatti, tattha pasāduppādanena yaṃ sampahaṃsanaṃ
tika-s0305t:590_1: icchitabbaṃ, tassa uppādanākāraṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “so buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe āvajjetvā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:590_2: Vatthukāme ārabbha vikkhitto punappunaṃ vikkhitto hotiyevāti vuttaṃ “anuvikkhitto”ti.
tika-s0305t:590_3: Uppathaṃ paṭipannassa cittassa daṇḍanaṭṭhena niggaṇhanaṭṭhena suttāni eva daṇḍoti
tika-s0305t:590_4: suttadaṇḍo, tena suttadaṇḍena cittaṃ tajjetvā. Pañcakāmaguṇe ārabbha pavatto cittavikkhepo
tika-s0305t:591_0: Purepacchābhāvo kammaṭṭhānassa manasikāravasena uggahavasena vāti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0305t:591_2: catūsu ṭhānesu. Tattha bhāvanaṃ anajjhogāhetvāva saṅkoco atilīnatā, ajjhogāhetvā
tika-s0305t:591_3: anto saṅkoco saṃkhittatā, antosaṅkhepo atipaggahitatā, accāraddhavīriyatā anuvikkhittatā.
tika-s0305t:591_5: vā gahetabbanti āha – “sarīravasena veditabba”nti. Tenāha “uddhaṃ pādatalā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:592_0: Aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato ākirīyanti pakārato ṭhapīyantīti ākārā, bhāgāti āha – “yehi
tika-s0305t:592_1: ākārehīti yehi koṭṭhāsehī”ti. Liṅgīyati sallakkhīyatīti liṅgaṃ, saṇṭhānaṃ. Nimīyati
tika-s0305t:592_2: niddhāretvā paricchindīyatīti nimittaṃ, upaṭṭhānaṃ. Yo bhikkhūtiādi ālokasaññaṃ yo
tika-s0305t:592_3: uggaṇhāti, taṃ dassanaṃ. Aṅgaṇeti vivaṭaṅgaṇe. Ālokasaññaṃ manasikaroti rattiyaṃ.
tika-s0305t:592_4: Vīriyādīsupīti yathā “idha bhikkhu chandaṃ uppādetvā”ti chande vitthāranayo vutto,
tika-s0305t:596_0: 834. Iminā catumahābhūtamayenāti iminā sabbalokapaccakkhena catūhi mahābhūtehi nibbattena
tika-s0305t:596_1: catumahābhūtamayena. Manomayo pana nimmitakāyo bhagavato rucivasena paresaṃ paccakkho
tika-s0305t:596_2: hoti. Omātīti avamāti. Ava-pubbo hi mā-saddo sattiatthopi hotīti “pahoti sakkotī”ti
tika-s0305t:596_3: attho vutto. Asambhinnapadanti asādhāraṇapadaṃ aññattha anāgatattā. Kāyassa citte
tika-s0305t:596_4: samodahanaṃ āropanaṃ tannissitatākaraṇañca atthato cittagatiyā pavattanamevāti āha
tika-s0305t:597_0: Tattha cittagatigamanaṃ nāma cittavasena kāyassa pariṇāmanena “ayaṃ kāyo imaṃ cittaṃ
tika-s0305t:597_1: viya hotū”ti kāyassa cittena samānagatikatāṭhapanaṃ. Kathaṃ pana kāyo dandhapavattiko
tika-s0305t:597_2: lahupavattinā cittena samānagatiko hotīti? Na sabbathā samānagatiko. Yatheva hi kāyavasena
tika-s0305t:597_3: cittapariṇāmane cittaṃ sabbathā kāyena samānagatikaṃ na hoti. Na hi kadāci taṃ sabhāvasiddhena
tika-s0305t:597_4: attano khaṇena avattitvā dandhavuttikassa rūpadhammassa vasena pavattituṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0305t:597_5: “idaṃ cittaṃ ayaṃ kāyo viya hotū”ti pana adhiṭṭhānena dandhagatikassa kāyassa anuvattanato
tika-s0305t:597_6: yāva icchitaṭṭhānappatti, tāva kāyagatianulomeneva hutvā santānavasena pavattamānaṃ
tika-s0305t:597_7: cittaṃ kāyagatiyā pariṇāmitaṃ nāma hoti. Evaṃ “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti
tika-s0305t:597_8: adhiṭṭhānena pageva sukhalahusaññāya sampāditattā abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ viya dandhaṃ
tika-s0305t:597_9: avattitvā yathā lahukaṃ katipayacittavāreneva icchitaṭṭhānappatti hoti, evaṃ pavattamāno
tika-s0305t:597_10: kāyo cittagatiyā pariṇāmito nāma hoti, na ekacittakkhaṇeneva icchitaṭṭhānappattiyā,
tika-s0305t:597_11: evañca katvā bāhāsamiñjanapasāraṇūpamāpi upacārena vinā suṭṭhutaraṃ yuttā hotīti.
tika-s0305t:597_12: Aññathā dhammatāvilomatā siyā, nāpi dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ iddhibalena kātuṃ
tika-s0305t:599: 835-842. “Dvinnaṃ phalāna”nti āgatasuttaṃ sandhāya “dve phalāni ādiṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0305t:605_0: 899-900. Chattiṃsāya ṭhānesūti ajjhattaṃ kāye samudayadhammānupassī, vayo, samudayavayo,
tika-s0305t:605_1: bahiddhā samudayo, vayo, samudayavayo, ajjhattabahiddhā samudayo, vayo, samudayavayadhammānupassīti
tika-s0305t:605_2: nava anupassanā, tathā vedanāya citte dhammesūti evaṃ chattiṃsāya ṭhānesu. Dutiye
tika-s0305t:605_3: dvādasasu ṭhānesūti kāye ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ajjhattabahiddhā, vedanāya citte dhammesūti
tika-s0305t:607: 901. Imāya pāḷiyāti imāya hīnattikapāḷiyā. Ime dhammā hīnā lāmakaṭṭhena. Ime dhammā majjhimā hīnapaṇītānaṃ majjhe bhavāti. Uttamaṭṭhena attappakaṭṭhena padhānabhāvaṃ nītāti paṇītā.
tika-s0305t:609_0: 902-905. Kaṇḍakā etissā atthīti kaṇḍakī, karamandagaccho. Osadhibhāvāpekkhāya itthiliṅganiddeso,
tika-s0305t:609_1: tabbahulatāya taṃ vanaṃ “kaṇḍakīvana”nteva paññāyittha. Sahassalokanti sahassacakkavāḷalokaṃ.
tika-s0305t:609_2: Dasacakkavāḷasahassaṃ ekāvajjanassa āpāthaṃ āgacchati tathā ālokavaḍḍhanassa katattā.
tika-s0305t:614_1: attano abhinīhārānurūpaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti te kālapadesavasena ceva yathāparicayasattapadesavasena
tika-s0305t:614_2: ca ṭhānānīti jānanti, sammāsambuddhānaṃ pana anantañāṇatāya sabbattheva appaṭihatameva
tika-s0305t:614_3: ñāṇanti āha – “sabbaññubuddhānaṃ panā”tiādi. Etaṃ dasabalañāṇaṃ anantavisayattā nippadesaṃ
tika-s0305t:623: 977. Etthāti etasmiṃ paṭhamasutte. Vuttameva, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t:625_0: 982. No-saddo pucchāyaṃ, tasmā nūti iminā samānatthoti āha “bhāvetha nū”ti. Kāmacchandoti
tika-s0305t:625_1: vatthukāmesu icchāti āha “pañcakāmaguṇikarāgo”ti. Dvādasasu āyatanadhammesu saparasantatipariyāpannesu.
tika-s0305t:627_0: 984. “Neva kāyopi kilamati na cakkhūnī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paduddhāro kato. “Kāyopi
tika-s0305t:627_1: kilamati, cakkhūnipi vihaññantī”ti vatvā yattha yathā hoti, tāni dassetuṃ “dhātukammaṭṭhānasmiṃ
tika-s0305t:627_2: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Cakkhūni phandanti kilamantītiādi ativelaṃ upanijjhāyane hotīti
tika-s0305t:627_3: katvā vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana kammaṭṭhāneti ānāpānakammaṭṭhāne. Evamāhāti “bhikkhu cepi
tika-s0305t:628_0: Labbhatīti aṭṭhakathādhippāye ṭhatvā vuttaṃ, parato āgatena theravādena so anicchito.
tika-s0305t:628_2: kasiṇanimittesu viya ugghāṭanaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti. Tenāha “na labbhatevā”ti. Ānisaṃsadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0305t:628_3: gahito, ānāpānassatisamādhismiṃ siddhe ayaṃ guṇo sukheneva ijjhatīti. Yasmā bhikkhūti
tika-s0305t:628_4: imasmiṃ vāre nāgatanti yathā purimavāre “bhikkhu cepi ākaṅkheyyā”ti āgataṃ, evaṃ
tika-s0305t:628_5: idha “bhāvite kho, bhikkhave, ānāpānassatisamādhimhī”ti āgatavāre bhikkhuggahaṇamakataṃ,
tika-s0305t:630_1: viya idampi ca nagaraṃ…pe… sabbākāravepullataṃ pattaṃ. Anekapariyāyenāti ettha pariyāyasaddo
tika-s0305t:630_2: kāraṇavacanoti āha “anekehi kāraṇehī”ti, ayaṃ kāyo aviññāṇakopi saviññāṇakopi evampi
tika-s0305t:630_3: asubho evampi asubhoti nānāvidhehi kāraṇehīti attho. Asubhākārasandassanappavattanti
tika-s0305t:630_4: kesādivasena tatthāpi vaṇṇādito asubhākārassa sabbaso dassanavasena pavattaṃ. Kāyavicchandanīyakathanti
tika-s0305t:630_5: attano parassa ca karajakāye vicchandanuppādanakathaṃ. Muttaṃ vātiādinā byatirekamukhena
tika-s0305t:630_6: kāyassa amanuññataṃ dasseti. Tattha ādito tīhi padehi adassanīyatāya asārakatāya
tika-s0305t:630_7: ca, majjhe catūhi duggandhatāya, ante ekena lesamattenapi manuññatābhāvamassa dasseti.
tika-s0305t:630_8: Atha khotiādinā anvayato sarūpeneva amanuññatāya dassanaṃ. “Kesalomādī”ti saṅkhepato
tika-s0305t:631: Vaṇṇentoti vitthārento. Asubhāyāti asubhamātikāya. Phātikammanti bahulīkāro. Kilesacorehi anabhibhavanīyattā jhānaṃ “cittamañjūsa”nti vuttaṃ. Nissāyāti pādakaṃ katvā.
tika-s0305t:632_0: Apare pana “tasmiṃ kira addhamāse na koci buddhaveneyyo ahosi, tasmā bhagavā evamāha
tika-s0305t:632_1: – ‘icchāmahaṃ, bhikkhave’tiādī”ti vadanti. Pare kirāti kira-saddo arucisaṃsūcanattho.
tika-s0305t:633_0: Anekakāraṇasammissoti ettha kāraṇaṃ nāma kāyassa asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikūlatāva.
tika-s0305t:633_1: Sabbamakaṃsūti puthujjanā nāma sāvajjepi tattha anavajjasaññino hutvā karaṇakārāpanasamanuññatābhedaṃ
tika-s0305t:633_2: sabbaṃ pāpaṃ akaṃsu. Kāmaṃ dasānussatiggahaṇeneva ānāpānassati gahitā, sā pana tattha
tika-s0305t:633_3: sannipatitabhikkhūsu bahūnaṃ sappāyā sātthikā ca, tasmā puna gahitā. Tathā hi bhagavā
tika-s0305t:633_4: tameva kammaṭṭhānaṃ imasmiṃ sutte kathesi. Āhāre paṭikūlasaññā asubhakammaṭṭhānasadisā,
tika-s0305t:633_5: cattāro pana āruppā ādikammikānaṃ ayogyāti tesaṃ idha aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:634_0: Vesāliṃ upanissāyāti vesālīnagaraṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā. Muhuttenevāti satthari saddhamme
tika-s0305t:634_1: ca gāravena upagatabhikkhūnaṃ vacanasamanantarameva uṭṭhahiṃsūti katvā vuttaṃ. Buddhakāle
tika-s0305t:634_2: kira bhikkhū bhagavato sandesaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchituṃ ohitasotā viharanti.
tika-s0305t:635_0: Ānāpānapariggāhikāyāti assāsapassāse pariggaṇhanavasena pavattāya satiyā. Sampayutto
tika-s0305t:635_1: samādhīti tāya sampayuttaaññamaññapaccayabhūtāya uppanno samādhi. Ānāpānassatiyaṃ
tika-s0305t:635_2: vā samādhīti iminā upanissayapaccayasabhāvampi dasseti, ubhayatthāpi sahajātādīnaṃ
tika-s0305t:635_3: sattannampi paccayānaṃ vasena paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti. “Yathāpaṭipannā me sāvakā cattāro
tika-s0305t:635_4: satipaṭṭhāne bhāventī”tiādīsu uppādanavaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanāti vuccatīti tadubhayavasena
tika-s0305t:635_5: atthaṃ dassento “bhāvitoti uppādito vaḍḍhito vā”ti āha. Tattha bhāvaṃ vijjamānataṃ
tika-s0305t:635_6: ito gatoti bhāvito, uppādito paṭiladdhamattoti attho. Uppanno pana laddhāsevano bhāvito,
tika-s0305t:635_7: paguṇabhāvaṃ āpādito vaḍḍhitoti attho. Bahulīkatoti bahulaṃ pavattito. Tena āvajjanādivasībhāvappattimāha.
tika-s0305t:635_8: Yo hi vasībhāvamāpādito, so icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjitabbato punappunaṃ pavattissati.
tika-s0305t:635_9: Tena vuttaṃ “punappunaṃ kato”ti. Yathā “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo, vivicceva kāmehī”ti
tika-s0305t:635_10: ca evamādīsu paṭhamapade vutto eva-saddo dutiyādīsupi vuttoyeva hoti, evamidhāpīti
tika-s0305t:635_11: āha “ubhayattha evasaddena niyamo veditabbo”ti. Ubhayattha niyamena laddhaguṇaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0305t:636_0: Asubhakammaṭṭhānanti asubhārammaṇaṃ jhānamāha. Tañhi asubhesu yogakammabhāvato yogino
tika-s0305t:636_1: sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato ca “asubhakammaṭṭhāna”nti vuccati. Kevalanti iminā ārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0305t:636_2: nivatteti. Paṭivedhavasenāti jhānapaṭivedhavasena. Jhānañhi bhāvanāvisesena ijjhantaṃ
tika-s0305t:636_3: attano visayaṃ paṭivijjhantameva pavattati yathāsabhāvato paṭivijjhiyati cāti paṭivedhoti
tika-s0305t:636_5: Pariyāyenāti kāraṇena, lesantarena vā. Ārammaṇasantatāyāti anukkamena vicitabbataṃ
tika-s0305t:636_6: pattārammaṇassa paramasukhumataṃ sandhāyāha. Santehi sannisinne ārammaṇe pavattamāno
tika-s0305t:636_7: dhammo sayampi sannisinnova hoti. Tenāha “santo vūpasanto nibbuto”ti, nibbutasabbapariḷāhoti
tika-s0305t:636_8: attho. Ārammaṇasantatāya tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ santatā lokuttaradhammārammaṇāhi
tika-s0305t:637_0: Nāssa santapaṇītabhāvāvahaṃ kiñci secananti asecanako. Asecanakattā anāsittako, anāsittakattā
tika-s0305t:637_1: eva abbokiṇṇo, asammisso parikammādinā. Tato eva pāṭiyekko visuṃyeveko. Āveṇiko asādhāraṇo.
tika-s0305t:637_2: Sabbametaṃ sarasato eva santabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ, parikammaṃ vā santabhāvanimittaṃ.
tika-s0305t:637_3: Parikammanti ca kasiṇakaraṇādinimittuppādapariyosānaṃ, tādisaṃ ettha natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t:637_4: Tadā hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ nirassādattā asantaṃ appaṇītaṃ siyā. Upacāre vā natthi ettha
tika-s0305t:637_5: santatāti yojanā. Yathā upacārakkhaṇe nīvaraṇādivigamena aṅgapātubhāvena ca paresaṃ
tika-s0305t:637_6: santatā hoti, na evamimassa. Ayaṃ pana ādisamannā…pe… paṇīto cāti yojanā. Kecīti
tika-s0305t:637_7: uttaravihāravāsino. Anāsittakoti upasecanena anāsittako. Tenāha – “ojavanto”ti ojavantasadisoti
tika-s0305t:637_9: upekkhāya vā santabhāvena sukhagatikattā sabbesampi jhānānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ. Jhānasamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭṭhasarīratāvasena
tika-s0305t:637_10: pana kāyikasukhapaṭilābhasaṃvattanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tañca kho jhānato vuṭṭhitakāle.
tika-s0305t:637_11: Imasmiṃ pakkhe “appitappitakkhaṇe”ti idaṃ hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:638_0: Avikkhambhiteti jhānena sakasantānato anīhate appahīne. Akosallasambhūteti akosallaṃ
tika-s0305t:638_1: vuccati avijjā, tato sambhūte. Avijjāpubbaṅgamā hi sabbe pāpadhammā. Khaṇenevāti
tika-s0305t:638_2: attano pavattikkhaṇeneva. Antaradhāpetīti ettha antaradhāpanaṃ vināsanaṃ, taṃ pana
tika-s0305t:638_4: Vūpasametīti visesena upasameti. Visesena upasamanaṃ pana sammadeva upasamanaṃ hotīti
tika-s0305t:638_5: āha “suṭṭhu upasametī”ti. Sāsanikassa jhānabhāvanā yebhuyyena nibbedhabhāgiyā hotīti
tika-s0305t:638_6: āha “nibbedhabhāgiyattā”ti. Ariyamaggassa pādakabhūto ayaṃ samādhi anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā
tika-s0305t:638_7: ariyamaggabhāvaṃ upagato viya hotīti āha “anupubbena ariyamaggavuḍḍhippatto”ti. Ayaṃ
tika-s0305t:638_8: panattho virāganirodhapaṭinissaggānupassanānaṃ vasena sammadeva yujjati. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0305t:640_0: 986. Theroti ānandatthero. Ayaṃ desanāti “kathaṃ vibhāvito nu kho kimilā”tiādinā
tika-s0305t:640_1: pavattā desanā. Kāyaññataranti rūpakāye aññatarakoṭṭhāse. Evanti yathā ānāpānaṃ anussaranto
tika-s0305t:640_2: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī jāto, evaṃ sabbattha vāresu vedanānupassītiādi attho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:641_0: Desanāsīsanti desanāpadesaṃ. Manasikārapadesena vedanā vuttāti taṃ sabbaṃ sarūpato
tika-s0305t:641_1: aññāpadesato apadisati. Yatheva hītiādinā tattha nidassanaṃ dasseti. Cittasaṅkhārapadadvayeti
tika-s0305t:642_0: Evaṃ santepīti pītimanasikāracittasaṅkhārapadesena yadi vedanā vuttā, evaṃ santepi.
tika-s0305t:642_1: Esā yathāvuttā vedanā ārammaṇaṃ na hoti. Vedanārammaṇā ca anupassanā, tasmā vedanānupassanā
tika-s0305t:642_2: na yujjati. Yadi evaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhānādīsu “vedanā vediyatī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ kathanti
tika-s0305t:642_3: āha – “mahāsatipaṭṭhānādīsupī”tiādi. Tattha sukhādīnaṃ vatthunti sukhādīnaṃ uppattiyā
tika-s0305t:642_4: vatthubhūtaṃ rūpasaddādiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanā vediyati, na puggalo puggalasseva
tika-s0305t:642_5: abhāvato. Vedanāppavattiṃ upādāya nissāya yathā “puggalo vedanaṃ vediyatī”ti vohāramattaṃ
tika-s0305t:642_6: hoti. Evaṃ idhāpi vedanāya assāsapassāse ārabbha pavatti, tathā pavattamanasikārasīsena
tika-s0305t:642_7: “vedanāsu vedanānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharatī”ti vutto. Taṃ sandhāyāti taṃ
tika-s0305t:642_8: vedanāya ārammaṇabhāvaṃ sandhāya. Ādīnaṃ padānaṃ. Etassa “vedanānupassanā na yujjatī”ti vuttaanuyogassa.
tika-s0305t:643_0: Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjatīti pītisahagatāni paṭhamadutiyajjhānāni paṭipāṭiyā
tika-s0305t:643_1: samāpajjati. Tassāti tena. Paṭisaṃviditasaddāpekkhāya hi kattuatthe etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:643_2: Samāpattikkhaṇeti samāpajjanakkhaṇe. Jhānapaṭilābhenāti jhānena samaṅgībhāvena. Ārammaṇatoti
tika-s0305t:643_3: ārammaṇamukhena tadārammaṇajhānapariyāpannā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti, ārammaṇassa
tika-s0305t:643_4: paṭisaṃviditattāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathā nāma sappapariyesanaṃ carantena tassa āsaye
tika-s0305t:643_5: paṭisaṃvidite sopi paṭisaṃvidito hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā,
tika-s0305t:643_6: evaṃ pītiyā āsayabhūte ārammaṇe paṭisaṃvidite sā pīti paṭisaṃviditāva hoti salakkhaṇato
tika-s0305t:643_7: sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca tassā gahaṇassa sukarattā. Vipassanakkhaṇeti vipassanāpaññāya
tika-s0305t:643_8: tikkhavisadabhāvappattāya visayato dassanakkhaṇe. Lakkhaṇappaṭivedhenāti pītiyā salakkhaṇassa
tika-s0305t:643_9: sāmaññalakkhaṇassa ca paṭivijjhanena. Yañhi pītiyā visesato sāmaññato ca lakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0305t:643_10: tasmiṃ vidite sā yāthāvato viditā eva hoti. Tenāha “asammohato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotī”ti.
tika-s0305t:644_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ pāḷiyā eva vibhāvetuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādimāha. Tattha dīghaṃ assāsavasenāti
tika-s0305t:644_1: dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa vasena. Pajānato sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti
tika-s0305t:644_2: sambandho. Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānatoti jhānapariyāpannaṃ “avikkhepo”ti
tika-s0305t:644_3: laddhanāmaṃ cittassekaggataṃ taṃsampayuttāya paññāya pajānato. Yathā hi ārammaṇamukhena
tika-s0305t:644_4: pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti, evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi ārammaṇamukhena paṭisaṃviditā
tika-s0305t:644_5: eva hontīti. Sati upaṭṭhitā hotīti dīghaṃ assāsavasena jhānasampayuttā sati tasmiṃ
tika-s0305t:644_6: ārammaṇe upaṭṭhitā ārammaṇamukhena jhānepi upaṭṭhitā nāma hoti. Tāya satiyāti evaṃ
tika-s0305t:644_7: upaṭṭhitāya tāya satiyā yathāvuttena tena ñāṇena suppaṭividitattā ārammaṇassa tassa
tika-s0305t:644_8: vasena tadārammaṇā sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Dīghaṃ passāsavasenātiādīsupi imināva
tika-s0305t:644_9: nayena attho veditabbo. Tena vuttaṃ “eteneva nayena avasesapadānipi atthato veditabbānī”ti.
tika-s0305t:645_0: Yathevātiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – jhānapaṭilābhena yathā ārammaṇato pītiādayo paṭisaṃviditā
tika-s0305t:645_1: honti tena vinā tesaṃ appavattanato. Evaṃ jhānasampayuttena taṃpariyāpannena vedanāsaṅkhātamanasikārapaṭilābhena
tika-s0305t:645_2: ārammaṇato vedanā paṭisaṃviditā hoti aruṇuggamena viya sūriyassa tena vinā vedanāya
tika-s0305t:645_3: appavattanato. Tasmā vuttanayena atisayappavatti vedanā suppaṭividitā, tasmā suvuttametanti
tika-s0305t:646_0: Ārammaṇeti assāsapassāsanimittaṃ vadati. Cittānupassīyeva nāmesa hoti asammohato
tika-s0305t:647_0: Soti dhammānupassanaṃ anuyutto bhikkhu. Yaṃ taṃ pahānaṃ pahāyakañāṇaṃ. Paññāyāti
tika-s0305t:647_1: aparāya vipassanāpaññāya aniccavirāgādito disvā duvidhāyapi ajjhupekkhitā hoti. Idañhi
tika-s0305t:647_2: catukkanti aniccānupassanādivasena vuttaṃ catukkaṃ. Tassāpi dhammānupassanāya. Pajahatīti
tika-s0305t:647_4: paṭipāṭiyā vipassanamāha. Pathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhatīti majjhimāya paṭipattiyā
tika-s0305t:647_5: sammadeva vīthipaṭipannaṃ bhāvanācittaṃ paggahaniggahānaṃ akaraṇena ajjhupekkhati.
tika-s0305t:647_6: Ekato upaṭṭhānanti yasmā majjhimasamathavīthinātivattiyā tattha ca pakkhandanena
tika-s0305t:647_7: indriyānaṃ ekarasabhāvena, tatramajjhattatāya bhāvato avisesaṃ ekaggabhāvūpagamanena
tika-s0305t:647_8: ekantato upaṭṭhāti, tasmā na tattha kiñci kātabbanti ajjhupekkhati. Tatthāti evaṃ
tika-s0305t:647_9: ajjhupekkhane. Sahajātānampi ajjhupekkhanā hoti tesaṃ pavattanākārassa ajjhupekkhanato.
tika-s0305t:647_10: “Paññāya disvā”ti vuttattā ārammaṇaajjhupekkhanā adhippetā. Na kevalaṃ nīvaraṇādidhamme
tika-s0305t:647_11: ajjhupekkhitā, atha kho abhijjhā …pe… paññāya disvā ajjhupekkhitā hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0305t:648_1: āyatanāni”icceva vuttaṃ. Kāyādayo cattāro ārammaṇasatipaṭṭhānā. Catūsu ārammaṇesūti
tika-s0305t:648_2: kāyādīsu catūsu ārammaṇesu pavattā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā paṃsupuñjaṭṭhāniyassa kilesassa upahananato.
tika-s0305t:653_0: Eva-vākāroti eva-kāro vā-kāro ca. Ekantasantattā ekantena santamanasikārabhāvato.
tika-s0305t:653_1: Sekkhavacaneneva tesaṃ sikkhitabbassa atthibhāve siddhepi sikkhitabbarahitesu tesupi
tika-s0305t:653_2: sekkhapariyāyassa vuccamānattā sikkhitabbasaddena sekkhe visesetvā vuttā. Āsavakkhayatthaṃ
tika-s0305t:653_3: sikkhitabbassa abhāvepi diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ jhānādisikkhanena vinā sikkhitabbābhāvā
tika-s0305t:653_4: “asekkhā nāmā”ti vuttā. Buddhānaṃ pana sabbaso sammadeva pariniṭṭhitasikkhattā “sikkhāmī”ti
tika-s0305t:655: 989-996. Aniccādivasenāti aniccadukkhānattavasena. Pavicinati pakārehi vicinati. Nikkilesāti apagatakilesā vikkhambhitakilesā. Pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgoti pāṭho.
tika-s0305t:656: Yāya anosakkanaṃ anativattanañca hoti, ayaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhā majjhattākāroti vuttā. Ekacittakkhaṇikāti ekacittuppādapariyāpannattā.
tika-s0305t:657_0: Cattunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena soḷasakkhattukā. Ānāpānasannissayena pavattattā ārammaṇavasena
tika-s0305t:657_1: pavattā ānāpānārammaṇāpi aparabhāge sati ānāpānassatīti pariyāyena vattabbataṃ arahatīti
tika-s0305t:657_2: “ānāpānassati missakā kathitā”ti vuttaṃ. Ānāpānamūlakāti ānāpānasannissayena pavattā
tika-s0305t:657_3: satipaṭṭhānā. Tesaṃ mūlabhūtāti tesaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ mūlakāraṇabhūtā. Bojjhaṅgamūlakāti
tika-s0305t:657_4: bojjhaṅgapaccayabhūtā. Tepi bojjhaṅgāti ete vīsati satipaṭṭhānahetukā bojjhaṅgā.
tika-s0305t:657_5: Vijjāvimuttipūrakāti tatiyavijjāya tassa phalassa ca paripūraṇavasena pavattā bojjhaṅgā.
tika-s0305t:663_0: 997. Anuggahagarahaṇesu nipātoti anuggaṇhanagarahatthajotako nipāto. Kimettha anuggaṇhāti,
tika-s0305t:663_1: kiṃ vā garahatīti āha “catunna”ntiādi. Tattha anuggaṇhanto anucchavikaṃ katvā gaṇhanto.
tika-s0305t:663_2: Garahanto nindanto. Issarasīlo issaro, tassa bhāvo issariyaṃ, pabhutā. Adhīnaṃ pati
tika-s0305t:663_3: adhipati, tassa bhāvo ādhipaccaṃ, sāmibhāvoti āha – “issariyādhipacca”ntiādi. Anantakānīti antarahitāni.
tika-s0305t:664_0: Aveccappasādenāti vatthuttayassa guṇe yāthāvato avecca pavisitvā pasādo. So pana
tika-s0305t:664_1: kenaci calanarahitoti āha “acalappasādenā”ti. Maggenāti ariyamaggena. Āgatappasādo
tika-s0305t:664_2: tassa adhigamena laddhappasādo. Apubbaṃ acarimanti ekajjhaṃ. Ariyasāvakānañhi ariyamaggo
tika-s0305t:664_3: uppajjantova tīsu vatthūsu aveccappasādaṃ āvahanto eva uppajjati. Tesanti visayabhūtānaṃ
tika-s0305t:664_4: tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ vasena tidhā vutto. Yasmā ca atthato eko, tasmāva ninnānākaraṇo
tika-s0305t:664_5: hoti pavattaṭṭhānabhede satipi. Ariyasāvakassa hītiādinā nayena tamatthaṃ vivarati.
tika-s0305t:664_6: Pasādo okappanā. Pemaṃ bhatti. Gāravaṃ garukaraṇaṃ. Mahantaṃ uḷāraṃ. Etaṃ vibhāgena
tika-s0305t:665_0: Evanti bhavantarepi akopanīyatāya. Sadisavasenāti aññehi akhaṇḍādīhi sadisavasena.
tika-s0305t:665_1: Tenāha “mukhavaṭṭi yañhi chinne”tiādi. Khaṇḍā etissā atthīti khaṇḍā. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0305t:665_2: Pātimokkhe āgatānukkamena sīlassa ādimajjhavibhāgo veditabbo. Dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ vāti
tika-s0305t:665_3: sīlakoṭṭhāsānaṃ. Ekantaraṃ bhinnanti abhinnena ekantaraṃ hutvā bhinnaṃ. Tesaṃ khaṇḍādīnaṃ.
tika-s0305t:665_5: idampi sīlaṃ vītikkantaṃ. “Ayaṃ sīlassa vītikkamo”ti evaṃ parāmasituṃ asakkuṇeyyehi.
tika-s0305t:667_0: 998. Yesanti aniyamato saddhādīnamādhārabhūtapuggaladassanaṃ. Buddhe pasādo gahito.
tika-s0305t:667_1: So hi itarehi paṭhamaṃ gahetabboti. Ariyakantāni sīlāni gahitāni sotāpannassa sīlānaṃ
tika-s0305t:667_2: adhippetattā. Saṅghe pasādo gahito dhammappasādassa anantaraṃ vuccamānattā. Dhamme
tika-s0305t:667_3: pasādo gahito aveccappasādabhāvato. Sotaṃ ariyamaggaṃ ādito patti sotāpatti, tassā
tika-s0305t:667_4: aṅgāni sotāpattiyaṅgāni. Paccentīti pajāyanti adhigacchanti. Tenāha “pāpuṇantī”ti.
tika-s0305t:667_5: Brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṃ. Katarapasādo vattamānoti adhippāyo. Maggappasādoti
tika-s0305t:667_6: maggasampayutto pasādo. Āgatamaggassāti adhigatamaggassa. Missakappasādo esoti tasmā
tika-s0305t:669_0: 999. Yadaggena tasmiṃ upāsake yathāvuttāni sotāpattiyaṅgāni saṃvijjanti, tadaggena
tika-s0305t:669_1: so tesu vattissatīti āha “catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu sandissasī”ti. Vijjaṃ bhajantīti
tika-s0305t:669_2: vijjābhāgiyā, tesu koṭṭhāsesu pariyāpannāti vuttaṃ “vijjābhāgiyeti vijjākoṭṭhāsike”ti.
tika-s0305t:671_2: Aṅganti kāraṇaṃ. Itare ratanattayappasādādayo. Pubbabhāgiyāya sotāpattiyā aṅgaṃ kāraṇanti.
tika-s0305t:673_0: 1002. (Vitānaṃ kāyānaṃ kālanakāya, kāraṇassa upagatānaṃ sātapariyā sijjhati. Tattha
tika-s0305t:673_1: kāyaparipajjhāyamukhena tantiṃ ṭhapesi bhagavā. Na hi passatha namatthehi karaṇe
tika-s0305t:673_2: niratthako piti vattati. “Niyatattā”ti vuttaṃ. Tameva niyamaṃ “majjhimapadeseyevā”ti
tika-s0305t:673_3: avadhāraṇena vibhāveti. Mahāmaṇḍalacārikaṃ carantopi majjhimapadesassa antanteneva
tika-s0305t:673_4: carati. Tattha ca vineyyajanassa samosaraṇatā mattapanavācamahatthasupananti.) [Etthantare
tika-s0305t:673_5: pāṭho asuddho dussodhanīyo ca, suddhapāṭho gavesitabbo.] Aruṇuṭṭhāpanampi tattheva
tika-s0305t:673_6: hoti. Paccantapadese pana dūre vineyyajanā honti, tattha gantvā maggaphalesu patiṭṭhāpetvā
tika-s0305t:673_7: tato paccāgantvā majjhimapadese eva vāsaṃ upagacchati, tattha manussehi katānaṃ kārānaṃ
tika-s0305t:673_8: mahapphalabhāvaniyamanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Āsanne no bhagavā”ti idaṃ nidassanamattanti
tika-s0305t:674: Sakiñcanasapalibodhanaṭṭhenāti ettha kiñcanaṃ palibodho asamāpitakiccatā, tadubhayassa atthibhāvenāti attho. Mahāvāseti mahāgehe.
tika-s0305t:675_0: Dvepi janāti isidattapurāṇā. Sitaṃ nāma mandahasitaṃ. Hasitaṃ nāma vissaṭṭhahasitaṃ.
tika-s0305t:675_1: Muttacāgotiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ visuddhimaggaṭīkāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t:675_2: Saṃvibhāgeti parassa dānavasena saṃvibhajane. Akatavibhāganti deyyadhammavasena na
tika-s0305t:675_3: katavibhāgaṃ. Puggalavasena pana “sīlavantehī”ti vuttattā katavibhāgameva mahapphalatākaraṇena.
tika-s0305t:676: (Etthantare pāṭho asuddho dussodhanīyo ca, suddhapāṭho gavesitabbo.)
tika-s0305t:678_1: attani netvā parasmiṃ upanetabbaṃ. Tenāha “yo kho myāyaṃ dhammo appiyo amanāpo, parassapeso
tika-s0305t:678_2: dhammo appiyo amanāpo”tiādi. Amantabhāsenāti samphassa samphappalāpassa amantāya
tika-s0305t:680_0: 1004-5. Dve gāmā dvinnaṃ ñātīnaṃ gāmāti katvā. Ñātiketi evaṃladdhanāme ekasmiṃ gāmake.
tika-s0305t:680_1: Giñjakāvasatheti giñjakā vuccanti iṭṭhakā, giñjakāhi eva kato āvasatho, tasmiṃ. So
tika-s0305t:680_2: kira āvāso yathā sudhāhi parikammena payojanaṃ natthi, evaṃ iṭṭhakāhi eva cinitvā
tika-s0305t:680_4: pana dārumayā eva. Oraṃ vuccati kāmadhātu, paccayabhāvena taṃ oraṃ bhajantīti orambhāgiyāni,
tika-s0305t:680_5: orambhāgassa vā hitāni orambhāgiyāni. Tenāha “heṭṭhābhāgiyāna”ntiādi. Tīhi maggehīti
tika-s0305t:680_6: heṭṭhimehi tīhi maggehi. Tehi pahātabbatāya hi tesaṃ saññojanānaṃ orambhāgiyatā,
tika-s0305t:680_7: oraṃ bhañjiyāni vā orambhāgiyāni vuttāni niruttinayena. Idāni byatirekamukhena nesaṃ
tika-s0305t:680_9: puthujjanānaṃ, samucchinnāni sabbaso abhāvena ariyānaṃ rūpārūpabhavūpapattiyā vibandhanāya
tika-s0305t:680_10: na hontīti vuttaṃ “avikkhambhitāni maggena vā asamucchinnānī”ti. Nibbattivasenāti
tika-s0305t:680_11: paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena gantuṃ na denti. Mahaggatabhavagāmikammāyūhanassa vibandhanato
tika-s0305t:680_12: sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīni tīṇi saññojanāni kāmacchandabyāpādā viya mahaggatabhavūpapattiyā
tika-s0305t:680_14: kāmabhavūpapattipaccayatāya mahaggatabhavato ānetvā idheva kāmabhave eva nibbattāpenti.
tika-s0305t:680_15: Tasmā sabbānipi pañcapi saṃyojanāni orambhāgiyāneva. Paṭisandhivasena anāgamanasabhāvoti
tika-s0305t:680_16: paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena tasmā lokā idha na āgamanasabhāvo. Buddhadassana-theradassana-dhammassavanānaṃ
tika-s0305t:681_0: Kadāci uppattiyā viraḷākāratā, pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya abahalatāti dvedhāpi tanubhāvo.
tika-s0305t:681_1: Abhiṇhanti bahuso. Bahalabahalāti tibbatibbā. Yattha uppajjanti, taṃ santānaṃ maddantā
tika-s0305t:681_2: pharantā sādhentā andhakāraṃ karontā uppajjanti, dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā tanukatanukā
tika-s0305t:681_3: mandamandā uppajjanti. Puttadhītaro hontīti idaṃ akāraṇaṃ. Tathā hi aṅgapaccaṅgaparāmasanamattenapi
tika-s0305t:681_4: te honti. Idanti “rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ. Bhavatanukavasenāti appakabhavavasena.
tika-s0305t:681_5: Tanti mahāsīvattherassa vacanaṃ paṭikkhittanti sambandho. Ye bhavā ariyānaṃ labbhanti,
tika-s0305t:681_6: te paripuṇṇalakkhaṇabhavā eva. Ye na labbhanti, tattha kīdisaṃ taṃ bhavatanukaṃ.
tika-s0305t:681_7: Tasmā ubhayathāpi bhavatanukassa asambhavo evāti dassetuṃ “sotāpannassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:681_8: Aṭṭhame bhave bhavatanukaṃ natthi aṭṭhamasseva bhavassa sabbasseva abhāvato. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0305t:682_0: Kāmāvacaralokaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ itarassa lokassa vasena tathā vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-s0305t:682_1: Yo hi sakadāgāmī devamanussalokesu vomissakavasena nibbattati, sopi kāmabhavavaseneva
tika-s0305t:682_2: paricchinditabbo. Bhagavatā ca kāmaloke ṭhatvā – “sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā”ti
tika-s0305t:682_3: vuttaṃ. Imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvāti ca iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova
tika-s0305t:682_4: gahito. Ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva parinibbāyati, ekacco idha patvā
tika-s0305t:682_5: devaloke parinibbāyati, ekacco devaloke patvā tattheva parinibbāyati, ekacco devaloke
tika-s0305t:682_6: patvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati, ime cattāro idha na labbhanti. Yo pana idha patvā
tika-s0305t:682_7: devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati, ayamidha adhippeto.
tika-s0305t:682_8: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “imaṃ lokanti kāmabhavo adhippeto”ti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “sace
tika-s0305t:683_0: Catūsu…pe… sabhāvoti attho apāyagamanīyānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ sabbaso pahīnattā. Dhammaniyāmenāti
tika-s0305t:683_2: Tesaṃ tesaṃ ñāṇagatinti tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ “asuko sotāpanno, asuko sakadāgāmī”tiādinā
tika-s0305t:683_3: taṃtaṃñāṇādhigamanaṃ ñāṇūpapattiṃ. Ñāṇābhisamparāyanti tato parampi – “niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo
tika-s0305t:683_4: sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karissatī”tiādinā ñāṇasahitaṃ upapattipaccayabhavaṃ.
tika-s0305t:683_5: Olokentassa ñāṇacakkhunā apekkhantassa. Kevalaṃ kāyakilamathova, na tena kāci paresaṃ
tika-s0305t:683_6: atthasiddhīti adhippāyo. Cittavihesā cittakhedo, sā kilesūpasaṃhitattā buddhānaṃ natthi.
tika-s0305t:684_0: Ādissati ālokīyati attā etenāti ādāsaṃ, dhammabhūtaṃ ādāsaṃ dhammādāsaṃ, ariyamaggañāṇassetaṃ
tika-s0305t:684_1: adhivacanaṃ. Tena hi ariyasāvako catūsu ariyasaccesu viddhastasammohattā attānaṃ
tika-s0305t:684_2: yāthāvato ñatvā yāthāvato byākareyya, tappakāsanato pana dhammapariyāyassa suttassa
tika-s0305t:684_3: dhammādāsatā veditabbāti. Yena dhammādāsenāti idha pana maggadhammameva vadati. Sesaṃ
tika-s0305t:688: 1007. Dhammikattā desavāsīhi anukampito rājāti rājako, tassa ārāmo rājakārāmo, tasmiṃ. Bhūmisīsaṃ seṭṭhappadeso, yattha vasanto lābhaggayasaggappatto hotīti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t:689_0: Vārāpehīti paṭisedhehi. Yujjhāpetunti kalahaṃ kārāpetuṃ. Puna āgacchantāti aparasmiṃ
tika-s0305t:689_1: saṃvacchare āgacchantā. Ubbaṭṭetvāti mahatī vīciyo ubbaṭṭetvā. Yathā tassa sakalameva
tika-s0305t:689_2: raṭṭhaṃ ekodakībhūtaṃ hoti, evaṃ katvā samuddameva jātaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “samuddameva akaṃsū”ti.
tika-s0305t:690_0: Isīnamantaraṃ katvāti isīnaṃ kāraṇaṃ katvā, isīnaṃ hetūti attho, isīnaṃ vā antarabhedaṃ
tika-s0305t:690_1: katvā. Tathā loke kolāhalassa patthaṭataṃ vibhāvento bhagavā “me suta”nti āha paccakkhato
tika-s0305t:690_2: jānampi. Ucchinnoti kulacchedena ucchinno. Na kevalaṃ sayameva, atha kho saha raṭṭhehi.
tika-s0305t:691: Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttanti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ pasenadinā kosalarājena kāritaṃ vihāraṃ sandhāya etaṃ “rājakārāme”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:695: 1010. Duṭṭhā gati nipphatti duggati, duggatabhāvo dāliddiyaṃ, tadeva bhayaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ anavasesaṃ vā duggatibhayaṃ daliddabhayaṃ. Sammadeva atikkantoti samatikkanto.
tika-s0305t:697_2: Amā saha bhavantīti amaccā. “Amhākaṃ ime”ti ñāyantīti ñātī, āvāhavivāhasambaddhā.
tika-s0305t:699_0: 1013. Kismiñci kassaci ca tathā tathā uppannassa pasādassa aññathābhāvo pasādaññathattaṃ.
tika-s0305t:699_3: “Ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ aññathattaṃ vipariṇāmaññathattaṃ.
tika-s0305t:699_4: Lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ na labbhati. Tenāha “lakkhaṇaṃ pana na vigacchatī”ti, sesaṃ labbhatīti.
tika-s0305t:699_5: Pathavīdhātuyāti sasambhārapathavīdhātuyā. Āpodhātuyāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Purimabhāvoti
tika-s0305t:699_7: Tenāha “tañhi ariyasāvakassa natthī”ti. Pasādaññathattampi natthiyeva ariyasāvakassa.
tika-s0305t:703_1: Byūhā nāma yehi eva pavisanti, tehi eva nikkhamanti. Tenāha “byūhā vuccanti avinibbiddharacchāyo”ti.
tika-s0305t:705_0: 1019. Tīhīti ratanattaye uppannehi tīhi pasādadhammehi. Catūhīti tehi eva saddhiṃ
tika-s0305t:705_1: sīlena. Kocidevātiādi parikappavasena vuttaṃ bhagavati attano saddhāya uḷāratamabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0305t:705_3: Tadeva hi sandhāyāha “kiñcideva kāraṇa”nti. Kāraṇanti nānākāraṇaṃ. Kalyāṇakusalavimuttanti
tika-s0305t:705_4: akalyāṇaṃ akusalaṃ, tadidaṃ yathāvuttaappasādanena apanītaatthadassanatthaṃ. Assāti
tika-s0305t:705_5: mahānāmasakkassa. Anavajjanadoso esoti catūsu dhammesu ekenapi samannāgato sotāpanno
tika-s0305t:705_6: hotīti anujānitvā catūhipi samannāgatena ācikkhitabbanti yāthāvato anavajjanadosoti attho.
tika-s0305t:707_0: 1020. Pamāṇenāti ekena pamāṇena, na sabbaso. Olokanaṃ khamantīti dassanamaggena catusaccadhammā
tika-s0305t:707_1: paccattaṃ passitabbā paṭivijjhitabbā. Paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe hi catusaccadhammā ekadesatova
tika-s0305t:707_2: diṭṭhā nāma honti. “Parimuccatī”ti pana vattuṃ vaṭṭati paṭivijjhanakiriyāya vattamānattā.
tika-s0305t:707_3: Agantvā apāyesu anuppattirahattā. Tenāha “na gacchatī”ti, na uppajjatīti attho. Mahāsārarukkhe
tika-s0305t:707_4: dassento āha – “yo koci viññujātiko mama ce gocaraṃ gacchati, ekassa āgamanaṃ avañjhaṃ
tika-s0305t:709_0: 1021. Dukkhettaṃ nirojakaṃ, tāya eva dukkhettatāya visamaṃ hotīti āha “visamakhetta”nti.
tika-s0305t:709_1: Loṇūpahatanti jātasabhāvena loṇena ūsarena upahataṃ. Khaṇḍānīti khaṇḍitāni. Temetvāti
tika-s0305t:709_2: temitattā. Vātātapahatānīti cirakālaṃ vātena ceva ātapena ca upahatāni ābādhitāni.
