tika-s0305t:711_0: 1022. Ṭhānanti ṭhānaso. Tenāha “khaṇenā”ti. Niyyānikanti pavattaṃ ñāṇapaṭirūpakaṃ
tika-s0305t:711_2: pavatteyyāti āha “micchāpaccavekkhaṇenā”ti. Guṇaviyuttassa attano sakattani avaṭṭhānasaṅkhātā
tika-s0305t:713: 1023. Yathākammaṃ samparetabbato samparāyo, peccabhavo, samparāyahetukaṃ samparāyikaṃ, maraṇabhayaṃ.
tika-s0305t:717: 1027. Avicchedena niccappavattiyamānāni puññāni abhisandanaṭṭhena “puññābhisandā”ti vuttā, tena puññanadiyoti attho vutto. Sukhassa āharaṇato ānayanato sukhassāhāro.
tika-s0305t:719_0: 1030. Devānanti visuddhidevānaṃ. Devapadānīti tesaṃ padāni devapadāni, devoti vā
tika-s0305t:719_1: sammāsambuddho. Devassa ñāṇena akkantapadānīti paṭivedhañāṇena ceva desanāñāṇena
tika-s0305t:719_2: ca akkantapadāni. Devā nāma jātidevā. Tesampi devaṭṭhena devoti devadevo, sambuddho.
tika-s0305t:721_0: 1034. Pāraṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ saṃsāramahoghassa paratīrabhāvato. Tenāha – “tiṇṇo pāraṅgato,
tika-s0305t:721_1: thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo, ye janā pāragāmino”ti ca. Atha vā pāti rakkhatīti pāraṃ,
tika-s0305t:721_2: nibbānaṃ. Yo paṭivijjhati, taṃ vaṭṭadukkhato pāti rakkhati, accantahitena ca vimuttisukhena
tika-s0305t:721_3: ca rameti, tasmā pāranti vuccati. Gacchamānā evāti pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gacchamānā eva.
tika-s0305t:721_4: Te dhammā āsavānaṃ khayāya saṃvattanti sacchikiriyāpahānapaṭivedhānaṃ samakālattā.
tika-s0305t:723: 1036. Pavivekatthāyāti pavivekasukhatthāya. Paṭisallānatthāyāti bahiddhā nānārammaṇato cittaṃ paṭinivattetvā kammaṭṭhāne sammadeva līnatthāya.
tika-s0305t:727_0: 1037. Saṅkhyā atthi heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā, upari ākāsena, parito cakkavāḷapabbatena,
tika-s0305t:727_1: majjhe tattha tattha ṭhitehi dīpapabbatapariyantehi paricchinnattā. Jānantena yojanato
tika-s0305t:727_3: saviññāṇakānaṃ, baḷavāmukhapātālādīnaṃ aviññāṇakānaṃ bheravārammaṇānaṃ vasena bahubheravaṃ.
tika-s0305t:729_0: 1038. Sambhedeti sambhedaṃ samodhānaṃ gataṭṭhāne. Yatthimā mahānadiyo saṃsandanti
tika-s0305t:729_1: samentīti parikappavacanametaṃ. Tādisāsu hi mahānadīsu kāci puratthimasamuddaṃ paviṭṭhā, kāci pacchimaṃ.
tika-s0305t:731_0: 1039. “Kusale patiṭṭhito”ti ettha yaṃ accantikaṃ kusale patiṭṭhānaṃ. Taṃ dassento
tika-s0305t:731_2: magga”nti. Ariyaphalaṃyeva dhammasāro. Kilesā khīyanti etthāti kilesakkhayo, nibbānaṃ,
tika-s0305t:733_0: 1040. Ariyānaṃ buddhānaṃ dhanantipi ariyadhanaṃ, nibbānanti keci. Anayatopi visuddhaṭṭhena
tika-s0305t:733_1: ariyañca taṃ dhanañca dhanāyitaṭṭhenāti ariyadhanaṃ, tena ariyadhanena. Teneva bhogenāti ariyadhanabhogena.
tika-s0305t:737_0: 1048. Samodhānetvāti yehi indriyādīhi bhāviyamānehi sotāpattimaggo anuppatto, tāneva.
tika-s0305t:737_1: Dhammasamānatāya cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Aññāneva hi atthato taṃ taṃ maggaṃ sādhakāni indriyādīni.
tika-s0305t:737_2: Tanti paveṇī kathitāti yaṃ kañci vineyyapuggalaṃ anapekkhitvā kevalaṃ tantivasena ṭhiti kathitā.
tika-s0305t:739_0: 1049. Sattasu janesūti sattasu kittiyamānesu upāsakajanesu. Gambhīrātiādīsu dhammagambhīrāti
tika-s0305t:739_1: pāḷigatiyā gambhīrā, tathā ca sallasuttaṃ heṭṭhā pakāsitameva. “Cetanāhaṃ, bhikkhave,
tika-s0305t:739_2: kammaṃ vadāmī”tiādinā āgataṃ cetanāsuttaṃ. Tattha “cetanāsahajātaṃ nānākkhaṇika”ntiādinā
tika-s0305t:739_3: paṭṭhāne āgatanayena, suttesu ca “diṭṭhadhammavedanīya”ntiādinā āgatanayena gambhīrabhāvo
tika-s0305t:739_4: veditabbo, nibbānassa ceva ariyamaggassa ca pakāsanato asaṅkhatasaṃyuttassa lokuttaratthadīpakatā.
tika-s0305t:739_5: “Atītaṃpāhaṃ rūpena khajjiṃ, etarahi khajjāmī”tiādinā pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ khādakabhāvassa,
tika-s0305t:739_6: puggalassa khāditabbatāya vibhāvanena khajjanīyapariyāye visesato nissattanijjīvatā
tika-s0305t:739_8: ye tesu suttesu vuttapaṭipadaṃ sammadeva paripūrenti, te tesu upasampajja viharanti
tika-s0305t:739_9: nāma. Etthāti “na kho neta”nti ettha na-kāro “aññamañña”nti ettha ma-kāro viya byañjanasandhimattameva, nāssa koci attho.
tika-s0305t:741_0: 1050. Na kho panetanti na kho etaṃ, noti ca amhehīti atthoti āha “na kho amhehī”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:741_1: Assasantīti assāsanīyāti āha “assāsakarehī”ti. Marissatīti māriso, ekantabhāvimaraṇo,
tika-s0305t:741_2: so pana maraṇādhīnavuttikoti vuttaṃ “maraṇapaṭibaddho”ti. Adhimuccehīti adhimuttiṃ
tika-s0305t:741_3: uppādehi. Taṃ pana tathā cittassa paṇidhānaṃ ṭhapananti āha “ṭhapehī”ti. Āgamanīyaguṇesūti
tika-s0305t:741_4: pubbabhāgaguṇesu. Pamāṇaṃ nāma natthi anantāparimāṇattā. Nānākaraṇaṃ natthi vimuttiyā ninnānattā.
tika-s0305t:747: 1058. Mahante atthe pariggaṇhātīti saccapaṭiccasamuppādādike mahāvitthāre atthe paricchijja asesetvā muṭṭhigate viya katvā gaṇhāti. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
tika-s0305t:753_1: yathāgatādivasena. Yathābhūtaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sutte “samāhito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathābhūtaṃ
tika-s0305t:753_2: pajānātī”tiādi. Ādi-saddena “tathā yasmā”tiādisaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi yathābhūtavasena
tika-s0305t:753_3: kāraṇacchedo kato “tathā yasmā”tiādivacanehi. Vaṇṇāti akkharā, “guṇā”ti keci. Padabyañjanānīti
tika-s0305t:755_0: 1073-75. Sāsanāvacarā adhippetā bāhirakānaṃ saccābhisamayassa abhāvato. Tathāti iminā
tika-s0305t:755_1: catutthapañcamesu atthavisesābhāvaṃ dasseti. Yadi evaṃ kasmā visuṃ visuṃ desanāti
tika-s0305t:757_0: 1080. Duggatito saṃsārato ca niyyāti etenāti niyyānaṃ, saggamaggo mokkhamaggo ca.
tika-s0305t:757_1: Tasmiṃ niyyāne niyuttā, taṃ ettha atthīti niyyānikā. Vacīduccaritasaṃkilesato vā
tika-s0305t:757_2: niyyātīti ī-kārassa rassattaṃ ya-kārassa ka-kāraṃ katvā niyyānikā. Cetanāya saddhiṃ
tika-s0305t:757_3: samphappalāpā veramaṇi. Tappaṭipakkhato aniyyānikā, tassa bhāvo aniyyānikattaṃ. Tiracchānabhūtanti
tika-s0305t:758_0: Visikhāti gharasanniveso. Visikhāgahaṇena ca gāmādigahaṇe viya tannivāsino visesato
tika-s0305t:758_1: gahitā “āgato gāmo”tiādīsu viya. Tenāha “sūrā samatthā”ti. Kumbhaṭṭhānāpadesena kumbhadāsiyo
tika-s0305t:758_2: vuttāti āha – “kumbhadāsikathā”ti. Ayāthāvato uppattiṭṭhitisaṃhārādivasena loko akkhāyati
tika-s0305t:758_3: etenāti lokakkhāyikā. Iti iminā pakārena bhavo, iminā abhavoti evaṃ pavattāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṃ.
tika-s0305t:762: 1081. “Isīnaṃ patanuppatanavasena osīdanauppatanaṭṭhānavasena evaṃ ‘isipatana’nti ‘laddhanāme’ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ‘ettha hī”’tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:763_0: Āmantesīti ettha yasmā dhammacakkappavattanatthaṃ ayaṃ āmantanā, tasmā samudāgamato
tika-s0305t:763_1: paṭṭhāya satthu pubbacaritaṃ saṅkhepeneva pakāsetuṃ vaṭṭatīti “dīpaṅkarapādamūle
tika-s0305t:763_2: katābhinīhārato paṭṭhāyā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha mārabalaṃ bhinditvāti mārañca mārabalañca
tika-s0305t:763_3: bhañjitvā. Atha vā mārassa abbhantaraṃ bāhirañcāti duvidhaṃ balaṃ bhañjitvā. “Dveme,
tika-s0305t:763_4: bhikkhave, antā”ti ettha anta-saddo “pubbante ñāṇaṃ aparante ñāṇa”ntiādīsu viya bhāgapariyāyoti
tika-s0305t:763_5: āha “dve ime, bhikkhave, koṭṭhāsā”ti. Saha samudāhārenāti uccāraṇasamakālaṃ. Pattharitvā
tika-s0305t:763_6: aṭṭhāsi buddhānubhāvena. Brahmāno samāgacchiṃsu paripakkakusalamūlā saccābhisambodhāya katādhikārā.
tika-s0305t:764_0: Gihisaññojananti gihibandhanaṃ. Chinditvāti haritvā. Na vaḷañjetabbāti nānuyuñjetabbā.
tika-s0305t:764_1: Kilesakāmasukhassāti kilesakāmayuttassa sukhassa. Anuyogoti anubhavo. Gāmavāsīhi
tika-s0305t:764_2: sevitabbattā gāmavāsīnaṃ santako. Attanoti attabhāvassa. Āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti attā,
tika-s0305t:764_3: attabhāvo. Dukkhakaraṇanti dukkhuppādanaṃ. Attamāraṇehīti attabādhanehi. Upasamāyāti
tika-s0305t:764_4: kilesavūpasamo adhippeto, tadatthasampadānavacananti āha “kilesūpasamatthāyā”ti. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0305t:765_0: Saccañāṇādivasena tayo parivaṭṭā etassāti tiparivaṭṭaṃ, ñāṇadassanaṃ. Tenāha “saccañāṇā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t:765_1: Yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇanti paṭivedhañāṇaṃ āha. Tesuyeva saccesu. Ñāṇena kattabbassa ca pariññāpaṭivedhādikiccassa
tika-s0305t:765_2: ca jānanañāṇaṃ, “tañca kho paṭivedhato pagevā”ti keci. Pacchāti apare. Tathā katañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0305t:766_0: Paṭivedhañāṇampi desanāñāṇampi dhammacakkanti idaṃ tattha ñāṇakiccaṃ padhānanti katvā
tika-s0305t:766_1: vuttaṃ. Saddhindriyādidhammasamudāyo pana pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ.
tika-s0305t:766_2: Atha vā cakkanti āṇā, dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṃ cakkañca, dhammena ñāyena
tika-s0305t:766_3: cakkantipi dhammacakkaṃ. Yathāha “dhammañca pavatteti cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, cakkañca
tika-s0305t:766_4: pavatteti dhammañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammena pavattatīti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammacariyāya
tika-s0305t:766_5: pavattatīti dhammacakka”ntiādi. Ubhayampīti paṭivedhañāṇaṃ desanāñāṇanti ubhayampi.
tika-s0305t:766_6: Etanti tadubhayaṃ. Imāya desanāyāti iminā suttena pakāsentena bhagavatā yathāvuttañāṇadvayasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0305t:766_7: dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ nāma pavattanakiccassa aniṭṭhitattā. Patiṭṭhiteti aññāsi
tika-s0305t:766_8: koṇḍaññattherena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhite. Pavattitaṃ nāma kassapasammāsambuddhassa
tika-s0305t:766_9: sāsanantaradhānato paṭṭhāya yāva buddhuppādo, ettakaṃ kālaṃ appavattapubbassa pavattitattā,
tika-s0305t:767_0: Ekappahārenāti ekeneva pahārasaññitena kālena. Divasassa hi tatiyo bhāgo pahāro nāma.
tika-s0305t:767_1: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “tena khaṇena tena layena tena muhuttenā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pahārakkhaṇasallakkhaṇameva.
tika-s0305t:767_2: Sabbaññutaññāṇobhāsoti sabbaññutaññāṇānubhāvena pavatto obhāso cittaṃ paṭicca utusamuṭṭhāno
tika-s0305t:767_3: veditabbo. Yasmā bhagavato dhammacakkappavattanassa ārambhe viya parisamāpane ativiya
tika-s0305t:767_4: uḷāratamaṃ pītisomanassaṃ udapādi, tasmā “imassapi udānassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t:769_0: 1089. Atthasaṃvaṇṇane vaṇṇīyanteti vaṇṇā. Teyeva pariyāyena akkharaṇato akkharāni.
tika-s0305t:769_1: Atthaṃ byañjentīti byañjanāni. Yasmā pana akārādike sarasamaññā, kakārādike byañjanasamaññā,
tika-s0305t:769_2: ubhayattha vaṇṇasamaññā, tasmā vuttaṃ “vaṇṇānaṃ vā ekadesā yadidaṃ byañjanā nāmā”ti.
tika-s0305t:769_3: Nettiyaṃ pana vākye byañjanasamaññā. Byañjanaggahaṇeneva cettha ākāraniruttiniddesā
tika-s0305t:769_4: gahitā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saṅkāsanāti atthassa ñāpanā bhāgaso. Tenāha “vibhattiyo”ti.
tika-s0305t:769_5: Saṅkāsanaggahaṇeneva cettha pakāsanā vuttā hoti. Vibhattiyo hi atthavacaneneva vivaranti,
tika-s0305t:769_6: tāhi kāraṇapaññattiyo vuttāyevāti, tāhipi atthapadāni gahitāneva honti. Ayamettha
tika-s0305t:769_7: saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimaggavaṇṇanāyaṃ nettiaṭṭhakathāyañca vuttanayena
tika-s0305t:769_8: veditabbo. Sabbākārenāti sabhāgādivibhāvanākārena. Vaṇṇādīnanti tasmiṃ pana vitthāre
tika-s0305t:769_9: pavattavaṇṇādīnaṃ. Tasmāti vaṇṇādīnaṃ antaabhāvato. Evamāhāti “aparimāṇā vaṇṇā byañjanā
tika-s0305t:771_0: 1090. Sabhāvāvijahanaṭṭhenāti attano dukkhasabhāvassa kadācipi apariccajanena tathasabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0305t:771_1: Tenāha “dukkhañhi dukkhameva vutta”nti. Sabhāvassāti dukkhasabhāvassa. Amoghatāyāti
tika-s0305t:771_2: avañjhatāya. Avitathanti na vitathaṃ. Tenāha “na hi dukkhaṃ adukkhaṃ nāma hotī”ti.
tika-s0305t:771_3: Aññabhāvānupagamenāti samudayādisabhāvānupagamanena musā na hotīti añño aññathā na
tika-s0305t:775: 1091. Ananubodhāti paṭivedhassa anurūpabodhābhāvena. Appaṭivedhāti saccānaṃ paṭimukhaṃ vedhābhāvena.
tika-s0305t:781: 1098. Paṭividdhattā desitattā cāti iminā paṭivedhañāṇena desanāñāṇena ca pariggahitattā ariyasantakāni honti ariyassa bhagavato santakabhāvato.
tika-s0305t:783: 1100. Ekappaṭivedhoti ekeneva ñāṇena catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ ekajjhaṃ paṭivedho.
tika-s0305t:787: 1101. Punappunaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃyeva nibbattanti adiṭṭhattā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ.
tika-s0305t:789: 1105. Bhaveyya ceti dukkhadomanassāni ajjhupekkhitvā sahitehi tehi saccābhisamayo bhaveyyāti evaṃ parikappanā na kātabbāti.
tika-s0305t:791_0: 1109. Ajjhāsayanti sassatādibhedaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ. So hi “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti
tika-s0305t:791_1: gāhassa mukhabhūtattā mukhanti adhippeto. Tañca apare adiṭṭhasaccā olokenti, diṭṭhasaccā pana neva olokenti.
tika-s0305t:793: 1110. Kukkuko pamāṇamajjhimassa purisassa hatthoti attho. Kukkūti tasseva nāmaṃ.
tika-s0305t:797_1: cittanti attho. Nāḷikerādayoti ādi-saddena avuttānaṃ osadhitiṇavanappatiādīnaṃ saṅgaho.
tika-s0305t:798_0: Vigatacittoti attatthaparatthato apagatavitakko addasa evaṃ adhiṭṭhahiṃsūti sambandho.
tika-s0305t:798_1: Sambarimāyanti sambarena asurindena uppāditaṃ asuramāyaṃ, yaṃ “indajāla”ntipi vuccati
tika-s0305t:798_2: indassa mohanatthaṃ uppāditattā. Samparivattetvāti paridhāvetvā. Yathā neti ne asure
tika-s0305t:798_3: yathā so puriso passati, evaṃ adhiṭṭhahiṃsu. Kasmā panete evaṃ adhiṭṭhahiṃsūti? Taṃ
tika-s0305t:798_4: purisaṃ tattha tathānisinnaṃ disvā “ayañca devo”ti āsaṅkantā tathā adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-s0305t:798_5: bhisamuḷālachiddehi pavisitvā attano asurabhavanaṃ gatā. Tenāha bhagavā – “devānaṃyeva mohayamānā”ti.
tika-s0305t:800_1: Aniṭṭharūpanti ettha rūpa-saddo sabhāvattho “piyarūpe sātarūpe”tiādīsu viyāti āha
tika-s0305t:802_0: 1115. Upāsananti ācariyaupāsanaṃ, ācariyaṃ antevāsinā vā divase divase sikkhanavasena
tika-s0305t:802_1: upāsitabbato upāsananti laddhanāmaṃ kaṇḍakhipanasippaṃ. Kaṇḍaṃ atikkamanteti saraṃ
tika-s0305t:802_2: khipante. Poṅkhānupoṅkhanti poṅkhasaddatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “ekaṃ kaṇḍaṃ
tika-s0305t:802_3: khipitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aparaṃ anupoṅkhanti ettha aparanti tatiyakaṇḍaṃ. Anupoṅkhaṃ
tika-s0305t:802_4: nāma idanti dassetuṃ “anupoṅkhaṃ nāma dutiyassa poṅkha”nti vuttaṃ. Tañhi tatiyena
tika-s0305t:802_5: sarena vijjhīyati. Puna aparaṃ tassa poṅkhanti idaṃ pana aparāparaṃ avirajjhanaṃ
tika-s0305t:802_6: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Durabhisambhavataranti abhibhavituṃ asakkuṇeyyataraṃ. Vālanti kesaṃ.
tika-s0305t:802_7: Sattadhā bhinditvāti sattakkhattuṃ viphāletvā. Tassa ekaṃ bhedanti tassa kesassa
tika-s0305t:802_8: ekaṃ aṃsusaṅkhātaṃ bhedaṃ gahetvā. Vātiṅgaṇamajjhe bandhitvāti vātiṅgaṇaphalassa
tika-s0305t:802_9: majjhaṭṭhāne bandhitvā. Aparaṃ bhedanti aparaṃ kesassa aṃsusaṅkhātaṃ bhedaṃ. Aggakoṭiyaṃ
tika-s0305t:802_10: bandhitvāti yathā tassa vālabhedassa ūkāmattaṃ likhāmattaṃ vā kaṇḍassa aggakoṭiṃ
tika-s0305t:802_11: adhikaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati, evaṃ bandhitvā. Usabhamatteti vīsatiyaṭṭhimatte ṭhāne ṭhito.
tika-s0305t:802_12: Kaṇḍabaddhāya koṭiyāti kaṇḍabaddhāya vālassa koṭiyā vātiṅgaṇabandhanavālassa koṭiṃ paṭivijjheyya.
tika-s0305t:804_1: Chiggaḷuparīti heṭṭhimayugassa chiggaḷapadesassa upari. Āruḷhassa chiggaḷenāti ubhinnampi
tika-s0305t:804_2: chiddena. Gīvappavesanaṃ viyāti catunnaṃ yugānaṃ chiddapadeseneva uparūpari ṭhitānaṃ
tika-s0305t:804_3: chiddantarena kāṇakacchapassa gīvappavesanaṃ adhiccatarasambhavaṃ. Tatopi adhiccatarasambhavo
tika-s0305t:804_4: manussattalābho, tato adhiccatamasambhavo ariyamaggapaṭilābhoti dassento āha “catusaccapaṭivedho
tika-s0305t:807: 1121. Abhisamayasaṃyutte vitthāritova, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva tassa attho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t:812_0: 1134. Piṭṭhasurāti piṭṭhena kātabbasurā, tathā odanasurā pūvasurā, majjarasādibhūte
tika-s0305t:812_1: kiṇṇe pakkhipitvā kattabbā surā kiṇṇapakkhittasurā. Sambhārasaṃyuttāti mūlabhesajjasambhārehi
tika-s0305t:812_2: saṃyuttā. Pupphāsavoti nāḷikerapupphādito assavanakaāsavo. Muddikaphalādito assavanakaāsavo
tika-s0305t:812_3: phalāsavo. Itītiādiattho. Tena madhvāsavaguḷāsavasambhārasaṃyutte saṅgaṇhāti. Surāsavavinimuttanti
tika-s0305t:817_0: 1148. “Mūlabīja”ntiādīsu mūlameva bījanti mūlabījaṃ, mūlabījaṃ etassātipi mūlabījaṃ.
tika-s0305t:817_1: Tattha purimena bījagāmo vutto “bījānaṃ samūho”ti katvā, dutiyena bhūtagāmo. Duvidhopeso
tika-s0305t:817_2: sāmaññaniddesena, “mūlabījañca mūlabījañca mūlabīja”nti ekasesanayena vā bījattho
tika-s0305t:817_3: veditabbo. Esa nayo sesesupi. Phaḷubījanti pabbabījaṃ. Bāhirapaccayantarasamavāye
tika-s0305t:817_4: sadisaphaluppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato viruhanasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bīja-saddo.
tika-s0305t:817_5: Tadatthasiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti tato nivattanatthaṃ ekena bīja-saddena
tika-s0305t:817_6: visesetvā vuttaṃ “bījabīja”nti “rūparūpaṃ, dukkhadukkha”nti ca yathā. Nīlatiṇarukkhādikassāti
tika-s0305t:817_7: allatiṇassa ceva allarukkhādikassa ca. Ādi-saddena osadhigacchalatādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0305t:819: 1149. Aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhiko, ayaṃ buddhādiariyānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo bhojanassa kālo, tadañño vikāloti āha – “vikālabhojanāti kālātikkantabhojanā”ti.
tika-s0305t:821: 1150. Yaṃ kiñci pupphanti ganthimaṃ aganthimaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci pupphajātaṃ, tathā pisitādibhedaṃ yaṃ kiñci gandhajātaṃ.
tika-s0305t:824_1: 183) bhagavato sāsanaṃ accantachandarāgapavattito naccādīnaṃ dassanaṃ na anulometīti
tika-s0305t:824_2: āha “sāsanassa ananulomattā”ti. Attanā parehi ca payojiyamānaṃ payojāpiyamānañca
tika-s0305t:824_3: eteneva nacca-saddena gahitaṃ, tathā gītavāditasaddehi cāti āha – “naccananaccāpanādivasenā”ti.
tika-s0305t:824_4: Ādi-saddena gāyana-gāyāpana-vādana-vādāpanādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Dassanena cettha savanampi
tika-s0305t:824_5: saṅgahitaṃ virūpekasesanayena. Yathāsakaṃ visayassa ālocanasabhāvatāya vā pañcannaṃ
tika-s0305t:824_7: gītassa savanaṃ kadāci vaṭṭatīti āha – “visūkabhūtā dassanā cā”ti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ
tika-s0305t:826_0: 1152. Uccāti ucca-saddena samānatthaṃ ekaṃ saddantaraṃ. Seti etthāti sayanaṃ, uccāsayanaṃ
tika-s0305t:826_2: Āsandādiāsanañcettha sayaneneva saṅgahitaṃ. Yasmā pana ādhāre paṭikkhitte tadādhārakiriyā
tika-s0305t:826_3: paṭikkhittāva hoti, tasmā “uccāsayanamahāsayanā”icceva vuttaṃ. Atthato pana tadupabhogabhūtanisajjānipajjanehi
tika-s0305t:826_4: virati dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā uccāsayanamahāsayanañca uccāsayanamahāsayanañcāti
tika-s0305t:826_5: uccāsayanamahāsayananti etasmiṃ atthe ekasesanayena ayaṃ niddeso kato yathā – “nāmarūpapaccayā
tika-s0305t:826_6: saḷāyatana”nti. Āsanakiriyāpubbakattā vā sayanakiriyāya sayanaggahaṇeneva āsanampi
tika-s0305t:828_0: 1153. Aññepi uggahāpane upanikkhittasādiyane ca paṭiggahaṇattho labbhatīti āha –
tika-s0305t:828_1: “na uggaṇhāpenti, na upanikkhittaṃ sādiyantī”ti. Atha vā tividhaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ kāyena
tika-s0305t:828_2: vācāya manasāti. Tattha kāyena paṭiggahaṇaṃ uggahaṇaṃ, vācāya paṭiggahaṇaṃ uggahāpaṇaṃ,
tika-s0305t:828_3: manasā paṭiggahaṇaṃ sādiyanaṃ. Tividhampi paṭiggahaṇaṃ sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesanayena
tika-s0305t:828_4: vā gahetvā “paṭiggahaṇā”ti vuttanti āha – “neva naṃ uggaṇhantī”tiādi. Esa nayo “āmakadhaññapaṭiggahaṇā”tiādīsupi.
tika-s0305t:832_0: 1155. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañca vasāni bhesajjāni – acchavasaṃ, macchavasaṃ, susukāvasaṃ,
tika-s0305t:832_1: sūkaravasaṃ, gadrabhavasa”nti vuttattā idaṃ uddissa anuññātaṃ nāma. Tassa pana “kāle
tika-s0305t:832_2: paṭiggahita”nti vuttattā paṭiggahaṇaṃ vaṭṭatīti āha – “aññatra uddissa anuññātā”ti.
tika-s0305t:832_3: Vinayavasena upaparikkhitabbo, tasmā samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya vuttanayenettha
tika-s0305t:835: 1162-63. Kassaci bhaṇḍassa gahaṇaṃ kayo, dānaṃ vikkayo. Tattha tatthāti gāmantare santike ca gamanaṃ dūtakammanti vuccatīti yojanā. Pahiṇagamanaṃ khuddakagamanaṃ.
tika-s0305t:837_0: 1164. Rūpakūṭaṃ sarūpena sadisena chalavohāro. Aṅgakūṭaṃ attano hatthādinā aṅgānaṃ
tika-s0305t:837_1: chalakaraṇaṃ. Gahaṇakūṭaṃ mānesu gahaṇavasena. Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ ayacuṇṇādinā paṭicchannena
tika-s0305t:837_2: chalakaraṇaṃ. Mahatiyā tulāya. Pacchābhāgeti tulāya pacchimabhāge. Hatthenāti hatthapadesena.
tika-s0305t:837_3: Akkamatīti uṭṭhātuṃ adento gaṇhāti. Dadanto pubbabhāgeti paresaṃ dadanto pubbabhāge
tika-s0305t:838_1: suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karonti. Mānabhājanassa hadayabhūtassa abbhantarassa bhinnaṃ hadayabhedo.
tika-s0305t:838_2: Nimiyamānassa tilataṇḍulādikassa sikhāya aggakoṭiyā bhinnaṃ sikhābhedo. Khettādīnaṃ
tika-s0305t:838_3: minanarajjuyā aññathākaraṇaṃ rajjubhedo. Rajjugahaṇeneva cettha daṇḍakassa gahaṇaṃ
tika-s0305t:840_0: 1166-71. Vadhoti muṭṭhippahārakasātāḷanādīhi hiṃsanaṃ, viheṭhananti attho. Viheṭhanatthopi
tika-s0305t:840_1: hi vadha-saddo dissati “atthānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyyā”tiādīsu. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0305t:840_2: pana “māraṇa”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana pothanaṃ sandhāyāti sakkā viññātuṃ māraṇasaddassa
tika-s0305t:845_1: samathavipassanāsu sammadeva yatanato ca yatīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ khandhāyatanadhātusaccindriyapaṭiccasamuppādabhede
tika-s0305t:845_2: paramatthadhamme nānānayehi ñāṇavibhāgassa sannissayena bahukārassa saṃyuttāgamavarassa
tika-s0305t:845_3: atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ kātuṃ sāratthappakāsanato eva nipuṇā yā mayā aṭṭhakathā āraddhāti
tika-s0305t:845_4: sambandho. Savisesaṃ paññāvahaguṇattā eva hissa ganthārambhe āditopi “paññāpabhedajananassā”ti
tika-s0305t:845_5: vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāya sāranti saṃyuttamahāaṭṭhakathāya sāraṃ. Ekūnasaṭṭhimattoti
tika-s0305t:846_0: Mūlaṭṭhakathāya sāranti pubbe vuttasaṃyuttamahāaṭṭhakathāya sārameva puna nigamanavasena
tika-s0305t:846_1: vuttanti. Atha vā mūlaṭṭhakathāya sāranti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu atthasāraṃ. Tena etaṃ
tika-s0305t:846_2: dasseti “saṃyuttamahāaṭṭhakathāya atthasāraṃ ādāya imaṃ sāratthappakāsiniṃ karontena
tika-s0305t:846_3: sesamahānikāyānampi mūlaṭṭhakathāsu idha viyogakkhamaṃ atthasāraṃ ādāya akāsi”nti.
tika-s0305t:846_5: samayaṃ pakāsayantiṃ mahāvihārādhivāsīnaṃ mūlaṭṭhakathāya sāraṃ ādāyā”ti ca. Tena
tika-s0305t:846_6: puññena. Hotu sabbo sukhī lokoti kāmāvacarādivibhāgo sabbo sattaloko yathārahaṃ bodhittayādhigamavasena
tika-s0305t:846_7: sampayuttena nibbānasukhena sukhito hotūti sadevakassa lokassa accantaṃ sukhādhigamāya
